content: Cov tuabneeg kws tau koob moov yog cov kws tsi ua lawv le cov tuabneeg sab phem tej lug haub ntxag, hab tsi xyum ua lawv le cov tuabneeg txhum ua; lossis tsi nrug cov tuabneeg kws tsi fwm Vaajtswv koom ua ib lub sab.
Tabsis cov kws tau kev kaaj sab, yog cov kws fwm tug TSWV txuj kevcai hab kawm txuj kevcai ntawd nruab nub mo ntuj.
Puab zoo ib yaam le tej ntoo kws cog ze rua ntawm ntug dlej kws txi txiv lawv caij lawv nyoog tej nplooj los tsi qhuav le. Hab txhua yaam kws puab ua puavleej tav zoo.
Tabsis cov tuabneeg sab phem tsi zoo le ntawd, puab zoo ib yaam le cov npluag nplej kws cua ntsawj yaa ri quas nab.
Vaajtswv yuav rau txim rua cov tuabneeg ua phem, hab muab puab cais tawm ntawm Vaajtswv tsaav tuabneeg.
Tug TSWV tsomkwm cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg hab coj puab txuj hauv kev. Tabsis cov tuabneeg ua phem taabtom taug txujkev puamtsuaj.
Vim le caag txhua tsaav tuabneeg tuavhuv ntxeev sab? Vim le caag cov pejxeem tuav tswvyim ua tej kws tsi muaj qaabhau?
Puab cov vaajntxwv los ntxeev sab, hab puab tej numtswv tuaj txoos ua ke tuav tswvyim tawmtsaam tug TSWV hab tawmtsaam tug vaajntxwv kws tug TSWV xaiv.
Puab has tas, “Ca peb nyob ywj sab tsi xob ca obtug kaav peb; hab ca peb tsiv tawm ntawm obtug txujkev tswjfwm.”
Tug TSWV nyob sau nwg lub zwmtxwv sau ntuj luag puab plig, hab thuam puab tej tswvyim kws tsi muaj qaabhau.
Nwg ntuag puab npautawg vog hab nwg txujkev chim ua rua puab ceeb pis nkaus.
Nwg has tas, “Kuv tsaa kuv tug vaajntxwv rua sau lub Roob Xi-oos  kws yog kuv lub roob dlawbhuv lawm.”
Tug vaajntxwv has tas, “Kuv yuav qha tej lug kws tug TSWV has tseg ca. Nwg has rua kuv tas, ‘Koj yog kuv tug tub; nub nua moog kuv yog koj txiv lawm.
Ca le thov, kuv yuav muab txhua tsaav tuabneeg cob rua koj; taagnrho lub nplajteb nuav yuav yog koj tug.
Koj yuav muab ib tug qws hlau lug kaav puab. Koj yuav ntaus puab tawg ntsoog ntxawg ib yaam le tej laujkaub aav.’ ”
Mej cov kws yog vaajntxwv, mej ca le noog tej lug qhuab ntuag nuav, mej cov kws kaav lub nplajteb, mej ca le kawm zaaj nuav:
Ca le muab lub sab dlawb paug ua tug TSWV teg num hab paub ntshai nwg,
ca le txu fwjchim hab txhus caug ndlua pe nwg, lossis yuav ca nwg chim rua mej hab ua kuas mej tuag taamsim. Txhua tug kws moog thov nwg ua tug tsomkwm txhaj yuav tau kev kaaj sab lug.
Tug TSWV, kuv muaj yeebncuab coob heev, hab muaj coob leej tawmtsaam kuv!
Puab sis thaam txug kuv, puab has tas, “Vaajtswv yuav tsi paab nwg le.”
Tabsis tug TSWV, koj yog dlaim hlau thaiv nav ntaaj; koj yuav pub kuas kuv yeej hab koj yuav txhawb kuv tug zug.
Kuv hu tug TSWV paab kuv, hab nwg nyob sau nwg lub roob dlawbhuv  teb kuv tej lug thov.
Kuv qhau cev pw tsaug zug, hab tug TSWV tsomkwm kuv ib mos kaaj ntug.
Kuv tsi ntshai kuv cov yeebncuab ntau txheeb leej kws vij puagncig kuv ntawd le.
Tug TSWV, ca le lug cawm kuv lauj! Kuv tug Vaajtswv! Koj ca le rau txim rua kuv cov yeebncuab hab tsi xob pub puab muaj fwjchim ua phem rua kuv.
Kev muaj yeej yog lug ntawm tug TSWV, thov nwg foom koob moov rua nwg tsaav tuabneeg.
Vaajtswv tug tiv thaiv kuv, thov teb kuv thaus kuv thov koj! Thaus kuv raug kev nyuaj sab, koj yeej paab kuv. Thov ua sab dlawb paug rua kuv hab noog kuv tej lug thov taamsim nuav!
Cov pejxeem, mej tseem pheej yuav saib tsi taug kuv moog txug thaus twg? mej tseem yuav nyam txujkev kws tsi muaj nqes hab kev dlaag moog txug thaus twg?
Ncu ntsoov has tas tug TSWV yeej xaiv cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg lug ua nwg tug hab nwg yeej nov kuv thaus kuv hu nwg.
Ca le ntshai ua sab tshee nyo hab tseg tsi xob ua txhum; thaus mej pw ntsag tu sau txaaj, mej ua tuab zoo muab zaaj nuav xaav kuas thoob thoob.
Muab tej khoom moog fij rua tug TSWV, kuas lawv le kevcai hab mej yuavtsum ca sab rua nwg.
Muaj coob leej thov tug TSWV le nuav: “Tug TSWV, thov koj foom koob moov ntxiv rua peb. Thov ua sab dlawb sab zoo tig lug saib peb!”
Tabsis tej kev zoo sab kws koj muab rua kuv tseem ntau tshaaj tej qoobloo hab tej cawv kws puab ibtxwm muaj.
Thaus kuv qhau cev pw, kuv tau tsaug zug tso sab lug, tug TSWV, tsuas yog koj tuab leeg xwb txhaj pub kuv muaj kev kaaj sab.
Tug TSWV, thov koj noog kuv tej lug hab nov kuv lub suab hu.
Kuv tug Vaajtswv hab Vaajntxwv, thov noog kuv lub suab quaj hu thov koj paab kuv! Tug TSWV, kuv thov koj;
koj yeej nov kuv lub suab thov thaus sawv ntxuv; thaus lub nub tawm tuaj kuv thov koj  hab tog rawv koj teb kuv.
Koj tsi yog tug Vaajtswv kws txaus sab rua txujkev ua phem ua qas; koj yeej tsi pub muaj tej kev phem nyob taabmeeg koj le.
Cov tuabneeg khaavtheeb tsi muaj peevxwm sawv taabmeeg ntawm koj lub xubndlag; koj ntxub cov tuabneeg sab phem.
Koj rhuav tshem cov tuabneeg dlaag, ntxub cov tuabneeg limham hab cov tuabneeg ntxeev sab.

Tabsis vim koj muaj kev hlub kuv txhaj muaj peevxwm lug tau rua huv koj tsev. Kuv txhaj muaj peevxwm moog pehawm koj huv koj lub Tuamtsev kws dlawbhuv hab txhus caug pehawm lug ntawm kuv lub sab kws fwm koj.
Tug TSWV, kuv muaj yeebncuab coob heev, thov coj kuv ua lawv le koj lub sab nyam! Thov ua koj txujkev kuas taj rua kuv taug.

Tej lug kws kuv cov yeebncuab has yeej tsi muaj ib lus tseeb le, puab tsuas yog xaav ua kuas muaj kev puamtsuaj xwb. Puab has lug mog lug muas hab ncauj lug zoo, tabsis puab lub sab puv nkaus kev dlaag ntxag kws yog kev tuag.

Vaajtswv, thov txav txim hab rau txim rua puab, thov kuas puab tej kev ntxeev sab ua rua puab raug kev puamtsuaj. Ca le muab puab ntab tawm ntawm koj moog, rua qhov puab ua txhum ntau heev hab puab ntxeev sab rua koj.
Tabsis ca txhua tug kws lug cuag koj tau kev kaaj sab lug, ca puab hu nkauj zoo sab txhua lub sijhawm. Thov koj tsomkwm cov kws hlub koj. Vim muaj koj puab txhaj muaj kev zoo sab.
Tug TSWV, koj yeej foom koob moov rua cov tuabneeg kws fwm koj, koj txujkev hlub tiv thaiv puab ib yaam le dlaim thaiv nav ntaaj.
Tug TSWV, thov koj tsi xob chim hab tsi xob tshev kuv! Tsi xob chim hab rau txim rua kuv.
Tug TSWV, thov koj hlub kuv, rua qhov kuv taabtom raug kev puamtsuaj! Thov txhawb kuv tug zug; vim kuv tug zug ntaug taag lawm,
taagnrho kuv lub cev raug txomnyem, ua rua kuv lwj sab kawg le. Tug TSWV, koj yuav tog ntev le caag koj maam le paab kuv?
Tug TSWV, koj ca le lug cawm kuas kuv dlim; koj txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov, txhaj yuav cawm tau kuv dlim ntawm txujkev tuag xwb.
Nyob huv tubtuag teb tsi muaj leejtwg ua koj tsaug le; hab puab tsi ncu qaab koj lawm.
Kuv qaug zug vim txujkev tu sab; kuv quaj txhua mo, ua rua kuv lub txaaj ntub kua muag taag, hab kuv lub hauv ncoo tsau rawv kuv tej kua muag.
Kuv rua tsi tau qhovmuag vim kuv txujkev tu sab, kuv quaj qhovmuag o taag vim kuv cov yeebncuab.
Mej cov kws yog tuabneeg ua phem ca le txaav kuas dleb ntawm kuv moog. Rua qhov tug TSWV tub nov kuv tej lug thov lawm;
Nwg noog kuv lub suab quaj thov nwg paab hab nwg yuav teb kuv tej lug thov.
Kuv cov yeebncuab yuav paub txug txujkev swb kws txaaj muag ntsuav; ces tuab plag ntshis xwb puab yuav raug lawv tsiv rov qaab.
Tug TSWV kws yog kuv tug Vaajtswv, kuv tuaj thov koj tiv thaiv kuv; thov koj cawm kuas kuv dlim ntawm cov tuabneeg kws caum nteg kuv,
lossis puab yuav dlua kuas kuv ndluag taag ib yaam le tsuv ntxhuav dlua, puab yuav caab kuv moog kuas tsi muaj leejtwg cawm tau.

Tug TSWV kws yog kuv tug Vaajtswv, yog kuv tau ua txhum rua leejtwg, yog kuv tau ntxeev sab rua kuv tug phoojywg, lossis kuv txhobtxwm ua limham rua kuv cov yeebncuab, yog kuv tau ua tej kev txhum nuav ib yaam twg lawm,
thov ca kuv cov yeebncuab caum hab nteg kuas tau kuv, ca puab muab kuv tua hab txav ua tej thooj povtseg. Tsi xob pub kuas kuv muaj sa nyob huv lub nplajteb nuav le.
Tug TSWV, ca le sawv tseeg nrug koj txujkev npautawg lug, thov sawv nreg nroog tawmtsaam kuv cov yeebncuab tej kev chim; koj ca le sawv lug paab kuv! Kev ncaaj nceeg yog koj saamfwm kuas muaj.
Ca le sau txhua tsaav tuabneeg lug nyob puagncig koj, hab nyob sau koj lub zwmtxwv kws nyob sau ntuj lug tswj  fwm puab.
Tug TSWV, koj yog tug kws txav txim rua tuabneeg, thov koj ca le txav txim ncaaj rua kuv, rua qhov koj paub has tas kuv tsi tau ua txhum dlaabtsi.

Koj yog Vaajtswv tug kws ncaaj nceeg, koj txav txim rua peb tej kev xaav kws peb lub sab ntshaw. Thov muab cov tuabneeg sab phem tej kev ua phem tshem moog hab muab nqe zug rua cov tuabneeg kws ua zoo.
Vaajtswv yog tug tiv thaiv kuv, nwg cawm cov tuabneeg kws fwm nwg.
Vaajtswv yog tug txav txim ncaaj nceeg hab rau txim tsi tseg rua cov tuabneeg kws ua phem ua qas.
Yog puab pheej tsi tso puab tej kev ua phem tseg, Vaajtswv yuav huv nwg raab ntaaj kuas ntse. Nwg yuav ntaa nwg raab neevnti hab npaaj tog tua xwb;
Nwg yuav npaaj nwg cov cuabyeej kws tua tuabneeg tuag, hab taw nwg tej xub vug nplaim tawg rua puab.
Saib maj, cov tuabneeg sab phem tsim kev phem kev qas lawm; puab nrhav kev ua phem hab xyum ua tej kws tsi ncaaj xwb.
Tabsis puab yuav poob taag rua huv lub qhov kws puab khawb cuab tog lwm tug kev.
Yog le ntawd, puab txhaj raug txim, vim puab tej kev phem kev qas, hab raug mob vim qhov kws puab hlaa txuj kevcai.
Kuv ua tug TSWV tsaug rua nwg txujkev ncaaj nceeg, kuv hu nkauj qhuas tug TSWV, tug kws nyob sau qhov chaw sab tshaaj plawg.
Tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Tswv, koj lub npe kws muaj fwjchim, nov thoob nplajteb! Tej lug kws peb qhuas koj yeej nrov moog nto sau ntuj lawm.
Tej mivnyuas yau hab mivnyuas mog puavleej hu nkauj qhuas koj. Koj nyob tso sab lug tsi ntshai koj tej yeebncuab, koj taav tau txhua tug kws ua phem rua koj txuj hauv kev.
Thaus kuv tsaa qhovmuag saib sau lub ntuj kws koj tsim ca, kuv pum lub hli hab tej nubqub kws koj muab teeb nyag nyob muaj nyag chaw.
Tuabneeg nplajteb tsimtxaj npaum le caag koj txhaj ncu txug puab; noobneej zoo npaum twg, koj txhaj hlub puab ua luaj?
Koj tsim puab lug ua tug yau ntawm koj; koj txhaj pub puab muaj fwjchim hab muaj meejmom.
Koj tsaa puab lug kaav txhua yaam kws koj tsim tseg; hab koj tsaa puab saib taagnrho txhua yaam tsaj kws koj tsim tseg:
tej yaaj, tej nyuj hab tej tsaj qus;
tej noog, tej ntseg hab txhua yaam tsaj kws nyob huv havtxwv huv tuabsi.
Tug TSWV kws yog peb tug TSWV, koj lub npe kws muaj fwjchim nyob thoob lub nplajteb nuav!
Tug TSWV, kuv ua koj tsaug kawg kuv lub sab; kuv yuav qha txug tej txujci tseemceeb kws koj ua paab kuv lawm.
Kuv yuav hu nkauj zoo sab vim muaj koj, kuv yuav hu nkauj qhuas koj kws yog Vaajtswv tug muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus.
Thaus koj tshwm plawg, kuv cov yeebncuab thim loo rov qaab, puab qaug pawg lug hab tuag taag lawm.
Koj tuaj kuv tog tsaa kuv cai, koj nyob ntawm koj lub zwmtxwv txav txim ncaaj nceeg.
Koj rau txim rua cov tuabneeg kws tsi fwm koj, hab rhuav tshem cov tuabneeg ua phem ua qas hab yuav tsi muaj leejtwg ncu txug puab moog ib txhis le lawm.
Peb cov yeebncuab yuav pluj taag moog ibtxhis, koj muab puab tej nroog rhuav puamtsuaj taag, tsi tshuav ib qho ua chaw ncu txug puab le lawm.
Tabsis tug TSWV ua vaajntxwv moog ibtxhis, nwg tub teeb nwg lub zwmtxwv ua qhov chaw txav txim.
Nwg kaav lub nplajteb ntawm txujkev ncaaj nceeg; nwg txav txim ncaaj nceeg rua txhua tsaav tuabneeg.
Tug TSWV yog lub chaw rua cov tuabneeg kws raug luas tsimtxom nkaum, hab yog lub chaw kaaj sab rua cov tuabneeg kws raug kev nyuaj sab.
Tug TSWV, txhua tug kws paub koj, puab yeej ca sab rua koj; koj yeej tsi muab ib tug twg kws lug cuag koj tso tseg le.
Ca le hu nkauj qhuas tug TSWV kws kaav sau lub roob Xi-oos! Ca le qha tej txujci kws nwg ua rua txhua tsaav tuabneeg paub.
Vaajtswv yeej ncu ntsoov txhua tug kws tiv kev txomnyem; nwg ncu ntsoov puab tej suab quaj, hab nwg rau txim rua cov tuabneeg kws tsimtxom puab.
Tug TSWV, thov hlub kuv lauj! Thov tsaa muag saib tej kev txomnyem kws kuv cov yeeb ncuab ua rua kuv. Tug TSWV, thov cawm kuas kuv dlim ntawm txujkev tuag.
Kuv txhaj muaj peevxwm moog sawv taabmeeg cov tuabneeg huv lub nroog Yeluxalees hab qha txhua yaam kws kuv qhuas koj rua puab noog. Kuv yuav zoo sab heev, vim koj cawm kuv dlim lawm.
Cov tuabneeg tsi ntseeg Vaajtswv poob rua huv lub qhov kws puab khawb tseg lawm, puab rov maag rooj ntaa npuj kws puab cuab tseg.
Tug TSWV qha nwg rua puab paub ntawm txujkev txav txim ncaaj nceeg; hab cov tuabneeg ua phem yuav maag rooj ntaa npuj kws yog puab teg num.
Cov tuabneeg sab phem yuav nkaag moog rua huv tubtuag teb, cov ntawd yog cov kws tsi leeg txais yuav Vaajtswv.
Cov tuabneeg txomnyem yuav tsi raug luas saib tsi taug moog ntxiv lawm; cov tuabneeg pluag kws taag kev ca sab yuav tsi raug kev tsimtxom moog ntxiv lawm.
Tug TSWV, thov koj ca le lug! Tsi xob pub tuabneeg kovyeej koj! Cov tuabneeg kws tsi ntseeg lug sawv taabmeeg koj, hab koj txav txim rua puab.
Tug TSWV, thov koj ca le ua kuas puab ntshai, ua kuas puab paub has tas, puab yog noobneej xwb.
Tug TSWV, vim le caag koj yuav nyob dleb ua luaj le? Vim le caag koj tsiv moog nkaum thaus peb raug kev txomnyem?
Cov tuabneeg sab phem khaavtheeb hab tsimtxom cov tuabneeg pluag; puab nteg tau cov tuabneeg pluag, thaus cov tuabneeg pluag poob qhov.
Cov tuabneeg sab phem khaavtheeb rua txujkev kws puab ntshaw ua phem ua qas. Cov tuabneeg sab hlub tsawm foom tug TSWV hab tsi leeg yuav nwg.
Cov tuabneeg sab phem yeej tsi quavntsej txug tug TSWV, vim puab txujkev khaavtheeb, puab txhaj xaav has tas “Tsi muaj Vaajtswv”.
Cov tuabneeg sab phem yeej vaammeej txhua yaam, tabsis puab tsi paub txug Vaajtswv txujkev txav txim, puab tsuas taab haaj luag puab cov yeebncuab plig xwb.
Puab rov has rua puab tas, “Peb yuav tsi qaug ib zag le; hab peb yuav tsi raug kev txomnyem hlo le.”
Puab has lug twm luas, dlaag luas hab has lug chob luas sab, puab has tej lug txaus ntxub hab tej lug phem lug qas xwb.
Puab moog nkaum huv tej zog hab tog tua tej tuabneeg tsi muaj txim. Puab nyaag nrhw tua cov tuabneeg txomnyem kws tsi muaj leejtwg paab,
Puab nkaum zuv tog luas ib yaam le tug tsuv ntxhuav. Puab zuv nteg cov tuabneeg pluag; puab nteg tau cov tuabneeg pluag thaus maag puab tej vuj hlua, hab muab hai moog povtseg.
Cov tuabneeg tsi muaj tug paab raug luas caij tsuj, cov tuabneeg txomnyem qaug vim cov tuabneeg sab phem tug zug.
Cov tuabneeg sab phem xaav has tas, “Vaajtswv yeej tsi quavntsej peb. Nwg tub qe qhovmuag lawm, nwg yeej tsi pum kuv le!”
Tug TSWV, ca le rau txim rua tug tuabneeg sab phem! Thov koj ncu ntsoov cov tuabneeg kws raug kev txomnyem!
Yog le caag tug tuabneeg sab phem txhaj thuam Vaajtswv, hab xaav has tas, “Vaajtswv yeej tsi rau txim rua kuv le.”

Tabsis koj yeej muaj qhovmuag pum, koj yeej mob sab txug kuv tej teebmeem hab tej kev txomnyem ntawd. Koj yeej npaaj rawv yuav paab. Cov tuabneeg kws tsi muaj leejtwg paab yuav lug cuag koj, koj yeej ibtxwm paab cov tuab- neeg kws raug txomnyem.
Ca le rhuav cov tuabneeg sab phem hab ua phem ua qas lub fwjchim; rau txim rua puab vim tej kev txhum kws puab ua moog txug thaus puab tso tseg.
Tug TSWV yog tug vaajntxwv kws nyob moog ibtxhis. Cov tuabneeg kws pe lwm tsaav tuabneeg tej vaajtswv, tug TSWV yuav muab ntab tawm huv nwg lub tebchaws moog.
Tug TSWV, koj yeej noog cov tuabneeg kws tsi muab hlub tej lug thov, koj yuav txhawb puab tug zug, kuas puab ua tau lub sab ntev.

Koj nov cov tuabneeg kws raug luas tsimtxom hab cov mivnyuas ntsuag tej suab quaj; nyaj koj yuav tuaj puab tog hab txav txim ncaaj rua puab, koj yuav txav txim ncaaj rua puab, kuas tuabneeg nplajteb tsi xob ua phem ntxiv lawm.
Kuv ca sab rua tug TSWV kws yog kuv qhov chaw tso sab. Yog le caag mej has rua kuv tas, “Koj ca le yaa ib yaam le tug noog moog rua sau tej roob.
Rua qhov cov tuabneeg sab phem ntaa puab tej neevnti hab tua huv qhov kws tsaus ntuj nti tuaj raug cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg.
Thaus kws txhua tsaav yaam qaug taag lawm, cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg ua tsi tau le caag.”
Tug TSWV nyob huv nwg lub Tuamtsev kws dlawbhuv; tug TSWV lub zwmtxwv nyob sau ntuj. Nwg pum tuabneeg nyob rua txhua qhov hab paub txhua yaam kws puab ua.
Tug TSWV sim cov tuabneeg sab zoo hab cov tuabneeg sab phem ib yaam nkaus; nwg ntxub cov tuabneeg kws ua nruj ua tsiv kawg le.
Nwg tso cov ncaig tawg cig ntsaa thuav ib yaam le naag lug rua cov tuabneeg sab phem; hab nwg tso khaub zeeg cua rau txim rua puab.
Tug TSWV yog tug ncaaj nceeg hab hlub cov tuabneeg kws ua zoo, cov tuabneeg kws ua zoo yuav moog nyob ntawm nwg lub xubndlag.
Tug TSWV, thov koj paab peb lauj! Tsi tshuav ib tug tuabneeg kws ua zoo seem nyob qhov twg le! Cov tuabneeg kws ncaaj nceeg tub pluj taag lawm.
Puab ib leeg dlaag ib leeg; puab ib leeg ntxag ib leeg ntawm tej lug mog lug muas.
Tug TSWV, thov koj muab tug nplaig kws txawj dlaag ntxag txav, hab ntsaws lub qhovncauj kws has lug khaavtheeb has tas,
“Peb xaav tau yaam twg, peb yeej tau yaam ntawd. Peb yuav has lawv le peb lub sab nyam los yeej tau, peb xaav yuav yaam dlaabtsi los tsi muaj leejtwg txwv peb le.”

Tug TSWV has tas, “Kuv yuav lug taamsim nuav ntaag, rua qhov cov tuabneeg txomnyem raug tsimtxom nyaav heev hab cov tuabneeg nyuaj sab quaj tu sab kawg le. Kuv yuav muab txujkev kws nyob tso sab lug kws puab tub tog lug ntev lawm rua puab.”
Tug TSWV tej lug cog tseg, yog tej kws ca sab tau, tej lug ntawd muaj nqes ib yaam le tej nyaj kws nchuav tawm huv lub yeejvub xyaa zag lug.
Cov tuabneeg sab phem nyob txhua qhov hab txhua tug puavleej nyam ua phem ua qas. Tug TSWV, thov tiv thaiv peb kuas peb tau kev kaaj sab, hab tsomkwm peb kuas dlim ntawm cov tuabneeg sab phem.
Tug TSWV, koj yuav tsi ncu qaab kuv moog txug nub twg? Moog ibtxhis le los? Koj tseem yuav tsiv kuv moog txug thaus twg?
Kuv tseem yuav tiv kev tsimtxom moog txug nub twg? Kuv lub sab yuav quaj ntsuag nruab nub hab mo ntuj moog txug nub twg? Kuv cov yeebncuab tseem yuav kovyeej kuv moog txug nub twg hab?
Tug TSWV kws yog kuv tug Vaajtswv, thov koj tsaa qhovmuag saib kuv hab teb kuv tej lug thov. Thov paab txhawb kuv tug zug hab tsi xob ca kuv tuag.
Kuv cov yeebncuab txhaj tsi tau has tas, “Peb yeej nwg lawm.” Tsi xob ca puab zoo sab thaus kuv poob tsaam.
Kuv ca sab rua koj txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov; kuv zoo sab heev rua qhov koj yuav cawm kuas kuv dlim.
Tug TSWV, kuv yuav hu nkauj qhuas koj, rua qhov koj yeej ua zoo rua kuv.
Cov tuabneeg ruag pheej xaav has tas, “Yeej tsi muaj Vaajtswv le!” Puab txhua tug puavleej yog tuabneeg txhum, puab ua phem ua qas tsi muaj ib tug ua zoo le.
Tug TSWV nyob sau ntuj saib ntsoov tuaj rua tuabneeg nplajteb, saib puas muaj leejtwg ua tuabneeg ntse hab pehawm nwg.
Tabsis puab puavleej ua txhum, puab txhua tug yog tuabneeg ua phem. Puab cov ntawd tsi muaj ib tug ua zoo hlo le, tsi muaj ib tug le.
Tug TSWV has tas, “Puab puas paub hab? Cov tuabneeg kws ua phem le nuav yog cov kws tsi quavntsej dlaabtsi le. Puab ua neej nyob nyag quas nrhw kuv tsaav tuabneeg tug noj, hab tsi ua kuv tsaug le.”
Tabsis puab yuav ntshai heev, rua qhov Vaajtswv yeej nrug nraim cov tuabneeg kws noog nwg lug.
Cov tuabneeg ua phem ua qas rhuav cov tuabneeg txu fwjchim tej homphaj, tabsis tug TSWV yog tug kws tsomkwm cov tuabneeg txu fwjchim.
Kuv thov Vaajtswv kuas muaj kev muaj yeej tuaj huv lub nroog Xi-oos tuaj rua cov Yixalayees. Thaus tug TSWV pub rua cov Yixalayees rov vaammeej, thaus ntawd puab yuav zoo sab heev.
Tug TSWV, leejtwg txhaj tsimnyog moog nyob huv koj lub Tuamtsev? Leejtwg txhaj yuav moog pehawm koj sau lub roob Xi-oos kws yog koj lub Roob Dlawbhuv?
Yog cov tuabneeg kws noog Vaajtswv lug txhua lu, ua ncaaj nceeg, has tej lug tseeb,
tsi has lug nkaug lwm tug, tsi ua txhum rua puab tej phoojywg, lossis tsi xyaav puab tej kwvtij zej zog moo.

Puab saib cov tuabneeg kws Vaajtswv muab tso tseg lawm tsi muaj nqes, tabsis puab fwm cov tuabneeg kws noog tug TSWV lug. Puab ua lawv le puab tej lug cog tseg, txawm nyuaj los xij, puab yuav tsi hloov sab le.
Puab qev nyaj rua luas tsi yuav paajlaum, hab puab tsi yuav tej nyaj kws luas coj tuaj xab, kuas tau chaw ntxo cov tuabneeg tsi txhum. Leejtwg ua zoo le nuav, nwg yuav tau nyob tso sab lug moog le.
Vaajtswv, thov koj tsomkwm kuv; kuv tso sab plhuav rua koj, rua qhov koj yog kuv lub chaw cawm sav.
Kuv has rua tug TSWV has tas, “Koj txhaj yog kuv tug TSWV; txhua yaam zoo kws kuv muaj puavleej yog koj pub.”
Cov tuabneeg kws muab lub sab npuab tug TSWV yog cov kws muaj koob meej, qhov kws zoo sab tshaaj plawg yog kuv tau nrug puab nyob ua ke.
Cov tuabneeg kws pe lwm tug vaajtswv, mas yog puab lob kev txomnyem lug rua puab xwb. Kuv yuav tsi nrug puab muab khoom hlawv fij; kuv yuav tsi pe puab tej vaajtswv.
Tug TSWV, koj yog txhua yaam kws kuv muaj, hab koj pub txhua yaam kws kuv xaav tau rua kuv; kuv lub neej yaav tom ntej nyob huv koj lub xibteg.
Kuv xaav tsi thoob rua tej kws tug TSWV pub rua kuv; tej ntawd zoo kawg le.
Kuv ua tug TSWV tsaug, rua qhov nwg coj kuv txuj hauv kev, hab mo ntuj los kuv lub sab pheej ntuag kuv tsi tseg.
Kuv yeej ncu ntsoov has tas, tug TSWV nrug nraim kuv; yeej tsi muaj ib yaam ua rua kuv ntshai, rua qhov nwg nyob ze kuv.
Yog le ntawd kuv txhaj zoo sab ua nwg tsaug, kuv tau nyob tso sab lug,
rua qhov koj tiv thaiv kuv, tsi pub raug kev pluj tuag, lossis tsi ca tug kws muab lub sab npuab koj moog rua huv tubtuag teb.
Koj yuav qha txujkev kws moog tau txujsa rua kuv, koj nrug nraim kuv, ua rua kuv txaus sab hab zoo sab moog ibtxhis.
Tug TSWV, thov koj noog tej lug kws kuv thov yuav kev ncaaj nceeg, thov koj tig qhovntsej noog kuv lub suab quaj kws thov koj paab! thov koj noog kuv tej lug thov kws yog lug tseeb.
Koj yuav txav txim ncaaj rua kuv, rua qhov koj yog tug paub qhov tseeb.
Koj yog tug paub kuv lub sab, thaus tsaus ntuj koj lug cuag kuv, koj tsi pum ib qhov phem kws kuv ua nyob huv kuv lub sab. Kuv tsi has lug phem
le luas tej; kuv fwm koj tej lug saamfwm, hab tsi taug txujkev kws cov tuabneeg yuam cai taug.
Kuv ibtxwm taug koj txujkev xwb, hab kuv yeej tsi yuam kev le.
Tug TSWV, kuv thov koj, rua qhov koj yeej yuav teb kuv tej lug thov; yog le ntawd, thov koj tig lug hab noog kuv tej lug thov.
Thov qha koj txujkev hlub kws luj kawg nkaus rua kuv hab cawm kuv; koj saab teg xis cawm cov tuabneeg kws tsiv puab cov yeebncuab.
Thov koj tiv thaiv kuv ib yaam le koj txuag koj ob lub qhovmuag, thov muab kuv zais rua huv qaab koj phob tis tug dluab ntxoov ntxoo,
kuas kuv tsi xob raug cov tuabneeg sab phem tua. Kuv cov yeebncuab kws xaav muab kuv tua kuas tuag nyob puagncig kuv;
puab has tej lug khaavtheeb hab tsi paub hlub leejtwg le.
Taamsim nuav puab nyob puag ncig kuv taag le lawm, puab saib ntsoov kuv hab yuav muab kuv thawb kuas qaug.
Puab zoo le cov tsuv ntxhuav kws zuv rawv tog tum kuv, puab xaav dlua kuv kuas ndluag ua tej dlaim.
Tug TSWV, thov koj ca le lug tawmtsaam kuv cov yeeb ncuab hab ua kuas puab swb! Thov siv koj raab ntaaj cawm kuv dlim ntawm cov tuabneeg sab phem txhais teg,

cawm kuas kuv dlim ntawm cov tuabneeg ntshaw khoom nplajteb. Thov siv tej kev txomnyem kws koj npaaj tseg lawm rau txim rua puab; thov tseg kuas txaus rua puab tej mivnyuas tseg ibtxha rua puab cov xeebntxwv!
Tabsis kuv yuav pum koj, rua qhov kuv tsi tau ua txhum; thaus kuv tsim lug, kuv yuav txaus sab heev, rua qhov kuv pum koj tim ntsej tim muag.
Tug TSWV, kuv hlub koj kawg le! Koj yog tug tiv thaiv kuv.

Tug TSWV yog tug tiv thaiv kuv; nwg yog kuv lub chaw faajxwm kws ruaj khov. Kuv tug Vaajtswv yog tug tiv thaiv kuv, kuv nrug nwg nyob kuv tso sab plhuav. Nwg tiv thaiv kuv ib yaam le dlaim thaiv nav ntaaj, nwg tiv thaiv kuv hab paab kuv dlim.
Kuv hu txug tug TSWV, nwg paab kuv dlim ntawm kuv cov yeebncuab. Ca le ua tug TSWV tsaug!
Kev tuag nyob puagncig kuv, kev puamtsuaj nphau nphwv tuaj tsuam kuv.
Kev tuag nyob puagncig kuv hab lub qhov ntxaa cuab lug tog kuv lawm.
Thaus kuv raug kev txomnyem kuv hu tug TSWV; kuv thov kuv tug Vaajtswv paab kuv. Nwg nyob huv nwg lub Tuamtsev nov kuv lub suab, nwg noog kuv lub suab quaj kws thov nwg paab.
Lub nplajteb txawm qeeg hab ua zug koog, tej taw roob cu ua zug koog, rua qhov Vaajtswv chim heev.
Paa tawg nchu auv nab huv nwg lub qhovntswg tuaj, nplaim tawg hab ncaig tawg cig laam lug huv nwg lub qhovncauj tuaj.
Tug TSWV qheb hlo lub ntuj hab nqeg nrug tauv fuab dlub tsaus nti ntawm nwg kutaw lug.
Nwg caij rawv sau tug qhelus phob tis hab yaa, nwg nyob sau nwg tug qhelus  phob tis yaa nrug cua ceev heev.
Nwg muab kev tsaus ntuj thaiv nwg lub cev, muaj fuab ntum nti hab muaj dlej puagncig nwg.
Lawg hab nplaim tawg tawm huv cov tsaglig xub lug tsoo fuab dlub tshaab plawg moog ua tug TSWV ntej.
Ces tug TSWV txhaj ua kuas xub nroo sau ntuj tuaj, hab nov tug kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus lub suab.
Nwg tua nwg xibxub tuaj hab ua rua nwg cov yeebncuab faib tawg ri sua, nwg ua xub laim ci ntsaa ab lawv puab tsiv.
Tug TSWV, thaus koj tshev koj cov yeebcuab, hab nyooj rua puab ntawm koj txujkev chim, txhaj ua rua qaab thu dlej havtxwv khoob lug, hab lub nplajteb nyob dlo dlus tsi muaj dlaabtsi thaiv.
Tug TSWV cev teg sau nruab ntug tuaj tuav kuv huv qaab thu nuav, nwg nqug kuv tawm huv qaab thu dlej qhov kws tub tshaaj plawg lug.
Nwg cawm kuv dlim ntawm kuv cov yeebncuab lub fwjchim, hab dlim ntawm cov tuabneeg kws ntxub kuv, rua qhov puab muaj zug dlua kuv.
Thaus kuv raug kev nyuaj sab, puab txawm tuaj ntaus kuv ntaag, tabsis tug TSWV tsomkwm kuv.
Nwg paab kuv tawm huv txujkev puamtsuaj, nwg cawm kuv, rua qhov nwg txaus sab rua kuv.
Tug TSWV muab nqe zug rua kuv, rua qhov kuv yeej ua ncaaj ua nceeg xwb, nwg foom koob moov rua kuv, rua qhov kuv tsi tau ua txhum dlaabtsi.
Kuv yeej fwm tug TSWV txuj kevcai, kuv tsi tsiv tawm ntawm kuv tug Vaajtswv hlo le.
Kuv yeej ua lawv le nwg tej kevcai qha, tsi muaj ib zag kws kuv yuav tsi noog nwg tej lug saamfwm le.
Nwg yeej paub kuv tsi tau ua txhum, kuv tswj nreeg kuv tsi ua ib qho txhum le.
Yog le ntawd, nwg txhaj muab nqe zug rua kuv, rua qhov kuv ua dlaabtsi los yeej ua ncaaj ua nceeg xwb.
Tug TSWV, koj yeej ua ncaaj nceeg rua cov tuabneeg kws ua ncaaj nceeg rua koj, koj ua zoo kawg nkaus rua cov tuabneeg kws tsi tau ua txhum.
Koj ua zoo rua cov tuabneeg kws ua zoo, tabsis koj ua yeebncuab rua cov tuabneeg kws ua phem.
Koj cawm cov tuabneeg kws txu fwjchim, tabsis koj txu cov tuabneeg khaavtheeb lub fwjchim.
Tug TSWV, koj ua lub teeb rua kuv pum kev, koj tshem qhov kws ua rua kuv tsaus ntuj nti.
Koj ua rua kuv muaj zug ntaus yeej kuv cov yeebncuab, hab koj lub fwjchim muaj peevxwm ntaus yeej cov cov kws tiv thaiv puab.
Tug Vaajtswv nuav teg num yeej zoo tshaaj plawg le. Nwg tej lug txhaj yog lug tseeb. Nwg yog dlaim thaiv nav ntaaj rua txhua tug kws moog cuag nwg.
Tug TSWV tuab leeg xwb txhaj yog Vaajtswv, Vaajtswv tuab leeg xwb txhaj yog tug tsomkwm peb.
Nwg yog tug Vaajtswv kws ua kuas kuv muaj zug, nwg yog tug ua kuas txujkev kws kuv taug muaj kev kaaj sab lug.
Nwg ua rua kuv ob txhais kutaw tsuj aav ntsa nkaus ib yaam le tug muaslwj, nwg tso kuv nyob kaaj sab lug sau tej roob.
Nwg qha kuas kuv txawj ntaus rog, yog le ntawd kuv txhaj muaj peevxwm tua tau raab neevnti kws muaj zug tshaaj plawg.
Tug TSWV, koj tau muab koj dlaim thaiv nav ntaaj kws yog kev cawm dlim rua kuv, hab koj saab teg xis tau cawm kuv dlim, hab koj paab kuv, kuv txhaj vaammeej.
Koj rhawv kev dlaav rua kuv taug, luas txhaj nteg tsi tau kuv; hab kuv tsi qaug ib zag le.
Kuv caum kuv cov yeebncuab hab nteg tau puab, kuv yeej tsi tso puab tseg moog txug thaus kuv muab puab tua puamtsuaj taag.
Kuv ntaus puab qaug taag huv tuabsi, hab puab tsi muaj peevxwm sawv tau lug le, puab swb hab qaug pawg lug ntawm kuv xubndlag.
Koj ua rua kuv muaj zug sis tua huv tshaav rog, pub kuv yeej taagnrho kuv cov yeebncuab.
Koj ua rua kuv cov yeebncuab tawg tsiv ri sua ntawm kuv moog, cov kws ntxub kuv, kuv yuav ua kuas puab puamtsuaj taag.
Puab quaj qw thov paab, tabsis tsi muaj leejtwg cawm puab le, puab thov tug TSWV, tabsis nwg tsi teb puab tej lug thov.
Kuv muab puab tswm ntsoog mog nyoos ib yaam le tej moov aav rua cua ntsawj moog povtseg, kuv tsuj puab ib yaam le tsuj tej aav nkus huv plawv kev.
Koj cawm kuv dlim ntawm tug tuabneeg kws ntxeev sab rua kuv hab tsaa kuv ua tug kaav txhua tsaav tuabneeg, tej tuabneeg kws kuv yeej ib txwm tsi tau paub dlua le, nwgnuav tau lug ua kuv qhev.
Cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws los puavleej tau tuaj qhau hau hawm kuv, thaus puab nov kuv lub moo, puab puavleej fwm kuv.
Puab taag kev ca sab, hab tawm ua ib ce tshee nyo huv puab tej chaw faajxwm lug.
Tug TSWV yog tug muaj sa nyob! Ua tsaug kws nwg yog tug tiv thaiv kuv! Thov kuas Vaajtswv kws yog kuv tug cawmseej tau koob meej luj tshaaj plawg.
Nwg paab kuv yeej taagnrho kuv cov yeebncuab, nwg ua kuas txhua tsaav tuabneeg fwm kuv
hab nwg cawm kuv dlim ntawm kuv cov yeebncuab. Tug TSWV, koj tau paab kuv tua yeej kuv cov yeebncuab, koj cawm kuv dlim ntawm cov tuabneeg limham.
Yog le ntawd, kuv txhaj ua koj tsaug tim ntsej tim muag ntawm txhua tsaav tuabneeg, kuv zoo sab hlo hu nkauj ua koj tsaug.
Vaajtswv pub rua nwg tug vaajntxwv tau txais kev muaj yeej luj kawg nkaus, nwg ua zoo rua Daviv tug kws nwg tau xaiv tseg lawm, hab nwg cov xeebntxwv moog ibtxhis tsi hloov le.
Sau nruab ntug tub ua rua peb pum Vaajtswv lub fwjchim tseeb, hab qha teg num kws nwg ua tav lawm rua peb paub.
Naj nub qha zaaj nuav ib nub dlhau ib nub, naj mo pav zaaj nuav ib mos dlhau rua ib mos.
Tsi has zaaj twg lossis lu twg, yeej tsi nov muaj suab dlaabtsi nrov le;
tabsis puab tej suab tseem nrov nchaa moog thoob plawg lub nplajteb hab nov moog txug ndlua qaab ntuj kawg. Sau nruab ntug yog lub tsev kws Vaajtswv ua rua lub nub nyob.
Thaus sawv ntxuv lub nub tawm tuaj ib yaam le tug nraug vauv kws tawm huv nwg lub txaaj lug, hab ib yaam le tug tuabneeg muaj zug moog sis tw dlha ntaag.
Lub nub tawm ib saab ntuj tuaj hab moog xaus rua ib saab ntuj. Tsis muaj ib yaam dlaabtsi yuav tsiv nkaum tau kuas tsi raug lub nub zab le.

Tug TSWV txuj kevcai yog txuj zoo tshaaj plawg, hab muaj peevxwm txhawb kuas muaj zug nchaav rov tuaj. Tug TSWV tej lug qha yog tej kws ca sab tau, hab ua rua tug kws muaj tswvyim tsawg txawj ntse tuaj.

Tug TSWV tej kevcai yeej yog tej kws ncaaj nceeg, hab cov tuabneeg kws fwm tej kevcai ntawd yuav tau txais kev kaaj sab lug. Tug TSWV tej lug qha puavleej yog tej lug tseeb hab ua rua tuabneeg paub qaabhau.
Fwm tug TSWV yog qhov kws zoo tshaaj plawg, hab nyob ruaj khov moog ibtxhis. Tug TSWV yeej txav txim ncaaj nceeg hab ua lawv le qhov tseeb.
Tej lug ntawd muaj nqes tshaaj tej tseem kub, hab tej lug ntawd qaab zib tshaaj tej tseem zib ntaab.
Tej lug ntawd ua rua kuv kws yog koj tug tubkhai muaj kev txawj ntse tuaj, kuv tau txais nqe zug vim yog kuv fwm tej kevcai ntawd ntaag.
Yeej tsi muaj leejtwg rov pum nwg txujkev txhum, tug TSWV, thov paab kuas kuv zaam dlhau tej kev txhum kws kuv pum tsi txug.

Hab dlua le ntawd, thov coj kuv tawm ntawm txujkev txhum kws lomtxwm moog ua txhum, hab thov tsi xob pub tej kev txhum ntawd kaav tau kuv. Kuv txhaj ua tau tuabneeg zoo hab dlim ntawm txujkev ua phem ua qas kws yog kev txhum.
Tug TSWV, koj yog kuv qhov chaw nkaum hab yog kuv tug cawmseej, thov kuas tej lug kuv has hab tej kws kuv xaav hum koj sab nyam.
Thov tug TSWV teb koj tej lug thov thaus koj muaj kev ntxhuv sab. Thov Yakhauj tug Vaajtswv tsomkwm koj.
Thov nwg tso kev paab huv nwg lub Tuamtsev tuaj paab koj, hab nwg yuav muab lub zug sau lub roob Xi-oos lug rua koj.
Thov nwg ncu txug tej khoom kws koj muab fij rua nwg, hab thov nwg txaus sab rua tej khoom theej txhoj kws koj muab hlawv fij rua nwg.
Thov nwg muab txhua yaam rua koj lawv le koj xaav tseg lawm, hab ua kuas txhua yaam kws koj npaaj sab lawm tav.
Ces peb yuav qw zoo sab vim koj yeej lawm; hab yuav ua kev zoo sab qhuas peb tug Vaajtswv. Thov tug TSWV teb tej lug kws koj thov lawv le koj xaav tau.

Nwgnuav kuv paub has tas, tug TSWV paab kuas tug vaajntxwv kws nwg xaiv tseg lawm yeej, tug Tswv teb nwg tej lug thov sau ntuj kws yog nwg qhov chaw dlawbhuv tuaj, nwg txhaj tau txais kev yeej luj kawg nkaus ntawm tug TSWV lub fwjchim.
Muaj qee leej ca sab rua puab tej tsheb neeg hab ibtxha ca sab rua puab tej neeg, tabsis peb ca sab rua tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv lub fwjchim.
Cov tuabneeg kws has nuav yuav dlawm hab qaug, tabsis peb yuav sawv nreg nroog khov kho.
Tug TSWV, thov paab kuas vaajntxwv muaj yeej. Thov koj teb  peb tej lug thaus peb tsaa ncauj thov koj.
Tug TSWV, vaajntxwv zoo sab kawg le, rua qhov koj pub rua nwg muaj zug luj zug nchaav, nwg zoo sab kawg rua qhov koj ua rua nwg yeej lawm tag.
Koj pub rua nwg lawv le nwg lub sab xaav tseg, hab koj tau teb nwg tej lug thov.
Koj foom koob moov nplua mag rua nwg hab muab lub mom kub lug rua nwg ntoo.
Nwg thov yuav txujsa los koj muab txujsa nyob ntev rua nwg.
Nwg muaj fwjchim luj kawg, rua qhov koj yog tug paab nwg, koj tau pub rua nwg muaj koob meej hab tsaa nwg ua vaajntxwv.
Koj foom koob moov rua nwg moog ibtxhis, hab ua rua nwg zoo sab tim ntsej tim muag ntawm koj.
Vaajntxwv ca sab rua tug TSWV kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus; vim tug TSWV muaj kev hlub ruaj khov, nwg yuav tsi hloov le.
Vaajntxwv yuav puav nteg kuas tau taagnrho nwg cov yeebncuab, nwg yuav nteg txhua tug kws pheej ntxub nwg.
Thaus koj tshwm lug koj yuav ua rua puab kub ib yaam le nplaim tawg. Tug TSWV yuav nqog kag puab thaus nwg chim, hab suavtawg yuav kub puab puamtsuaj taag.
Puab tej xeebntxwv los yuav tsi muaj ib tug seem nyob qhov twg le, vaajntxwv yuav muab puab tua povtseg kuas taag.
Puab npaaj sab hab tuavhuv nrhav kev ua phem rua nwg, tabsis puab yuav ua tsi tav.
Nwg yuav tua nwg cov xub vug rua puab hab ua rua puab tig tsiv tsi yeej rov qaab.
Tug TSWV, peb ua koj tsaug, rua qhov koj yog tug muaj zug luj zug nchaav. Peb yuav hu nkauj hab ua tsaug rua koj lub fwjchim.
Kuv tug Vaajtswv, kuv tug Vaajtswv, vim le caag koj tso kuv tseg lawm? Kuv tsaa suab quaj thov koj paab, tabsis koj tsi teb kuv tej lug thov.
Kuv tug Vaajtswv, kuv thov koj taag los koj tsi teb, thaus tsaus ntuj kuv thov koj ib mos tsi tu le.
Txawm yog le ntawd los koj tseem yog tug dlawbhuv kws nyob sau koj lub zwmtxwv hab yog tug kws cov Yixalayees suavdlawg qhuas.
Peb cov yawmkoob puavleej ca sab rua koj tuab leeg xwb, puab yeej ibtxwm ca sab rua koj, hab koj yeej ibtxwm paab puab dlim.
Puab thov koj paab, hab koj cawm puab dlim ntawm tej kev puamtsuaj, puab ca sab rua koj hab tsi raug txaajmuag.
Tabsis kuv tsi yog tuabneeg lawm, kuv yog kaas xwb, txhua tug ntxub hab ntu quavncaug rua kuv.
Txhua tug kws pum kuv puavleej luag kuv nplig, puab hlauv nplaig hab cu hau nto rua kuv.
Puab has tas, “Koj tub ca sab rua tug TSWV lawm ne, ua caag nwg tseem tsi paab koj hab? Yog tug TSWV yeej nyam koj tag, vim le caag nwg tsi paab koj?”
Koj yog tug coj kuv tawm huv kuv nam plaab lug tsi raug xwm dlaabtsi, thaus kuv tseem mog lab, koj tsomkwm kuv ntawm kuv nam lub xubndlag.
Kuv yeej ibtxwm ca sab rua koj txij nub kws yug tau kuv lug, hab koj yeej ibtxwm yog kuv tug Vaajtswv.
Thov koj tsi xob nyob nrug dleb ntawm kuv! Tej kev txomnyem tub lug ze kuv lawm, hab tsi muaj leejtwg paab kuv le.
Yeebncuab nyob puagncig kuv ib yaam le paab txiv nyuj, taagnrho puab puavleej nyob vij vog kuv, ib yaam le paab txiv nyuj tom tebchaws Npasaas.
Puab rua puab tej qhovncauj luj heev rua kuv, ib yaam le tsuv ntxhuav nyooj yuav tum hab dlua kuv.
Kuv tug zug ntaug taag, ib yaam le cov dlej kws nchuav ntxaum rua huv aav lawm. Kuv tej pob qej txhaa pluam taag huv tuabsi lawm, kuv lub sab yaaj ua kua taag ib yaam le tej cab ntaab.
Kuv lub qaa  qhuav qhawv ib yaam le tej moov aav, hab kuv tug nplaig lu nkaus rua sau qaab yag lawm. Koj tso kuv tuag xyaab leeg rua huv cov moov aav.
Muaj ib paab tuabneeg ua phem nyob puagncig kuv, zoo ib yaam le paab dlev kws taabtom dlha cuag tug tsi tuaj ze kuv lawm, puab dlua  kuv tej teg taw.
Kuv yeej pum taagnrho kuv tej pobtxhaa, kuv cov yeebncuab saib ntsoov kuv hab ua qhovmuag nruj nreeg rua kuv.
Puab muab kuv tej rig tsho coj moog twv hab coj moog sis faib.
Tug TSWV, thov tsi xob nyob nrug dleb kuv! Ca le maaj nroog lug paab kuas kuv dlim!
Cawm kuas kuv dlim ntawm raab nav ntaaj, cawm kuas kuv txujsa dlim ntawm cov dlev nuav.
Paab kuas kuv dlim ntawm cov tsuv ntxhuav nuav, hab cawm kuas kuv dlim ntawm cov nyuj qus tej kub.
Kuv yuav qha tej txujci kws koj tau ua lawm rua kuv cov pejxeem paub, thaus puab tuaj sis sau ua ke, kuv yuav ua koj tsaug le nuav:
“Mej cov kws yog tug TSWV cov tubkhai, ca le ua nwg tsaug! Mej cov kws yog cov Yixalayees tej xeebntxwv, ca le fwm nwg! Mej cov kws yog tuabneeg Yixalayees, mej ca le pehawm nwg!
Nwg tsi tau muab cov tuabneeg pluag tso povtseg lossis tsi quavntsej tej kev txomnyem kws puab raug, nwg tsi tau tig tsiv tso puab povtseg, tabsis nwg yeej teb puab tej lug thov thaus puab thov nwg.”

Thaus suavdlawg tuaj txoos ua ke txhij lawm, kuv yuav ua koj tsaug rua tej txujci kws koj tau ua taag lug. Kuv yuav muab tej khoom theej txhoj kws kuv coglug tseg lawm lug fij rua koj taabmeeg ib tsoom suavdlawg kws tuaj pehawm koj.
Cov tuabneeg pluag yuav tau noj tsau npo lawv le puab xaav noj, txhua tug kws lug cuag tug TSWV yuav ua nwg tsaug. Thov kuas puab muaj kev vaammeej moog ibtxhis.
Txhua tsaav tuabneeg yuav ncu ntsoov tug TSWV. Tej tuabneeg kws nyob txhua qhov huv qaab ntuj nuav yuav lug cuag nwg, mas txhua tsaav tuabneeg yuav pehawm nwg.
Tug TSWV yog Vaajntxwv, nwg kaav txhua tsaav tuabneeg.
Txhua tug tuabneeg kws khaavtheeb yuav qhau cev hlo pe nwg, txhua tug tuabneeg kws txawj tuag yuav qhau cev hlo ntawm nwg xubndlag pe nwg.
Yaav tom ntej nuav txhua tam tuabneeg yuav txhawb nqaa nwg, tej tuabneeg suavdlawg yuav qha tug TSWV zaaj rua tam tuabneeg kws yuav lug tom ntej.
Yuavtsum qha rua cov kws tseem tsi tau yug lug kuas paub has tas, “Tug TSWV yog tug cawm nwg tsaav tuabneeg.”
Tug TSWV yog tug tsomkwm kuv, kuv muaj txhua yaam txaus,
nwg ca kuv su huv lub tshaav kws muaj zaub mog nyoos ntsuab xab hab nwg coj kuv moog rua ntawm lub paag dlej ntshab kws nyob ntsag tu.
Nwg txhawb kuv tug zug. Nwg coj kuv taug txujkev ncaaj nceeg lawv le nwg coglug tseg.
Tug TSWV, txawm yog kuv taug txujkev kws tsaus ntuj nti los kuv tsi ntshai dlaabtsi, rua qhov koj nrug nraim kuv. Koj tug paas hab tug cwj nreg tsomkwm kuv.
Koj npaaj rooj noj rooj haus rua kuv, taabmeeg kuv cov yeebncuab; koj tog txais kuv ib yaam le tug qhua kws koj saib hlub, hab koj laub rua kuv lub khob puv nplua mag.
Kuv paub has tas koj yog tug zoo tshaaj plawg hab hlub kuv moog taag kuv tam neej, hab kuv yuav nyob huv kuv tug TSWV lub tsev moog taag kuv lub neej.
Lub nplajteb hab txhua tsaav yaam kws nyob huv lub qaab ntuj nuav puavleej yog tug TSWV le, lub nplajteb hab txhua tug kws nyob huv lub nplajteb puavleej yog nwg tug huv tuabsi.
Nwg tsim lub nplajteb rua sau dlej havtxwv, nwg pua thoob plawg huv qaab thu dlej.
Leejtwg txhaj moog tau rua sau tug TSWV lub roob? Leejtwg txhaj moog tau rua huv nwg lub Tuamtsev kws dlawbhuv?
Cov tuabneeg kws tau moog rua huv, yog cov ua ncaaj hab ua zoo, yog cov kws tsi pe dlaab tsi pe mlom lossis tsi coglug tsi tseeb.
Tug TSWV yuav foom koob moov rua puab cov ntawd, hab yuav cawm kuas puab dlim, Vaajtswv yuav has tas puab yog cov tuabneeg tsi muaj txim.
Cov tuabneeg nuav yog cov kws lug cuag Vaajtswv lawm, puab yog cov kws lug sawv taabmeeg ntawm Yakhauj tug Vaajtswv.
Muab tej roojvaag qheb kuas dlaav fo, muab tej qhovrooj qub thaus u qheb ca, tug vaajntxwv kws muaj fwjchim yuav tuaj rua huv.
Leejtwg yog tug vaajntxwv kws muaj fwjchim? Nwg yog tug TSWV kws muaj zug hab muaj fwjchim, yog tug TSWV kws ntaus yeej rog.
Muab tej roojvaag qheb kuas dlaav fo, muab tej qub qhovrooj thaus u qheb ca, tug vaajntxwv kws muaj fwjchim luj yuav tuaj rua huv.
Leejtwg yog tug vaajntxwv kws muaj fwjchim? Tug TSWV kws muaj yeej yog tug Vaajntxwv kws muaj fwjchim ntawd.
Tug TSWV, kuv tsaa ncauj thov koj,
kuv tug Vaajtswv, kuv ca sab ntsoov rua koj. Thov cawm kuas kuv dlim tsi xob pub kuv raug kev txaajmuag rua cov tuabneeg kws yeej kuv, thov tsi xob ca kuv cov yeebncuab saib tsi taug kuv.
Cov kws ca sab rua koj yeej tsi muaj ib tug swb hlo le, tabsis cov kws tawmtsaam koj, yog cov yuav swb ntaag.
Tug TSWV, thov qha kuas kuv paub koj txujkev, qha kuas kuv paub tej kev nuav tseeb.
Qha kuas kuv ua neej lawv le koj txujkev tseeb, rua qhov koj yog kuv tug Vaajtswv kws cawm kuv dlim. Kuv yeej ibtxwm ca sab rua koj.
Tug TSWV, thov ncu ntsoov koj txujkev sab dlawb sab zoo hab txujkev hlub ruaj khov kws koj tau qha rua peb thaus u lug lawm.
Thov zaam txim rua kuv tej kev txhum hab tej kws kuv tau ua yuam kev thaus kuv tseem hluas. Tug TSWV, koj yog tug muaj kev hlub hab sab dlawb kws tsi hloov le, thov koj ncu ntsoov kuv.
Rua qhov tug tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg txhaj yog tug muaj lub sab zoo, nwg qha cov tuabneeg txhum kuas puab paub txug txujkev kws tsimnyog puab taug.
Nwg coj cov tuabneeg txu fwjchim taug txujkev tseeb, hab qha kuas puab ua hum nwg sab.
Vim tug TSWV txujkev ncaaj nceeg hab txujkev hlub, nwg txhaj coj txhua tug kws ua lawv le nwg txujlug cog tseg, hab noog nwg tej lug saamfwm.
Tug TSWV, thov koj ncu ntsoov koj tej lug cog tseg, hab thov koj zaam kuv tej kev txhum, rua qhov kuv tej kev txhum ntawd ntau kawg le.
Cov tuabneeg kws fwm tug TSWV, nwg yuav qha kuas puab paub taug txujkev tseeb kws tsimnyog puab taug.
Puab yuav vaammeej hab puab tej mivnyuas yuav tau lub tebchaws nuav nyob ua puab tug moog le.
Tug TSWV nrug cov kws fwm nwg ua phoojywg, hab nwg qha kuas puab paub nwg tej lug cog tseg.
Txhua lub sijhawm kws kuv tsaa qhovmuag saib tug TSWV, nwg yeej cawm kuv dlim ntawm txujkev puamtsuaj.
Tug TSWV, thov tig lug rua ntawm kuv hab hlub kuv, rua qhov kuv nyuaj sab hab qaug zug kawg le.
Thov tshem kuv tej kev nyuaj sab hab cawm kuas kuv dlim ntawm kuv tej kev ntxhuv sab.
Thov koj nrug saib kuv tej kev ntxhuv sab hab kev txomnyem, hab thov zaam kuv tej kev txhum huv tuabsi.
Thov koj tsaa qhovmuag saib kuv cov yeebncuab saib coob npaum le caag, hab saib puab ntxub kuv npaum le caag?
Thov koj tsomkwm kuv hab cawm kuas kuv dlim, hab paab kuas kuv tsi xob swb luas hlo le. Kuv lug cuag koj hab vaamkhom koj paab kuv.
Thov kuas kuv teg num zoo hab kuv tej kev ncaaj nceeg tsomkwm kuv, rua qhov kuv ca sab rua koj xwb.
Vaajtswv, thov cawm koj tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees kuas dlim ntawm tej kev txomnyem kws puab raug!
Tug TSWV, thov qha rua suavdlawg has tas, kuv tsi tau ua txhum, rua qhov kuv ibtxwm ua lub neej ncaaj nceeg hab ca sab rua koj xwb.
Tug TSWV, thov koj sim hab ntsuag kuv; thov tshuaj kuv lub sab hab kuv txujkev xaav.
Kuv naj nub pum koj txujkev hlub hab koj txujkev ncaaj nceeg coj kuv txuj hauv kev.
Kuv tsi nrug cov tuabneeg kws tsi tsimtxaj koom ua ib lub sab, kuv tsi tau nrug cov tuabneeg ntsejmuag ncaaj sab nkhaus ua ib yaam dlaabtsi.
Kuv ntxub cov tuabneeg kws sis sau moog ua kev phem kev qas, hab kuv zaam kev rua cov tuabneeg sab phem.
Tug TSWV, kuv ntxuav kuv ob txhais teg qha has tas kuv tsi tau ua txhum, hab kuv moog pehawm koj ib ncig ntawm koj lub thaaj.
Kuv hu ib zaaj nkauj ua koj tsaug hab yuav pav koj tej txujci tseemceeb huv tuabsi rua suavdlawg noog.
Tug TSWV, kuv nyam lub tsev kws yog koj qhov chaw nyob, hab qhov chaw kws koj lub fwjchim nyob kawg le.
Thov tsi xob ua rua kuv raug kev puamtsuaj nrug cov tuabneeg muaj txim, thov tshem kuv tawm ntawm cov tuabneeg kws tua tuabneeg,
cov tuabneeg kws ua kev phem kev qas txhua lub sijhawm, hab pheej yuav luas tej nyaj xab.
Tabsis kuv yuav ua ncaaj ua nceeg xwb, thov hlub kuv hab cawm kuas kuv dlim!
Kuv dlim ntawm txhua yaam kev puamtsuaj, kuv yuav ua tug TSWV tsaug taabmeeg cov tuabneeg coob coob kws tuaj txoos ua ke nuav.
Tug TSWV yog lub teeb rua kuv pum kev hab yog kuv tug cawmseej, kuv yuav tsi ntshai leejtwg le. Tug TSWV tsomkwm kuv, kuv txhaj tsi raug kev puamtsuaj, kuv yuav tsi ntshai dlaabtsi le.
Thaus cov tuabneeg sab phem tuaj ntaus kuv hab soj tua kuv povtseg, puab yuav dlawm hab qaug.
Txawm yog ib paab tubrog tuaj vij hlo kuv los kuv yuav tsi ntshai, txawm yog yeebncuab tuaj tawmtsaam kuv los kuv tseem ca sab rua Vaajtswv.

Kuv tsuas thov tug TSWV pub ib yaam rua kuv xwb, yaam kws kuv xaav yuav yog kuv xaav nyob huv tug TSWV lub tsev moog taag kuv simneej, kuv xaav tsi thoob rua tej kws nwg ua zoo hab kuv yuav thov nwg ua tug coj kuv txuj hauv kev.
Thaus kuv raug kev ntxhuv sab, nwg yog kuv qhov chaw vaamkhom, nwg yuav tsomkwm kuv huv nwg lub Tuamtsev hab nwg ua lub chaw khov kho sau lub roob tsuas kws sab rua kuv nyob.

Yog le ntawd, kuv yuav yeej taagnrho kuv cov yeebcuab kws nyob puagncig kuv. Kuv yuav fij tej khoom theej txhoj huv lub Tuamtsev nrug tej suab qw zoo sab, kuv yuav hu nkauj hab kuv yuav ua tug TSWV tsaug.
Tug TSWV, thov koj noog kuv lub suab thaus kuv tsaa ncauj thov koj! Thov koj hlub kuv hab teb kuv tej lug thov.
Thaus koj has tas, “Ca le lug pehawm kuv,” kuv teb has tas, “Tug TSWV, kuv yuav lug cuag koj.”

Thov koj tsi xob tsiv nkaum kuv! Thov koj tsi xob chim rua kuv, hab tsi xob ntab koj tug tubkhai tawm. Koj yeej ibtxwm paab kuv lug lawm, thov tsi xob tsiv tawm ntawm kuv moog hab tsi xob tso kuv povtseg, Vaajtswv, koj yog kuv tug Cawmseej.
Kuv nam hab kuv txiv yeej tso taug kuv tseg, tabsis tug TSWV yuav tsomkwm kuv.
Tug TSWV, thov qha kuv ua lawv le tej kws koj xaav kuas kuv ua, hab coj kuv taug txujkev kws kaaj sab, rua qhov kuv muaj yeebncuab coob heev.
Thov tsi xob muab kuv tso rua kuv cov yeebncuab, nyob tsaam puab muab tej lug dlaag hab tej lug hem lug tawmtsaam kuv.
Kuv paub tseeb has tas, kuv tseem yuav tau ua neej nyob saib ntsoov tug TSWV teg num zoo thaus tsi tau taag kuv simneej.
Ca sab rua tug TSWV. Ca le ntseeg tsi xob poob sab. Ca sab hlo rua tug TSWV.

Tug TSWV, koj yog tug kws tiv thaiv kuv, kuv hu koj paab kuv. Thov noog kuv lub suab thov! Yog koj tsi teb kuv, ces kuv yuav zoo ib yaam le cov tuabneeg kws taug kev kaaj nab moog rua huv tubtuag teb.
Thov tig qhovntsej noog kuv lub suab thaus kuv quaj thov koj paab, hab thaus kuv tsaa teg thov tuaj rua ntawm koj lub Tuamsev kws dlawbhuv.
Thov tsi xob coj kuv moog rau txim nrug cov tuabneeg muaj txhum, cov tuabneeg ua phem ua qas, hab cov tuabneeg kws has lug zoo, tabsis kev ntxub ntxaug puv nkaus huv puab lub sab.

Rau txim rua puab lawv le tej kws puab tub ua taag lug lawm, rau txim rua puab tej kev txhum kws puab ua. Rau Txim rua txhua teg num kws puab ua taag lug, muab rua puab kuas tsimnyog qhov kws puab ua.
Rua qhov puab txhobtxwm tsi leeg tej kws tug TSWV tub ua taag lug lawm, lossis tej kws nwg tau tsim, yog le ntawd nwg txhaj yuav rau txim rua puab hab ua kuas puab puamtsuaj moog ibtxhis.
Ca le qhuas tug TSWV, nwg yeej nov kuv lub suab quaj qw thov kuas nwg paab.
Tug TSWV tsomkwm hab tiv thaiv kuv, kuv ca sab rua nwg xwb. Nwg paab kuv hab ua rua kuv zoo sab kawg nkaus le, kuv txhaj zoo sab hu nkauj qhuas nwg.
Tug TSWV tsomkwm nwg tsaav tuabneeg, nwg tiv thaiv hab cawm tug vaajntxwv kws nwg xaiv tseg lawm,
Tug TSWV, thov cawm koj tsaav tuabneeg kuas dlim, hab foom koob moov rua cov tuabneeg kws yog koj tug. Koj ua puab tug tswv yug yaaj hab tsomkwm puab moog ibtxhis le.
Mej cov kws yog tuabneeg qaum ntuj, ca le qhuas tug TSWV tug tshwjchim hab nwg lub fwjchim.
Qhuas tug TSWV lub npe kws muaj tshwjchim, qhau cev hlo rua ntawm tug Dlawbhuv lub xubndlag thaus nwg tshwm lug.
Tug TSWV lub suab nrov qeeg nkawg sau tej nplaim dlej havtxwv, Vaajtswv tug tshwjchim ua xub nroo hab nwg lub suab nrov qeeg nkawg thoob plawg sau nplaim dlej havtxwv.
Tug TSWV lub suab muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus, tug TSWV lub suab yog suab muaj fwvxyeej heev.
Tug TSWV lub suab tsoo tej ntoo cab luv taag, txawm yog tej ntoo cab peg roob Roob Lenpanoos los yeej luv huv tuabsi.
Nwg ua rua tej roob peg Lenpanoos dlha cuag le tej mivnyuas nyuj, hab ua rua lub Roob Helimoos dlha cuag le tug nyuj qus.
Tug TSWV lub suab ua rua muaj nplaim tawg cig laam lug.
Nwg lub suab ua rua taj suabpuam qeeg ua zug koog, nwg muab lub taj suabpuam Nkades cu ua zug thoob plawg.
Tug TSWV lub suab ua rua tej ntoo qheb  cu ua zug taag, hab nplawm tej nplooj ntoos zeeg taag. Thaus ntawd suavdlawg moog nyob huv nwg lub Tuamtsev qw has tas, “Thov kuas tug TSWV tau koob meej!”
Tug TSWV yog tug kaav taagnrho tej dlej tub huv tuabsi, nwg yog tug vaajntxwv kws kaav moog ibtxhis.
Tug TSWV muab tug zug luj zug nchaav rua nwg tsaav tuabneeg, hab foom koob moov rua puab kuas muaj kev thaajyeeb lug.
Tug TSWV, kuv ua koj tsaug, rua qhov koj yog tug cawm kuv dlim, hab koj tsi pub kuv cov yeebncuab nyos tau kuv.
Tug TSWV, kuv tug Vaajtswv, kuv quaj thov koj paab kuv, hab koj tau khu kuv zoo hlo,
koj tau coj kuv tawm huv txujkev tuag lug; kuv tub taug txujkev moog rua huv lub qhov kws tub heev, tabsis koj pub kuv rov tau txujsa tshab.
Taagnrho nwg tsaav tuabneeg kws ncaaj nceeg, ca le hu nkauj qhuas tug TSWV! Mej ncu ntsoov nwg lub npe kws yog tug Dlawbhuv hab ua nwg tsaug moog le.
Nwg txujkev chim tsuas nyob ib plag xwb, nwg txujkev ua zoo nyob moog tsi paub kawg le. Thaus tsaus ntuj muaj kev quaj ntsuag, tabsis thaus kaaj ntug muaj kev zoo sab.
Thaus kuv tau zoo nyob kaaj sab kuv xaav has tas, “Kuv yuav tsi swb luas ib zag le.”
Tug TSWV, koj ua zoo kawg nkaus rua kuv, koj tsomkwm kuv ib yaam le lub roob kws ruaj khov. Tabsis thaus koj tsiv nkaum kuv lawm, ua rua kuv ntshai kawg le.
Tug TSWV, kuv tsaa ncauj hu koj, kuv thov koj paab kuv le nuav:

“Yog kuv tuag lawm puas yuav muaj nqes rua koj? Yog kuv moog rua huv qhov tuag lawm yuav muaj nqes rua koj los? Cov tuabneeg tuag puas qhuas tau koj lawm? Puab puas moog qha tau koj txujkev zoo kws tsi txawj puamtsuaj le?
Tug TSWV, thov noog kuv lub suab hu hab taabncuab kuv! Tug TSWV, thov paab kuv!”
Koj muab kuv txujkev nyuaj sab hloov ua kev zoo sab dlha seev cev, koj muab kuv tej kev tu sab tshem moog povtseg huv tuabsi lawm, hab koj pub kev zoo sab lug nyob puagncig kuv.
Yog le ntawd, kuv txhaj tsi nyob ntsag tu, kuv yuav hu nkauj qhuas koj. Tug TSWV, koj yog kuv tug Vaajtswv, kuv yuav ua koj tsaug moog ibtxhis tsi kawg.
Tug TSWV, kuv lug cuag koj, thov koj tsomkwm kuv, thov tsi xob ca kuv swb luas hlo le. Kuv tsaa ncauj thov koj, koj yog tug Vaajtswv kws ncaaj nceeg, thov koj paab kuas kuv dlim!
Thov noog kuv lub suab thov! Paab kuas kuv dlim taamsim nuav lauj! Thov koj ua kuv lub chaw cawm sav hab tsomkwm kuv, koj yog tug tiv thaiv kuv hab paab kuv dlim.
Koj yog kuv qhov chaw cawm sav hab yog tug tiv thaiv kuv, thov qha kuv hab coj kuv txuj hauv kev lawv le koj tau coglug tseg lawm.
Thov paab kuas kuv tsi xob moog poob lub qhov kws luas khawb tog kuv kev, thov koj tsomkwm kuv tsi xob pub kuv raug tej kev puamtsuaj.
Kuv thov muab taagnrho kuv lub cev rua koj ua tug tsomkwm. Tug TSWV, koj yeej yuav paab kuas kuv dlim, koj yog tug Vaajtswv kws ncaaj nceeg.
Koj ntxub cov tuabneeg kws pe tej vaajtswv cuav, tabsis kuv ca sab rua koj xwb.
Kuv yuav txaus sab hab zoo sab rua koj txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov. Koj pum kuv tej kev txomnyem, koj paub kuv tej kev ntxhuv sab huv tuabsi.
Koj tsi pub kuv cov yeebncuab nteg tau kuv, koj pub kuv moog tau txhua qhov lawv le kuv xaav moog.
Tug TSWV, thov koj taabncuab kuv, rua qhov kuv muaj kev ntxhuv sab; kuv qhovmuag qheb tsi taug vim kuv quaj heev, kuv qaug zuj zig tsi muaj ib qho zug le.

Tej kev tu sab ua rua kuv twg kev lawm, hab kev quaj ntsuag ua rua kuv txujsa tuab lu kawg nkaus. Muaj tej kev nyuaj sab ntawd txhaj ua rua kuv tsaug muas ua luaj, txawm yog kuv tej pobtxhaa los tsi muaj zug taag le lawm.

Kuv tej yeebncuab txhua tug saib tsi taug kuv, kuv tej phoojywg zej zog yimfuab thuam hab luag kuv plig, cov tuabneeg kws ibtxwm paub kuv los ntshai kuv, thaus puab pum kuv nyob ntawm tej kev, puab tshuv kev tsiv.
Suavdlawg xaam tsi muaj kuv ib yaam le kuv tub tuag lawm, kuv zoo ib yaam le tej khoom kws luas muab povtseg lawm.
Kuv nov tej yeebncuab sis ntxhi zum zawg; tej kev txhawj ntshai nyob puagncig kuv. Puab tuav tswvyim tawmtsaam kuv hab ntxeev sab yuav muab kuv tua.
Tug TSWV, koj yog kuv tug Vaajtswv, kuv yeej ca sab ntsoov rua koj xwb,
koj naj nub tsomkwm kuv; thov cawm kuas kuv dlim ntawm kuv cov yeebncuab, hab dlim ntawm cov tuabneeg kws tsimtxom kuv.
Kuv yog koj tug tubkhai, thov ua zoo rua kuv, thov koj txujkev hlub kws tsi hloov le cawm kuas kuv dlim.
Tug TSWV, kuv tsaa ncauj hu koj, thov tsi xob pub kuv poob ntsejmuag. Thov kuas cov tuabneeg sab phem poob ntsejmuag, thov kuas puab ca le moog ntsag tu rua huv tubtuag teb.
Thov muab cov tuabneeg khaavtheeb kws pheej thuam hab tsi quavntsej tej tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg lub qhovncauj pus kuas nyob ntsag tu!
Tej kws koj npaaj tseg rua cov tuabneeg fwm koj mas zoo kawg nkaus, txhua tug paub has tas koj yog tug zoo kawg nkaus le, koj tsomkwm cov tuabneeg kws ca sab rua koj tsi pub ib tug pluj le.

Koj muab puab zais rua ntawm koj lub xubndlag kws yog qhov chaw kaaj sab lug, kuas puab dlim ntawm cov tuabneeg tuavhuv ua phem; koj muab puab zais rua ntawm qhov chaw kws nyob tso sab plhuav tsi raug puab cov yeebncuab thuam.
Ua tug TSWV tsaug! Nwg ua rua kuv pum nwg txujkev hlub kws luj kawg nkaus, thaus kws cov yeebncuab tuaj vij kuv hab puav nteg kuv.
Kuv ntshai hab xaav has tas, nwg ntab kuv tawm ntawm nwg lub xubndlag moog lawm. Tabsis nwg tseem nov kuv lub suab quaj, thaus kuv thov nwg paab.
Txhua tug kws muab sab npuab tug TSWV, ca le fwm nwg. Tug TSWV tsomkwm cov tuabneeg kws muab sab npuab nwg, tabsis nwg rau txim rua cov tuabneeg kws khaavtheeb lawv le puab tsimnyog raug.
Mej cov kws ca sab rua tug TSWV, mej ca le cuab zug khov kho hab ua sab tawv qhawv.
Cov tuabneeg kws tau nyob kaaj sab lug yog cov kws tug TSWV tsi suav has tas muaj txim, rua qhov nwg tub zaam puab lub txim lawm.
Tug tuabneeg kws tau nyob kaaj sab lug, yog tug kws tug TSWV tsi suav has tas, nwg tau ua txhum, hab nwg tsi ua tuabneeg dlaag ntxag.
Thaus kuv tsi leeg kuv tej kev txhum, kuv tsi muaj zug, rua qhov kuv quaj taag nub.
Tug TSWV, koj rau txim rua kuv nruab nub hab mo ntuj, kuv tug zug yaaj ntshis ib yaam le tej fws lub caij ntuj qhua kws tshaav ntuj zab qhuav lawm.

Thaus ntawd kuv leeg kuv tej kev txhum rua koj, kuv tsi zais tej kws kuv ua txhum ib qho le, kuv txhaj leeg kuv tej kev txhum huv tuabsi rua koj, hab koj zaam taagnrho kuv tej txhum txhum huv tuabsi moog.
Yog le ntawd, thov ca cov tuabneeg kws fwm koj thov koj thaus puab xaav kuas koj paab, thaus muaj kev txomnyem fuam tuaj, tej ntawd yuav lug tsi txug puab.
Koj yog kuv lub chaw nkaum, koj yuav cawm kuas kuv dlim ntawm txujkev puamtsuaj. Kuv txhaj hu nkauj nrov nrov qhuas koj txujkev cawm dlim, rua qhov koj yog tug tsomkwm kuv.
Tug TSWV has tas, “Kuv yuav qha txujkev kws koj yuav taug rua koj, kuv yuav qha koj hab yuav paab ua koj tug tuavxaam.
Tsi xob ruag le tug neeg lossis tug neeg zaag kws yuavtsum muab looj thawb lug looj hab saam xauv txhaj cob tau.”
Cov tuabneeg sab phem yuav raug kev txomnyem, tabsis tug TSWV txujkev hlub yuav tsomkwm cov tuabneeg kws ca sab rua nwg moog le.
Mej cov kws yog tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg, ca le txaus sab hab zoo sab, rua qhov tug TSWV tau paab mej lawm. Mej cov kws noog nwg lug, ca le qw zoo sab.
Mej txhua tug kws yog tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg, ca le hu nkauj zoo sab rua tej kws tug TSWV tub ua rua mej lug lawm. Mej cov kws fwm nwg, ca le qhuas nwg.
Mej ca le ua tug TSWV tsaug nrug tej suab nkauj nogncaas; mej ca le hu nkauj nrug tej suab nkauj nogncaas kws muaj kaum txuj hlua ua nwg tsaug.
Hu nkauj tshab qhuas nwg, ntaus nkauj nogncaas kuas zoo, hu nkauj suab nkoov zim zoo sab, hab ca le hu nkauj zoo sab.
Tug TSWV tej lug yeej yog lug tseeb, hab nwg tej num puavleej yog tej kws suavdlawg ca sab tau.
Tug TSWV nyam kev ncaaj nceeg hab qhov tseeb xwb; nwg txujkev hlub kws tsi paub kawg nyob thoob plawg huv lub nplajteb nuav moog le.
Thaus tug TSWV tsim nruab ntug, tsim lub nub lub hli hab tej nubqub, nwg has kuas muaj, ces txawm ca le muaj tuaj.
Nwg has kuas dlej havtxwv sau lug nyob ua ke, nwg cais tej havtxwv tub nyob muaj chaw.
Txhua yaam huv lub nplajteb nuav, ca le paub ntshai tug TSWV! Txhua tsaav tuabneeg kws nyob huv qaab ntuj nuav ca le fwm nwg!
Thaus nwg has, txawm ca le muaj lub nplajteb nuav; nwg has xwb, txhua yaam txawm ca le tshwmsim tuaj.
Tug TSWV muab txhua tsaav tuabneeg tej kev npaaj sab rhuav huv tuabsi lawm, nwg ua rua puab tso puab tej kev npaaj sab povtseg.
Tabsis nwg teg num nyob ruaj khov moog ibtxhis le; nwg tej kev npaaj sab yuav nyob moog tsi paub kawg.
Tsaav tuabneeg kws muaj Vaajtswv ua puab tug TSWV, puab muaj kev kaaj sab, cov tuabneeg kws nwg xaiv lug ua nwg tug lawm, puab tau nyob kaaj sab lug.
Tug TSWV nyob sau ntuj saib tuaj, nwg yeej pum tuabneeg txhua tug huv tuabsi.
nwg nyob sau ntuj kaav rawv hab saib ntsoov txhua tug kws nyob huv nplajteb nuav.
Nwg ua rua tuabneeg muaj tswvyim xaav, hab nwg paub txhua yaam kws puab ua.
Tug vaajntxwv kws yeej luas, tsi yog vim nwg muaj tubrog coob, tug tubrog kws yeej luas, tsi yog vim nwg tug zug nchaav.
Tej txiv neeg kws caij moog tua rog paab tsi tau kuas yeej, tej neeg ntawd tug zug yeej cawm tsi tau kuas dlim.
Tug TSWV yeej saib ntsoov txhua tug kws fwm nwg hab cov kws ca sab rua nwg txujkev hlub kws tsi hloov le,
nwg cawm puab dlim ntawm txujkev tuag. Nwg cawm puab txujsa thaus muaj kev tshaib plaab.
Peb ca sab ntsoov rua tug TSWV, nwg yog tug tsomkwm hab yog tug paab peb.
Peb zoo sab kawg rua qhov muaj nwg, peb ca sab rua nwg lub npe kws dlawbhuv.
Tug TSWV, thov koj txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov nrug nraim peb moog le, ib yaam le peb muab peb txujkev ca sab cog nkaus rua koj.
Kuv yuav naj nub ua tug TSWV tsaug, kuv yuav qhuas nwg tsi tseg tsi tu.
Kuv yuav qhuas nwg tej num kws nwg tau ua taag lug lawm, thov kuas txhua tug kws raug kev tsimtxom ca le noog hab zoo sab!
Ca le nrug kuv pav tug TSWV lub fwjchim kws luj kawg nkaus, peb suavdlawg ca le thooj txhij qhuas nwg lub npe.
Kuv thov tug TSWV, hab nwg teb kuv tej lug thov, nwg tso kuv dlim ntawm tej kev txhawj ntshai huv tuabsi lawm.
Cov tuabneeg raug tsimtxom tsaa qhovmuag saib nwg hab puab zoo sab kawg le, puab yuav tsi nplaam tej kws puab ca sab rua.
Thaus cov tuabneeg txomnyem hu thov nwg paab, nwg teb puab tej lug thov; nwg cawm puab dlim ntawm puab tej kev ntxhuv sab kws raug puab huv tuabsi.
Tug TSWV tug timtswv zuv rawv cov tuabneeg kws fwm tug TSWV, hab nwg cawm puab dlim kev puamtsuaj.
Mej sim xaav saib tug TSWV ua zoo npaum le caag rua mej lawm? Cov tuabneeg kws lug nrhav chaw nkaum ntawm tug TSWV, puab tau nyob kaaj sab lug.
Tug TSWV tsaav tuabneeg txhua tug ca le fwm nwg; cov tuabneeg kws noog tug TSWV lug yeej tsi tu ncua ib yaam dlaabtsi le.
Txawm yog tsuv ntxhuav los tseem tshaib plaab hab tu pluag tsi muaj noj, tabsis cov tuabneeg kws fwm tug TSWV yuav muaj txhua yaam zoo kws puab xaav tau.
Kuv tej tubki, mej ca le lug ntawm nuav hab noog kuv has, kuv yuav qha kuas mej paub ua lub neej fwm tug TSWV.
Mej puas xaav tau lub neej lomzem kaaj sab lug? Mej puas ntshaw txujsa ntev hab lub neej kaaj sab lug?
Mej ca le tseg tsi xob has tej lug phem hab tsi xob has lug dlaag le.
Tso plhuav tej kev ua phem tseg hab tig lug ua txuj zoo, Ca le nrhav kev nrug luas sis humxeeb kuas kawg koj lub sab.
Tug TSWV saib ntsoov cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg hab noog rawv puab tej suab quaj,
tabsis nwg tawmtsaam cov tuabneeg ua phem, yog le ntawd, thaus puab tuag lawm, txhaj tsi muaj tuabneeg ncu txug puab le.
Thaus cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg thov tug TSWV, nwg noog puab tej lug thov, nwg cawm puab dlim ntawm tej kev ntxhuv sab.
Tug TSWV nyob ze cov tuabneeg kws taag kev ca sab, nwg cawm cov tuabneeg kws tsi muaj chaw vaamkhom.
Tug tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg tiv ntau yaam kev nyuaj sab, tabsis tug TSWV cawm nwg dlim tej kev ntxhuv sab huv tuabsi.
Tug TSWV tsomkwm nwg nraim tsi tso nwg tseg, nwg tej pobtxhaa yeej tsi muaj ib yaag yuav luv le.
Tej kev phem yuav ua rua cov tuabneeg sab phem tuag moog, cov kws ntxub cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg yuav raug txim.
Tug TSWV yuav lug cawm nwg tsaav tuabneeg, cov kws lug cuag tug TSWV, hab thov nwg tsomkwm puab, yuav tsi raug kev puamtsuaj.
Tug TSWV, thov koj tawmtsaam tug kws tawmtsaam kuv, hab ua rog rua cov tuabneeg kws ua rog rua kuv!
Nqaa koj dlaim thaiv nav ntaaj hab koj cev rig tsho hlau lug cawm kuas kuv dlim.
Tsaa koj raab muv hab raab taus ua rog rua cov tuabneeg kws caum kuv tua. Thov coglug has tas, “koj yuav cawm kuv.”
Thov kuas cov tuabneeg kws nrhav kuv tua povtseg ca le swb hab poob ntsejmuag. Thov kuas cov tuabneeg tuav tswvyim ntxeev sab ua phem rua kuv tig tsiv rov qaab hab tsi xob sis hum.
Thov kuas puab zoo ib yaam le tej quavnyaab kws cua muab ntsawj yaa taag, hab thov tug TSWV cov timtswv muab puab lawv kuas tawg tsiv ri sua moog.
Thov kuas puab txuj hauv kev tsaus ntuj nti hab nplua heev thaus kws tug TSWV tug timtswv caum puab.
Yeej tsi muaj ib qho txhum kws tsimnyog puab cuab hlua tog kuv kev, khawb qhov tog kuas kuv poob hab nteg tau kuv.
Tabsis kev puamtsuaj yuav nteg tau puab ua ntej puab paub, puab yuav rov maag puab lub vuj hlua hab poob rua huv txujkev puamtsuaj.
Ces kuv yuav zoo sab rua qhov muaj tug TSWV paab kuv, kuv yuav kaaj sab lug rua qhov nwg cawm kuv dlim.

Taagnrho kuv lub sab yuav has rua tug TSWV has tas, “Yeej tsi muaj leejtwg zoo npaum le koj lawm. Koj tiv thaiv tug tuabneeg tsi muaj zug kuas dlim ntawm tug kws muaj zug, hab paab tug pluag kuas dlim ntawm tug tuabneeg limham.”
Cov tuabneeg sab phem ua timkhawv tsi tseeb tawmtsaam kuv, hab puab lam has tas kuv ua tej kev txhum kws kuv tsi paub le.
Puab ua tej kev phem pauj kuv tej kev ua zoo, hab ua rua kuv sab ntsws puag taag.
Tabsis thaus puab muaj mob, kuv naav cev rig tsho quaj ntsuag, kuv yoo mov tsi noj, kuv nyo hau thov Vaajtswv,
ib yaam le kuv thov Vaajtswv rua kuv tug phoojywg lossis kuv tug kwvtij ntaag; kuv quaj ncig moog ncig lug ib yaam le tug kws quaj nyav nwg nam ntaag.
Tabsis thaus kuv dlawm qaug, puab txhua tug puavleej zoo sab hab tuaj nyob vij vog luag kuv plig, tej tuabneeg dlog dlig los ca le tuaj ntaus kuv hab nplawm kuv.
Puab thuam kuv ib yaam le tej tuabneeg sab phem, puab  zawm nav hab zig ncauj rua kuv.
Tug TSWV, tseem tshuav ntev le caag koj maam le tsaa qhovmuag saib zaaj nuav? Thov cawm kuas kuv dlim ntawm puab tej nplawm, thov cawm kuv txujsa ntawm cov tsuv ntxhuav nuav!
Kuv yuav ua koj tsaug taabmeeg ntawm koj tsaav tuabneeg kws tuaj sis sau ua ke, hab kuv yuav qhuas koj taabmeeg puab.

Thov tsi xob pub kuas kuv cov yeebncuab kws yog tuabneeg dlaag muaj kev zoo sab rua thaus kuv swb luas lawm. Tsi xob ca tej tuabneeg kws laam tau laam ntxub kuv ntawd zig ncaug ntxi muag rua kuv, thaus kuv tau kev nyuaj sab.
Puab tsi has tej lug zoo hum kuv sab hlo le, tabsis puab pheej has tej lug dlaag ntxag cov tuabneeg kws muaj kev hlub hab kev thaajyeeb huv lub tebchaws.
Puab luag kuv hab qw has tas, “Peb tub pum tej kws koj ua lawm!”
Tabsis tug TSWV, koj tub pum tej nuav taag lawm. Yog le ntawd tug TSWV, thov koj tsi xob nyob ntsag tu, hab thov tsi xob nyob nrug dleb kuv.
Tug TSWV, koj ca le sawv tseeg lug hab tiv thaiv kuv, kuv tug Vaajtswv, koj ca le sawv lug hab paab kuv has plaub.
Tug TSWV, koj yog tug ncaaj nceeg, thov koj ca le txav txim rua kuv lawv le kuv yog tug tuabneeg kws tsi muaj txim; thov tsi xob pub kuv cov yeebncuab tau zoo luag kuv plig.
Thov tsi xob pub kuas puab muaj lub sab xaav has tas, “Peb tub muab nwg nqog lawm! Peb xaav ua lawv le peb lub sab nyam los yeej tau!”

Cov tuabneeg kws thaus kuv raug kev txomnyem, pheej rau sab ntso luag kuv plig hab zoo sab, thov kuas puab tsi xob sis hum, hab cov tuabneeg kws puab qhuas has tas, puab zoo dlua kuv, thov kuas puab raug kev txaajmuag hab poob ntsejmuag.

Cov tuabneeg kws txaus sab rua kuv txujkev ua zoo hab ncaaj nceeg, ca le qw zoo sab hab has tsi tseg has tas, “Tug TSWV yog tug muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus! Nwg txaus sab rua nwg tug tubkhai kawg nkaus le!”
Ces kuv yuav qha koj txujkev ncaaj nceeg rua suavdlawg, hab kuv yuav qhuas koj ib nub tsaus ntuj ndlais.
Kev txhum has rua tug tuabneeg ua phem lub sab; nwg txhaj tsi leeg yuav Vaajtswv hab tsi paub ntshai Vaajtswv le.
Rua qhov nwg xaav le nwg lub qhovmuag pum xwb, nwg xaav has tas, Vaajtswv yuav tsi pum nwg tej kev txhum hab tsi txav txim rua nwg ib zag le.
Nwg has tej lug phem lug qas hab lug dlaag xwb, nwg tsi nyam ua lawv le kev txawj ntse hab kev ua zoo.
Thaus nwg pw sau txaaj nwg xaav ntsoov rua txujkev ua phem xwb, nwg tsi ua ib yaam zoo hab tsi tso tej kev phem kev qas tseg le.
Tug TSWV, koj txujkev hlub sab moog txug sau ntuj, koj txujkev ncaaj nceeg sab moog nto sau nruab ntug.
Koj txujkev ncaaj nceeg luj ib yaam le lub hauv roob, koj txujkev txav txim tub ib yaam le havtxwv. Koj yog tug cawm tej tuabneeg hab tsaj txhu.
Vaajtswv, koj txujkev hlub zoo kawg nkaus! Peb nrhav  tau qhov chaw nkaum hab tsomkwm peb nyob huv qaab koj ob phob tis tug dluab ntxoov ntxoo.
Peb tau noj tej zaub mov kws koj pub rua peb tsau npo. Koj pub peb haus tug dlej kws yog txujkev tau nyob kaaj sab lug.
Koj yog lub qhovdlej cawm txujsa, vim koj yog qhov kaaj peb txhaj pum kev.
Thov koj tsi xob tso cov kws hlub koj tseg, hab ua zoo rua cov kws muaj lub sab ncaaj nceeg.
Thov tsi xob pub cov tuabneeg khaavtheeb tawmtsaam kuv, lossis cov tuabneeg sab phem tuaj lawv kuv tawm.
Cov tuabneeg kws ua phem ua qas qaug rua qhov twg, puab pw qhov ntawd sawv tsi taug le lawm.
Tsis xob nyuaj sab rua tej kws cov tuabneeg sab phem ua, tsi xob khib rua cov tuabneeg kws ua kev txhum.
Puab yuav ntsws sai ib yaam le tej nyom, puab yuav tuag sai ib yaam le tej nroj tsuag.
Ca sab rua tug TSWV hab ua zoo, yog mej ua le ntawd, mej yuav nyob huv lub tebchaws tso sab lug.
Nrhav kev kaaj sab ntawm tug TSWV hab nwg yuav muab rua mej lawv le mej lub sab xaav yuav.
Muab mej lub cev hab lub sab lub ntsws rua tug TSWV kaav, hab ca sab rua nwg, nwg txhaj yuav paab mej,
nwg yuav ua kuas mej txujkev ncaaj nceeg ci ib yaam le lub nub ci thaus taav su.
Ua sab ntev hab tog tug TSWV ua nwg teg num, tsi xob nyuaj sab rua tej tuabneeg kws vaammeej, lossis cov tuabneeg kws ua tej kev phem kws puab xaav tseg lawm tav.
Tsis xob nyuaj sab lossis chim; tej ntawd tsuas ua rua muaj kev ntxhuv sab xwb.
Cov tuabneeg kws ca sab rua tug TSWV yuav muaj teb muaj chaw nyob, tabsis cov tuabneeg sab phem yuav raug muab ntab tawm moog.
Cov tuabneeg sab phem nyob ib ntus xwb puab yuav puamtsuaj moog, mej xaav nrhav puab, tabsis yuav tsi pum puab,
tabsis cov tuabneeg txu fwjchim yuav muaj teb muaj chaw, muaj kev thaajyeeb hab kev tau zoo nyob kaaj sab lug.
Tug tuabneeg sab phem tuavhuv tawmtsaam tug tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg, zawm nav zog rua nwg hab ntxub nwg.
Tabsis tug TSWV luag cov tuabneeg sab phem plig, rua qhov nwg paub has tas tshuav tsi ntev puab yuav raug kev puamtsuaj.
Cov tuabneeg sab phem rhu puab tej ntaaj hab ntaa puab tej neevnti tua cov tuabneeg pluag hab txomnyem, hlais cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg kuas tuag taag,
tabsis puab tej ntaaj yuav rov tua puab tuag, hab puab tej qhaub neevnti yuav luv taag.
Tej yaam miv miv kws tug tuabneeg sab zoo muaj, tseem muaj nqes dlua cov tuabneeg sab phem tej nyaj txag qhov txhua chaw.
Rua qhov tug TSWV yuav ua rua cov tuabneeg sab phem tug zug kuas pluj moog, tabsis nwg yuav tsomkwm cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg.
Tug TSWV tsomkwm cov tuabneeg kws fwm nwg, hab lub tebchaws yuav yog puab tug moog ibtxhis le.
Puab yuav tsi tau tiv kev txomnyem thaus kws muaj kev phem tuaj, puab yuav muaj txaus noj lub sijhawm kws muaj kev tshaib plaab.
Tabsis cov tuabneeg sab phem yuav tuag moog, tug TSWV cov yeebncuab yuav qhuav taag ib yaam le tej paaj nroj, puab yuav yaaj ntshis taag moog ib yaam le tej paa tawg.
Tug tuabneeg sab phem qev txais hab tsi them rov qaab le, tabsis tug tuabneeg sab zoo yeej muaj lub sab dlawb paug pub tau rua luas.
Cov tuabneeg kws tug TSWV foom koob moov rua yuav tau lub tebchaws lug ua puab tug, tabsis cov tuabneeg kws tug TSWV foom tsi zoo yuav raug ntab tawm moog.
Tug TSWV yeej yog tug kws coj tuabneeg txuj hauv kev, hab yog tug tsomkwm cov tuabneeg kws ua hum nwg sab.
Txawm yog puab qaug los puab yeej tsi pw tuabywv, rua qhov tug TSWV yuav tsaa puab sawv.
Nwgnuav kuv yog ib tug tuabneeg laug, kuv yeej ua neej nyob lug ntev lawm, tabsis kuv tsi pum tug TSWV muab ib tug tuabneeg zoo povtseg rua qhov twg lossis ca nwg tej mivnyuas moog thov khawv noj.
Nwg yeej muaj pub hab qev tau rua rua lwm tug txhua lub sijhawm, hab nwg tej mivnyuas puavleej yog koob moov.
Tso plhuav txujkev phem tseg hab tig lug ua txuj zoo, hab mej tej xeebntxwv txhaj yuav tau nyob huv lub tebchaws nuav moog le,

tug TSWV yeej nyam txujkev ncaaj nceeg hab tsi tau muab nwg tsaav tuabneeg kws muaj kev ncaaj nceeg tso tseg le. Nwg tsomkwm puab moog ibtxhis tsi kawg, tabsis cov tuabneeg sab phem tej xeebntxwv yuav raug ntab tawm moog.
Cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg yuav ua cov kaav lub tebchaws, hab nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd moog ibtxhis le.
Tug tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg yeej has lug txawj lug ntse, hab nwg yeej has tej lug tseeb xwb.
Nwg khaws nkaus nwg tug Vaajtswv txuj kevcai rua nruab sab hab tsi muab t so tseg.
Tug tuabneeg sab phem soj nraim tug tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg, hab nrhav kev yuav muab nwg tua povtseg.
Tabsis tug TSWV yuav tsi muab nwg tso rua nwg tug yeebncuab lub fwjchim lossis ca nwg raug txim thaus luas rau txim rua nwg.

Mej ca sab rua tug TSWV hab ua lawv le nwg tej lug saamfwm; nwg yuav muab lub tebchaws rua mej nyob ua mej tug, kuas mej tau ntsejmuag, hab mej yuav saib ntsoov nwg muab cov tuabneeg sab phem ntab tawm moog.
Kuv paub has tas muaj ib tug tuabneeg sab phem kws pheej ua limham kawg le, nwg tsaav nwg lub fwjchim luj tshaaj suavdlawg huv tuabsi, ib yaam le tug ntoo thuv peg roob Lenpanoos,
tabsis tom qaab nuav kuv dlua kev tuaj, kuv tsi pum nwg nyob qhov chaw ntawd lawm, kuv nrhav nwg, tabsis tsi pum nwg le.
Ua tuab zoo saib tug tuabneeg sab zoo hab tshuaj tug tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg, tug tuabneeg kws tsi nyam ua plaub ua ntug yuav muaj xeebntxwv coob,
tabsis cov tuabneeg txhum puab raug kev puamtsuaj taag, hab puab tej xeebntxwv los tu noob taag tsi seem ib tug le.
Tug TSWV cawm cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg hab nwg tsomkwm puab thaus puab raug kev txomnyem.
Nwg paab puab hab cawm puab dlim, nwg cawm puab dlim ntawm cov tuabneeg sab phem, rua qhov puab vaamkhom nwg ua tug tsomkwm puab.
Tug TSWV, thov tsi xob chim hab rau txim rua kuv!
Koj tej xub vug raug kuv ib ce to taag, koj ntaus kuv qaug rua huv aav.
Vim koj txujkev chim, kuv txhaj raug mob nyaav le nuav, muaj kaab mob nyob thoob plawg kuv lub cev, vim kuv tej kev txhum xwb.
Kuv tej kev txhum nphau lug tsuam kuv, tej kev txhum ntawd ua lub nraa nyaav rua kuv ris tsi taug le lawm.
Rua qhov kuv tau ua tej yaam kws ruag kawg le, kuv tej qhov txhaab tsw lwj ntxag hab qawj zuj zug lawm.
Kuv ca le khoov dluav, hab zuav ua ib pawg lawm, kuv quaj ntsuag tu sab taag nub.
Kuv ua npaws ib ce kub lug hab tub ze rua qhov kws kuv yuav tuag.
Kuv ib ce qaug quas zig hab zuav ua ib pawg, kuv tau kev txomnyem sab hab kuv lub sab quaj quas ntsuag.
Tug TSWV, koj yeej paub kuv tog koj ntev lug lawm, hab koj yeej nov kuv lub suab quaj.
Kuv lub plawv tseem dlha, kuv tug zug ntaug taag lawm, hab kuv lub qhovmuag tsi pum kev le.
Kuv tej phoojywg hab tej tuabneeg zej zog tsi xaav tuaj ze kuv, vim kuv tej mob xwb, txawm yog kuv tsev tuabneeg los puab txaav dleb ntawm kuv kawg le.
Cov tuabneeg kws xaav tua kuv povtseg cuab hlua tog kuv kev, hab cov tuabneeg kws xaav ua kuas kuv raug mob, pheej hem kuas kuv raug kev puamtsuaj, puab tuavhuv tawmtsaam kuv tsi tseg le.
Kuv zoo ib yaam le tug tuabneeg laag ntseg kws tsi nov lug hab kuv zoo ib yaam le tug tuabneeg ruag kws tsi txawj has lug.
Kuv zoo ib yaam le tug tuabneeg kws tsi paub leejtwg le, rua qhov kuv yeej tsi nov.
Tabsis tug TSWV, kuv ca sab rua koj nkaus xwb, hab tug TSWV kws yog kuv tug Vaajtswv, koj yeej yuav teb kuv tej lug thov.
Thov tsi xob pub kuv cov yeebncuab saib tsi taug kuv, thaus kuv raug kev txomnyem, thov tsi xob pub puab ua limham rua kuv thaus kuv qaug lawm.
Kuv tub yuav qaug hab kuv npua mob rawv xwb.
Kuv leeg kuv tej kev txhum, kuv tu sab kawg rua tej kws kuv ua txhum.
Kuv cov yeebncuab khov kho hab muaj zug kawg le, muaj coob tug ca le laam ntxub kuv tsi muaj qaabhau dlaabtsi.
Cov tuabneeg kws ua phem pauj zoo tub yog puab txhobtxwm ua tawmtsaam kuv, rua qhov kuv yeej ua ncaaj ua zoo xwb.
Tug TSWV, thov koj tsi xob tso kuv tseg, kuv tug Vaajtswv, thov koj tsi xob txaav dleb ntawm kuv moog le.
Tug TSWV kws yog kuv tug cawmseej, thov koj ca le paab kuv taamsim nuav!
Kuv has tas, “Kuv yuav ceevfaaj rua tej kws kuv ua hab tsi pub kuv tug nplaig has tej lug kws txhum; kuv yuav tsi has ib yaam dlaabtsi thaus cov tuabneeg sab phem nyob ze kuv.”
Kuv nyob tuabywv xwb, tsi has ib lu lug le, txawm yog tej lug zoo los kuv tsi has le. Tabsis kuv tej kev txomnyem nthuav luj heev tuaj lawm,
hab ua rua kuv ntxhuv sab kawg le. Kuv yimfuab xaav ntau, mas kuv yimfuab ntxhuv sab, kuv txhaj nug has tas:
“Tug TSWV, kuv yuav ua neej nyob ntev le caag? Thaus twg kuv maam le tuag? Thov qha rua kuv saib tshuav ntev le caag kuv txujsa maam le tu.”
Koj pub txujsa rua kuv ua neej nyob tuab lu kawg le. Kuv txujsa tsi muaj nqes dlaabtsi rua koj: txhua tug tuabneeg txujsa zoo ib yaam le nthwv cua ntsawj ib vuag xwb,
hab zoo ib yaam le tug dluab ntxoov ntxoo kws nyob ib plag xwb, txhua yaam kws nwg ua tsi tseemceeb dlaabtsi le, nwg khaws nyaj txag tseg, tabsis tsi paub has tas leejtwg yog tug yuav tau.
Tug TSWV, nwgnuav kuv yuav ca sab rua dlaabtsi? Kuv ca sab rua koj nkaus xwb.
Thov cawm kuas kuv dlim ntawm kuv tej kev txhum, thov tsi xob pub cov tuabneeg ruag luag kuv plig hab ua saib tsi taug kuv.
Kuv yuav nyob tuabywv hab tsi has lug le, rua qhov koj yog tug kws ua rua kuv raug tej kev txomnyem nuav.
Thov tsi xob nplawm kuv ntxiv lawm! Thaus koj nplawm kuv, kuv tub yuav laug tuag.

Qhov kws koj nplawm hab qhuab ntuag tuabneeg, yog koj rau txim rua puab tej kev txhum, hab koj rhuav puab tej nyaj txag qhov txhua chaw ib yaam le ntsaum kaabrwg noj. Txhua tug tuabneeg txujsa zoo ib yaam le nthwv cua ntsawj ib vuag xwb!

Tug TSWV, thov noog kuv tej lug thov, hab nov kuv lub suab quaj hu koj, thov lug cawm kuv thaus kuv taabtom quaj lug kua muag nuav. Kuv tsuas zoo ib yaam le tug qhua kws nrug koj nyob ib plag le thaus kuv cov yawmkoob hab xwb.
Thov koj tso kuv tseg kuas kuv muaj kev kaaj sab mivntsiv ua ntej kuv tuag moog hab tsi muaj kuv lawm.
Kuv ua sab ntev tog tug TSWV lug paab kuv; ces tug TSWV noog kuv tej lug thov hab nov kuv lub suab quaj.

Nwg nqug kuv tawm huv lub qhov kws yog txujkev puamtsuaj, hab nqug kuv tawm huv lub qhov tuag kws yog cov xuabzeb lug. Nwg tsaws kuv moog tso rua sau lub pobzeb kws nyob kaaj sab lug, hab ua rua kuv muaj chaw nyob ruaj khov.
Nwg qha kuv hu ib zaaj nkauj tshab, yog zaaj nkauj kws hu qhuas peb tug Vaajtswv. Txhua tug kws pum zaaj nuav yuav ntshai hab puab yuav ca sab rua tug TSWV.
Txhua tug kws ca sab rua tug TSWV muaj kev kaaj sab, puab yog cov kws tsi moog pe mlom lossis yog cov kws tsi koom nrug cov kws pe tej vaajtswv cuav.

Tug TSWV, peb tug Vaajtswv, koj tau ua ntau yaam txujci paab peb lug lawm; yeej tsi muaj ib tug zoo cuag koj! Koj npaaj tau ntau yaam rua peb. Kuv yeej pav tsi tau tej ntawd, rua qhov tej ntawd muaj ntau heev!

Koj tsi xaav tau tej khoom theej txhoj hab tej khoom fij; koj tsi tau has kuas muab tsaj lug tua hlawv fij taagnrho rua sau lub thaaj lossis muab khoom fij dlaws kev txhum. Tabsis, koj qheb kuv qhovntsej kuas noog koj tej lug,
yog le ntawd, kuv txhaj teb has tas, “Kuv nyob ntawm nuav, koj tej lug qha kuv nyob rua huv phoo ntawv kevcai.
Kuv tug Vaajtswv, kuv yeej txaus sab ua zoo kuas hum koj sab nyam. Kuv yuav khaws koj tej lug qha rua huv kuv lub sab moog le.”
Tug TSWV, thaus koj tsaav tuabneeg tuaj sis sau ua ke, kuv yuav qha Txujmoo Zoo kws yog koj txujkev cawm peb rua puab noog. Koj paub has tas, kuv qha zaaj nuav tsi tseg le.

Kuv tsi tau muab txujmoo zoo kws yog txujkev cawm dlim npog ca hab ca kuv tuab leeg paub xwb. Kuv qha koj txujkev ncaaj nceeg hab koj txujkev cawm dlim tsi tseg le. Kuv tsi tau muab koj tej lug zoo hab kev hlub kws nyob moog ibtxhis npog ca tsi qha rua koj tsaav tuabneeg kws tuaj txoos ua ke nuav le.
Tug TSWV, kuv paub has tas koj yeej hlub kuv tsi tso kuv tseg le. Koj txujkev hlub hab kev ncaaj nceeg yuav cawm kuas kuv dlim.

Muaj kev txomnyem nyob puagncig kuv suav tsi txheeb le! Kuv tej kev txhum rov raug kuv hab ua rua kuv qhovmuag tsi pum kev le lawm, tej kev txhum ntawd tseem ntau tshaaj cov plaubhau sau kuv taubhau, hab ua rua kuv taag kev ca sab lawm.
Tug TSWV, thov cawm kuv, ca le paab kuv taamsim nuav.
Thov kuas cov tuabneeg kws nrhav kuv tua ca le swb hab tsi sis hum, thov kuas cov tuabneeg kws taabtom zoo sab thaus kuv raug kev txomnyem raug txaajmuag hab tsiv rov qaab.
Thov kuas cov tuabneeg kws luag kuv plig ca le swb hab ntshai tshee nyo.

Thov kuas txhua tug kws lug cuag koj muaj kev zoo sab hab kaaj sab lug. Thov kuas txhua tug kws taabtom ua tsaug rua koj txujkev cawm dlim ca le has tas, “Tug TSWV yog tug kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus.”
Tug TSWV, kuv qaug zug hab txomnyem kawg le, tabsis koj tseem ncu ntsoov kuv hab. Koj yog kuv tug cawmseej hab yog kuv tug Vaajtswv, thov koj kawgkag lug paab kuv!
Cov kws mob sab cov tuabneeg pluag yog cov kws tau kev kaaj sab lug, tug TSWV yuav paab puab thaus puab raug kev txomnyem.
Tug TSWV yuav tiv thaiv puab hab tsomkwm kuas puab muaj sa nyob, nwg yuav pub kuas puab tau nyob kaaj sab lug huv puab lub tebchaws, nwg yuav tsi muab puab tso rua puab cov yeebncuab.
Tug TSWV yuav paab puab thaus puab raug mob raug nkeeg, hab yuav khu puab tej mob kuas puab muaj zug khov kho rov tuaj.
Kuv has tas, “Tug TSWV, kuv ua txhum luj kawg nkaus rua koj, thov koj hlub hab paab khu kuas kuv zoo!”
Kuv cov yeebncuab has tej lug phem kawg le rua kuv. Puab xaav kuas kuv tuag hab xaav kuas kuv pluj ndlais moog.
Cov tuabneeg kws tuaj pum kuv yog cov kws sab tsi ncaaj, thaus puab tawm moog, puab coj kuv lub moo moog xyaav tsi zoo, puab coj kuv lub moo moog xyaav rua txhua qhov.
Taagnrho cov tuabneeg kws ntxub kuv, ib leeg ntxhi rua ib leeg has txug kuv, puab xaav ua tej yaam kws phem rua  kuv.
Puab has tas, “Nwg taabtom raug mob nyaav kawg nkaus, nwg yuav tsi sawv sau nwg lub txaaj lug ib zag ntxiv le lawm.”
Txawm yog kuv tug phoojywg zoo kws kuv ntseeg sab tshaaj plawg hab tug kws nrug kuv noj mov ua ke los tseem ntxeev sab tawmtsaam kuv lawm hab.
Tug TSWV, thov taabncuab kuv hab rov txhawb kuas kuv muaj zug tuaj, hab kuv yuav rov ua pauj rua kuv cov yeebncuab.
Puab yuav tsi yeej kuv ib zag le lawm. hab kuv yuav paub has tas koj yeej txaus sab rua kuv tag.
Koj yuav paab kuv, rua qhov kuv yeej ua ncaaj ua nceeg hab koj yuav puag rawv kuv rua huv koj lub xubndlag moog ibtxhis le.
Ca le qhuas tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv! Nwgnuav, ca le qhuas nwg hab qhuas moog ibtxhis tsi kawg le! Amees! Amees!
Vaajtswv, kuv lub sab kub lug nrhav koj ib yaam le tug muaslwj nrhav tug dlej ndlwg txag zag, vim nwg nqhes dlej heev.
Vaajtswv tug kws muaj sa nyob, kuv lub sab nqhes xaav nyob ze koj. Thaus twg kuv txhaj le tau moog pehawm koj nyob tim ntsej tim muag?
Kuv quaj taag nub taag mo, kuv tej kua muag yog kuv cov mov noj; kuv cov yeebncuab naj nub nug kuv has tas, “Koj tug Vaajtswv nyob qhov twg?”

Thaus kuv xaav txug lub neej kws dlhau lug, kuv tu sab kawg, thaus kuv nrug cov tuabneeg coob coob moog rua huv Vaajtswv lub tsev, hab kuv coj puab moog tsheej paab hu nkauj zoo sab hab qw qhuas Vaajtswv.

Vim le caag kuv nyuaj sab ua luaj? Vim le caag kuv raug kev txomnyem ua luaj le? Kuv yuav muab kuv txujkev ca sab tso plhuav rua Vaajtswv, hab kuv yuav rov qhuas nwg dlua ib zag ntxiv, nwg yog kuv tug Cawmseej hab yog kuv tug Vaajtswv.

Kuv poob tebchaws tuaj nyob ntawm nuav ua lub neej lwj sab quas ntsuav, kuv txhaj ncu txug Vaajtswv. Nwg ca kev nyuaj sab lug raug kuv ib yaam le dlej havtxwv ndlaas tej nam twv tuaj nyaab kuv, hab ib yaam le tug dlej tsaws tsaag sau lub Roob Helemoos hab Mixales lug rua ntawm tug dlej Yauladees.
Thaus nruab nub, thov tug TSWV qha nwg txujkev hlub kws nyob moog le rua kuv, thaus tsaus ntuj kuv txhaj tau hu nkauj ua nwg tsaug, kuv thov Vaajtswv kws yog tug tuav kuv txujsa.
Kuv has rua Vaajtswv kws yog tug tiv thaiv kuv has tas, “Vim le caag koj tsi ncu qaab kuv lawm? Vim le caag kuv yuav tau tiv kuv cov yeebncuab txujkev tsimtxom ua luaj le?”
Puab thuam kuv, ua rua kuv sab ntsws lwj taag, vim puab pheej nug kuv tsi tseg has tas, “Koj tug Vaajtswv nyob qhov twg?”

Vim le caag kuv nyuaj sab ua luaj? Vim le caag kuv yuav raug kev txomnyem ua luaj le? Kuv yuav tso sab plhuav rua Vaajtswv hab kuv yuav rov qhuas nwg dlua, nwg yog kuv tug cawmseej hab yog kuv tug Vaajtswv.
Vaajtswv, thov koj paab tiv thaiv kuv hab paab kuv tawmtsaam cov yeebncuab kws tsi paub koj. Thov cawm kuv kuas dlim ntawm tej kev dlaag ntxag hab cov tuabneeg ua phem.
