Koj yeej yog tug tsomkwm kuv; vim le caag koj txhaj muab kuv tso tseg? Vim le caag kuv pheej yuav tau tiv tej kev txomnyem ntawm kuv cov yeebncuab tej kev ua phem nuav?
Thov koj ua koj tug dluab ci hab muab koj tej lug tseeb coj kuv kev, coj kuv rov qaab moog rua sau Xi-oos kws yog koj lub roob dlawbhuv, hab moog rua huv koj lub Tuamtsev kws koj nyob.
Vaajtswv, kuv yuav moog rua ntawm koj lub thaaj; ca kuv moog cuag koj, kuv txhaj muaj kev kaaj sab hab zoo sab. Vaajtswv kws yog kuv tug Vaajtswv, kuv yuav ntaus nkauj nogcaas hab hu nkauj qhuas koj.

Vim le caag kuv muaj kev nyuaj sab ua luaj? Vim le caag kuv yuav raug kev txomnyem ua luaj le? Kuv yuav muab kuv txujkev ca sab tso plhuav rua Vaajtswv, hab kuv yuav qhuas nwg dlua ib zag ntxiv, nwg yog kuv tug cawmseej hab yog kuv tug Vaajtswv.

Vaajtswv, peb tej qhovntsej yeej nov ntsoov zaaj nuav, peb cov yawmkoob yeej ibtxwm pav zaaj nuav qha rua peb has txug tej txujci tseemceeb kws koj tau ua rua puab tam ntawd tau ntau xyoo lug lawm le nuav:

Koj muab cov tuabneeg nruj tsiv ntab tsiv tawm lawm, hab sau zog koj tsaav tuabneeg lug nyob huv puab lub tebchaws, koj rau txim rua luas lwm tsaav tuabneeg hab ca koj tsaav tuabneeg tau nyob kaaj sab lug.

Koj tsaav tuabneeg tsi tau ntaus yeej lub tebchaws ntawd, vim puab tej ntaaj hab puab lub fwjchim, tabsis yog koj lub fwjchim hab koj tug zug ua rua puab yeej, hab koj txaus sab rua puab vim koj hlub puab.
Koj yog kuv tug vaajntxwv hab yog kuv tug Vaajtswv, Koj pub  rua koj tsaav tuabneeg muaj yeej,
tub yog muaj koj lub fwjchim peb txhaj yeej peb cov yeebncuab.
Kuv tsi ca sab rua kuv raab neev nti lossis kuv raab ntaaj has tas nwg yuav cawm tau kuv dlim;
tabsis tub yog koj cawm peb dlim ntawm peb cov yeebncuab, peb txhaj yeej cov tuabneeg kws ntxub peb.
Peb yuav naj nub qhuas koj hab ua koj tsaug moog ibtxhis le.
Tabsis nwgnuav koj tso peb tseg, hab ca peb swb luas; koj tsi nrug peb cov tubrog moog ntaus rog le lawm.
Koj ua rua peb tsiv ntawm peb cov yeebncuab rov qaab, hab txhua yaam kws yog peb tug, luas muab fuab moog lawm dlu lug.
Koj ca luas muab peb hlais ib yaam le hlais tej yaaj; Koj muab peb faib moog nyob thoob plawg rua txhua lub tebchaws.
Koj muab koj tsaav tuabneeg muag ua nqe pheej yig heev, zoo le puab tsi muaj nqes le.
Peb tej tuabneeg zej zog pum tej kws koj ua rua peb ntawd, ces puab saib tsi taug peb hab luag peb plig.
Koj muab peb ua ib zaaj kwvfuam rua pejkum tebchaws has, puab txhaj cu hau nto hab saib tsi taug peb le.
Kuv poob ntsejmuag kawg nkaus, kuv txaajmuag kawg le,
thaus kuv nov kuv cov yeebncuab hab cov tuabneeg kws ntxub kuv tej lug tshev hab thuam kuv.
Txawm yog tej ntawd lug raug peb los peb tseem ncu ntsoov koj, lossis tsi tso koj tej lug cog tseg kws koj muab cob rua peb.
Peb tsi tau ua saib tsi taug koj; peb tsi tau tawv nyom koj tej lug saamfwm.
Koj tsi paab peb hab muab peb tso rua paab tsaj qus, koj muab peb povtseg rua huv lub qhov kws tub tsaus ntuj nti.
Yog peb tso tseg tsi pehawm peb tug Vaajtswv; hab moog pe lwm tsaav tuabneeg tej vaajtswv
los Vaajyswv yeej paub tej nuav, rua qhov Vaajtswv paub tej kws peb lub sab xaav huv tuabsi.
Tabsis vim peb ntseeg koj, luas txhaj naj nub yuav tua peb, luas ua rua peb ib yaam le tug yaaj kws luas yuav caab moog tua.
Tug TSWV, ca le sawv! Vim le caag koj tsaug zug? Koj ca le sawv! Thov tsi xob tso peb tseg moog ibtxhis le!
Vim le caag koj tsiv nkaum peb? Hab koj txawm tsi ncu txug peb tej kev txomnyem hab kev nyuaj sab le?
Peb qaug puamtsuaj taag rua huv aav; peb pw txaajmuag ntsuav rua sau cov moov aav,
Thov koj ca le lug paab peb! Rua qhov koj txujkev hlub kws tsi paub kawg yog qhov kws cawm tau peb dlim!
Kuv lub sab puv nkaus tej lug zoo thaus kuv sau zaaj nkauj nuav rua tug vaajntxwv. Kuv tug nplaig npaaj rawv has tej lug sis dlhos ib yaam le tug kws sau ntawv tug cwjmem.
Koj yog tug kws zoo nraug tshaaj plawg tej txivneej huv tuabsi, hab koj has lug nplag lag xwb. Vaajtswv yeej foom koob moov rua koj moog ibtxhis le.
Tug vaajntxwv kws muaj fwjchim, ca le ris koj raab ntaaj rua ntawm dluav; koj yog tug muaj tshwjchim hab muaj koob meej.
Ca le caij neeg moog le tug muaj fwjchim hab muaj yeej, txhaj yuav tiv thaiv tau txujkev tseeb hab kev ncaaj nceeg. Koj tug zug nchaav yuav ua rua koj muaj yeej luj kawg nkaus!
Koj tej xub vug ntse zuag plag, tej xub vug ntawd yuav chob koj cov yeebncuab lub plawv; Ntau tsaav tuabneeg yuav qaug pawg lug ntawm koj kutaw.
Lub tebchaws kws Vaajtswv muab rua koj  yuav nyob moog ibtxhis tsi kawg le. Koj yuav kaav koj tsaav tuabneeg moog rua txujkev ncaaj nceeg.
Koj nyam kev ncaaj nceeg hab ntxub kev ua phem ua qas. Vim le nuav, tug TSWV kws yog koj tug Vaajtswv txhaj xaiv koj hab pub kev zoo sab rua koj ntau tshaaj lwm tug vaajntxwv huv tuabsi.
Muab tej tshuaj tsw qaab mules hab alu-es pleev koj tej rig tsho tsw qaab ntxag, huv koj lub loog kws muaj kaug ntxhw teeb kuas zoo nkauj, muaj cov ntaus nkauj nogncaas ua rua koj zoo sab.
Cov quaspuj kws nyob huv koj lub tsev, muaj ibtxha yog tej vaajntxwv cov ntxhais, hab nam vaajntxwv coj tej saw kub kws zoo kawg nkaus sawv ntawm koj lub zwmtxwv saab xis.
Vaajntxwv tug nkauj nyaab, ca le noog tej lug kws kuv has, tso plhuav koj tsaav tuabneeg hab koj cov neejtsaa tseg tsi xob ncu;
Koj kev zoo nkauj yuav ua rua vaajntxwv txaus sab heev, nwg yog koj tug tswv, koj yuavtsum fwm nwg.
Cov tuabneeg kws nyob peg lub nroog Tiles yuav nqaa khoom tuaj pub rua koj, cov tuabneeg npluanuj yuav tuaj nrug koj sis raug zoo.
Vaajntxwv tug ntxhais kws nyob huv lub loog zoo nkauj kawg nkaus le! Muab tej xuv kub kws tawg paaj nraug zeeg lug xaws nwg lub tsho.
Nwg naav lub tsho txaij nraug zeeg ua ntej loo moog cuag vaajntxwv, cov nam txais ntsuab ua ke kaaj nab lawv nwg qaab, hab puab puavleej yog cov kws moog cuag vaajntxwv.
Puab muaj kev lomzem zoo sab kawg moog rua huv vaajntxwv lub loog.
Kuv tug vaajntxwv, koj yuav muaj tub coob, sawv lug ua vaajntxwv hloov koj cov yawmkoob chaw, hab koj yuav tsaa puab lug kaav taagnrho lub nplajteb nuav.
Kuv zaaj nkauj yuav ua rua koj lub koob meej nto moo lug moog ibtxhis, hab txhua tug yuav qhuas koj moog taag koj tam neej.
Vaajtswv yog peb lub chaw nkaum hab yog peb tug dlaag tug zug, thaus twg muaj kev txomnyem, nwg npaaj txhij paab peb.
Txawm yog lub nplajteb nuav qeeg ua zug koog, hab tej roob saus taag rua huv qaab thu havtxwv;
hab txawm yog tej dlej havtxwv ndlaas ua suab nrov qeeg nkawg, ua rua tej roob qeeg ua zug koog los peb tsi ntshai le.
Muaj ib tug dlej nyob huv Vaajtswv lub nroog ua rua tuabneeg muaj kev zoo sab luag ntxhi, lub nroog ntawd yog lub nroog dlawbhuv kws muaj Vaajtswv tug kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus nyob.
Vaajtswv yuav nyob huv lub nroog ntawd hab lub nroog ntawd yuav tsi raug puamtsuaj ib zag le, thaus kaaj ntug txoog, nwg yuav lug paab lub nroog ntawd.
Txhua tsaav tuabneeg yuav ntshai heev, tej tebchaws yuav qeeg ua zug koog; Vaajtswv nthe nyooj lawg, lub nplajteb yaaj ntshis taag.
Tug TSWV kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus nrug nraim peb, Yakhauj tug Vaajtswv yog peb qhov chaw cawm sav.
Ca le lug hab saib tej kws tug TSWV tub ua taag lug lawm. Ca le lug saib tej txujci tseemceeb kws nwg ua nyob huv nplajteb nuav.
Nwg ua rua tej kev tsuv kev rog huv lub nplajteb taj tug; nwg luv tej qhaub neevnti, nwg muab tej muv luv dlaam pis dlawg, hab muab tej thaiv nav ntaaj coj moog pov hlawv huv tuabsi.
Nwg has tas, “Mej ca le tseg kag tsi xob sis tua, mej yuavtsum paub has tas kuv yog Vaajtswv tug kws kaav txhua tsaav tuabneeg, hab kaav lub nplajteb nuav huv tuabsi!”
Tug TSWV kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus nrug nraim peb, Yakhauj tug Vaajtswv yog peb qhov chaw cawm sav.
Ib tsoom pejxeem suavdlawg, mej ca le npuaj teg zoo sab! hu nkauj nrov nrov qhuas Vaajtswv.
Tug TSWV kws muaj fwjchim tshaaj plawg, nwg yog tug kws txaus ntshai kawg le, nwg yog tug vaajntxwv kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus, nwg kaav taagnrho lub nplajteb nuav.
Nwg pub peb kovyeej txhua tsaav tuabneeg, nwg ca peb kaav txhua lub tebchaws.
Nwg xaiv lub tebchaws kws peb nyob nuav rua peb, cov tuabneeg kws muaj teb muaj chaw nyob qhuas ntxhas yog nwg tsaav tuabneeg, puab yog cov kws nwg hlub ntaag.
Vaajtswv moog nyob sau nwg lub zwmtxwv, thaus Vaajtswv taabtom nce moog, muaj suab qw, suab raaj hab suab xyu zoo sab heev,
Ca le hu nkauj qhuas Vaajtswv, hu nkauj qhuas peb tug vaajntxwv!
Vaajtswv yog tug vaajntxwv kws kaav taagnrho lub nplajteb nuav, ca le hu nkauj qhuas nwg!
Vaajtswv nyob sau nwg lub zwmtxwv dlawbhuv, nwg kaav taagnrho txhua tsaav tuabneeg.

Txhua tsaav tuabneeg tej numtswv puavleej tuaj txoos ua ke nrug Anplahaas tug Vaajtswv tsaav tuabneeg. Nwg yog tug muaj fwjchim luj tshaaj tej tubrog huv tuabsi, nwg yog tug tswjfwm kws muaj fwjchim tshaaj plawg.
Tug TSWV yog tug muaj fwjchim hab tsimnyog qhuas, nyob huv peb tug Vaajtswv lub nroog sau nwg lub roob dlawbhuv.
Xi-oos yog Vaajtswv lub roob kws sab hab zoo nkauj kawg nkaus le, tug vaajntxwv kws muaj fwjchim luj lub nroog, yog qhov chaw zoo sab rua lub nplajteb nuav.
Vaajtswv qha has tas muaj kev cawm dlim huv lub nroog ntawd, nwg yog lub chaw faajxwm kws ruaj khov.
Tej vaajntxwv txhaj sis sau ua ke tuaj ntaus lub roob Xi-oos.
Tabsis thaus puab pum lub nroog ntawd, puab xaav tsi thoob le, puab ntshai hab tsiv rov qaab.
Puab ntshai ua ib ce tshee nyo ib yaam le tug quaspuj kws mob plaab yuav yug mivnyuas,
hab ib yaam le khaub zeeg cua ntsawj tej nkoj ntxeev.

Peb tub nov tej txujci tseemceeb kws Vaajtswv tau ua taag lug lawm, hab taamsim nuav peb qhovmuag tub pum tej txujci ntawd nyob huv peb tug Vaajtswv kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus lub nroog; nwg yuav tsomkwm lub nroog ntawd kuas nyob kaaj sab lug moog ibtxhis.
Vaajtswv, peb lub sab xaav ntsoov txug koj txujkev hlub kws nrug nraim peb huv koj lub Tuamtsev xwb.
Tej tuabneeg nyob txhua qhov chaw puavleej qhuas koj nkaus xwb, hab koj lub koob meej nrov nchaa moo lug moog thoob plawg huv qaab ntuj nuav. Koj tswjfwm ncaaj nceeg;
thov pub rua cov tuabneeg sau roob Xi-oos muaj kev zoo sab! Koj yeej txav txim ncaaj nceeg, thov kuas Yudas tej nroog tau nyob kaaj sab lug!
Vaajtswv tsaav tuabneeg moog ncig lub roob Xi-oos hab suav tej chaw tsomfaaj,
moog saib tug ntsaa yeej hab tshuaj saib tej chaw faajxwm kuas tseeb, mej txhaj yuav pav tau qha rua tam tom ntej paub has tas,
“Tug Vaajtswv nuav yog peb tug Vaajtswv moog ibtxhis tsi kawg le, nwg yuav coj peb ib tam dhau rua ib tam moog ibtxhis le.”
Mej suavdlawg ca le noog zaaj nuav! Taagnrho tej tuabneeg kws nyob txhua qhov chaw ca le tig qhovntsej noog zaaj nuav,
tsi has tug hlub tug yau zoo ib yaam nkaus, hab tug muaj tug pluag nyob ua ke.
Tej kws kuv lub sab xaav yeej tseeb, kuv yuav has tej lug kws txawj ntse xwb.
Kuv yuav tig qhovntsej ua tuab zoo noog tej paajlug, hab txhais kuas tau tej ntsab lug ib yaam le thaus kuv ntaus nkauj nogncaas.
Kuv tsi ntshai thaus muaj kev txomnyem hab muaj yeebncuab tuaj vij kuv,
cov tuabneeg phem ntawd ca sab rua puab tej kev npluanuj hab khaav ntxhas rua puab tej kev muaj nyaj txag xwb.
Tsi muaj leejtwg yuav rov cawm tau nwg dlim, nwg tsi muaj peevxwm txhwv tau nwg txujsa ntawm Vaajtswv lug.
Rua qhov tug nqe kws them tuabneeg txujsa kim heev. Tej kws nwg coj moog them yeej tsi txaus tug nqe kuas
tso nwg dlim huv lub qhov ntxaa, kuas nwg tau txujsa nyob moog ibtxhis.

Suavdlawg yeej paub has tas, txawm yog cov tuabneeg txawj ntse los puavleej tuag ib yaam le cov tuabneeg kws tsi muaj kev txawj ntse hab cov tuabneeg ruag. Puab tso puab tej nyaj txag hab txhua yaam rua puab tej xeebntxwv.
Puab lub qhov ntxaa  yog puab lub tsev kws puab nyob moog ibtxhis ntaag; txawm yog puab muaj laj muaj teb ntau los puab tsuas tau lub qhov ntxaa kws yog qhov chaw kws puab yuav nyob moog le.
Tuabneeg lub koob meej hab kev muaj txag npluanuj yeej paab tsi tau kuas nwg dlim txujkev tuag; nwg yeej yuav tuag ib yaam le tej tsaj.
Saib yuav muaj dlaabtsi tshwmsim rua cov tuabneeg kws puab rov ca sab rua puab nkaus xwb, hab cov kws txaus sab rua puab lub neej zoo le caag?

Puab raug kev puamtsuaj tuag ib yaam le tej yaaj, hab kev tuag yog puab tug tswv. Cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg yuav yeej puab taagnrho, rua qhov puab lub cev yuav lwj sai rua huv tubtuag teb qhov kws nyob dleb puab tej tsev.
Tabsis Vaajtswv yuav cawm kuv, nwg yuav cawm kuas kuv dlim ntawm txujkev tuag lub fwjchim.
Tsi xob nyuaj sab thaus ib tug tuabneeg twg npluanuj, txawm yog nwg muaj nyaj txag ntau npaum le caag los
thaus nwg tuag lawm, nwg yeej coj tsi tau dlaabtsi nrug nwg moog le, nwg tej nyaj txag yuav tsi nrug nwg moog rua huv qhov ntxaa.
Txawm yog tug tuabneeg kws nwg txaus sab rua nwg lub neej, hab luas qhuas nwg, vim nwg lub neej zoo heev
los nwg yeej yuav tau moog nrug nwg cov yawmkoob nyob huv tubtuag teb qhov kws tsaus ntuj nti moog ibtxhis.
Tuabneeg lub koob meej hab kev muaj txag npluanuj yeej paab tsi tau nwg dlim txujkev tuag; nwg yeej yuav tuag ib yaam le tej tsaj.
Tug TSWV, Vaajtswv tug kws muaj Fwjchim luj kawg nkaus has, nwg hu thoob plawg nplajteb, nubtuaj ti nkaus nubpoob.
Vaajtswv ci ntsaa ab sau Xi-oos kws yog lub nroog zoo nkauj kawg nkaus.
Peb tug Vaajtswv yuav lug, tabsis nwg yuav tsi lug ntsag tu, muaj nplaim tawg cig ntswj pis yog ntawm nwg hauv ntej, muaj khaub zeeg cua ntsawj puagncig nwg.
Nwg hu ntuj hab nplajteb nrug ua timkhawv saib nwg txav txim rua nwg tsaav tuabneeg.
Nwg has tas, “Sau kuv tsaav tuabneeg kws ncaaj nceeg lug cuag kuv, puab yog cov tuabneeg kws muab tsaj tua ua khoom fij hab nrug kuv coglug tseg lawm.”
Lub ntuj qha has tas, Vaajtswv yog tug ncaaj nceeg, hab nwg yog tug txav txim ntaag.
“Kuv tsaav tuabneeg ca le noog, kuv yuav qha mej, cov Yixalayees, kuv yuav ua timkhawv kom mej ntaag. Kuv yog Vaajtswv kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv.
Kuv tshev mej tsi yog vim tej tsaj kws mej coj tuaj tua theej txhoj, hab tej tsaj kws mej pheej coj tuaj tua hlawv fij rua kuv.
Kuv yeej tsi yuav tej txiv nyuj kws mej yug tom tshaav zaub lossis tsi yuav mej tej tshis,
txhua yaam tsaj kws nyob tom haav zoov hab tej nyuj kws nyob puv nkaus ntau txheeb lub roob los puavleej yog kuv tug.
Taagnrho tej noog hab txhua yaam kws muaj sa nyob tom tej nraag puavleej yog kuv le.
“Yog kuv tshaib plaab, kuv yuav tsi thov ntawm mej noj, rua qhov lub nplajteb hab txhua tsaav yaam puavleej yog kuv le.
Kuv noj nqaj nyuj lossis haus ntshaav tshis hab los?
Ca le muab tej khoom kws mej ua Vaajtswv tsaug fij rua Vaajtswv  hab muab rua Vaajtswv tug kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus lawv le mej tau coglug tseg lawm.
Thaus mej raug kev txomnyem, ca le hu thov kuv, kuv yuav paab kuas mej dlim, hab mej yuav qhuas kuv.”
Tabsis Vaajtswv has rua cov tuabneeg sab phem tas, “Vim le caag mej laam muab kuv tej lug saamfwm coj moog has? Vim le caag mej laam pav txug kuv tej lug cog tseg?
Mej tub tsi kaam ca kuv ntuag mej; mej tsi leeg yuav kuv tej lug saamfwm.
Thaus mej pum cov tuabneeg ua tubsaab, mej txawm nrug puab sis raug zoo hab moog koom nrug cov tuabneeg ntxag luas tej quaspuj luas tej quasyawg ua ib paab.
“Mej pheej naj nub has lug phem lug qas, mej pheej tsi tswj mej lub qhovncauj kws has lug dlaag.
Mej yeej npaaj rawv nrhav lug ab lam mej tej kwvtij hab nrhav txim rua puab.
Mej tub ua tej nuav taag lug lawm, kuv yeej tsi has mej ib lus le, yog le ntawd, mej txhaj xaav has tas kuv zoo ib yaam le mej hab. Tabsis nwgnuav kuv tshev mej hab muab tej nuav nthuav qha rua mej.
“Mej cov kws tsi quavntsej kuv, mej ca le noog kuv has, lossis yuav ca kuv ua kuas mej puamtsuaj hab tsi muaj leejtwg cawm tau kuas mej dlim le.
Tug kws muab nwg tej khoom fij ua kuv tsaug txhaj yog tug kws fwm kuv, hab kuv yuav cawm txhua tug kws noog kuv lug kuas dlim.”
Vaajtswv, thov taabncuab kuv, rua qhov koj muaj txujkev hlub kws tsi paub kawg. Rua qhov koj txujkev taabncuab kws luj kawg nkaus tub tshem kuv tej kev txhum huv tuabsi lawm.
Thov ntxuav kuv tej kev phem kev qas huv tuabsi moog, hab ua kuas kuv dlawbhuv tsi muaj ib qho txhum le.
Kuv leeg kuv tej kev txhum, kuv paub has tas kuv yeej tau ua txhum,

kuv tau ua txhum rua koj, rua koj tuab leeg xwb, hab ua tej kws koj pum has tas yog kev phem kev qas. Yog le ntawd, qhov kws koj txav txim rua kuv yeej yog kev yog cai lawm, koj yeej muaj cai rau txim rua kuv lawm.
Txij thaus kuv nam yug kuv lug, kuv yeej ua txhum lawm, thaus kuv nam suab kuv rua huv plaab kuv yeej muaj txim lawm.
Tug kws muaj lub sab dlawb sab zoo hab has lug tseeb yog tug kws muaj kev kaaj sab, thov koj pub koj lub tswvyim rua kuv.
Thov koj muab hixauv ntxuav kuv tej kev txhum moog, kuv txhaj yuav tsi muaj ib qho qho txhum le; thov ntxuav kuv tej kev txhum, kuv txhaj yuav dlawb dlua tej dlaus.
Thov koj pub kuv tau nov tej suab lomzem zoo sab, txawm yog koj ua rua kuv mob hab ua rua kuv lub sab ndlais rhe lawm los kuv yuav rov zoo sab dlua ib zag ntxiv.
Thov koj tsi xob saib kuv tej kev txhum, hab thov koj tshem kuv tej kev phem kev qas huv tuabsi moog.
Vaajtswv, thov koj tsim kuas kuv muaj lub sab dlawb, hab thov koj muab lub sab tshab rua kuv kuas kuv noog koj lug.
Thov koj tsi xob ntab kuv tawm ntawm koj lub xubndlag moog, thov tsi xob rhu koj tug ntsujplig dlawbhuv tawm ntawm kuv moog.
Thov koj cawm kuv, kuas kuv rov muaj kev zoo sab, thov koj paab kuas kuv txawj noog koj lug.
Yog koj ua le ntawd, kuv yuav qha koj tej lug rua cov tuabneeg kws ua txhum, ces puab txhaj yuav rov lug cuag koj.
Vaajtswv, thov koj tseg kuv txujsa hab cawm kuas kuv dlim, ces kuv yuav zoo sab hlo moog qha koj txujkev ncaaj nceeg.
Tug TSWV, thov koj qheb kuv lub qhovncauj kuas kuv txawj qhuas koj.
Koj yeej tsi yuav tej khoom kws luas coj tuaj fij, yog koj yuav tej ntawd kuv yeej yuav coj tuaj. Koj tsi txaus sab rua tej khoom fij kws luas coj tuaj hlawv fij rua koj.
Vaajtswv, tej kws kuv coj tuaj fij rua koj ces yog kuv lub sab mog sab muas xwb, koj yuav tsi fee plhu rua tug kws txu fwjchim hab leeg nwg tej kev txhum ib zag le.
Vaajtswv, thov koj ua sab dlawb sab zoo rua lub nroog Xi-oos hab paab nwg, thov koj khu tug ntsaa yeej kws thaiv lub nroog Yeluxalees dlua tshab.
Ces koj txhaj yuav txaus sab rua tej khoom kws peb coj tuaj fij rua koj, hab tug txiv nyuj kws coj tuaj tua hlawv fij taagnrho rua koj sau lub thaaj.
Tug tuabneeg muaj fwjchim, vim le caag koj khaav ntxhas rua koj txujkev ua phem ua qas? Vaajtswv txujkev ncaaj nceeg yog txuj kws nyob moog ibtxhis.
Koj npaaj tswvyim ua kuas lwm tug raug kev puamtsuaj, koj tug nplaig ntse ib yaam le nav chais, koj yeej ibtxwm has lug dlaag xwb.
Koj nyam kev phem tshaaj kev zoo hab nyam kev dlaag tshaaj kev ncaaj nceeg.
Koj yog tuabneeg dlaag, koj txhaj nyam has tej lug kws chob luas sab xwb.

Yog le ntawd, Vaajtswv yuav ua kuas koj raug kev puamtsuaj moog ibtxhis, nwg yuav tuav koj ca hab muab koj ntab tawm huv koj lub tsev moog; nwg yuav muab koj tshem tawm huv lub nplajteb kws cov tuabneeg muaj sa nyob nuav moog.
Cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg yuav pum zaaj nuav hab puab ntshai kawg le, ces puab yuav luag koj plig hab has tas,
“Mej saib, tug tuabneeg kws tsi ca Vaajtswv ua tug paab nwg, tabsis nwg pheej ca sab rua nwg tej nyaj txag hab pheej nrhav kev ua phem nkaus xwb.”
Tabsis kuv zoo ib yaam le tsob txiv ntoo roj kws hlub mog nyoos huv Vaajtswv lub tsev, kuv ca sab rua nwg txujkev hlub kws tsi paub kawg.
Vaajtswv, kuv yuav ua koj tsaug tsi paub kawg rua tej kws koj tub ua pub rua kuv taag lug lawm; kuv yuav qha koj txujkev ua zoo taabmeeg koj tsaav tuabneeg.
Cov tuabneeg ruag xaav has tas “Tsi muaj Vaajtswv.” Puab txhua tug puavleej yog tuabneeg sab phem, hab puab ua tej kws phem hab qas kawg nkaus, puab tsi muaj ib tug ua zoo le.
Vaajtswv nyob sau ntuj saib ntsoov tuaj rua tuabneeg txhua tug, saib puas muaj ib tug txawj ntse hab pehawm nwg.
Tabsis puab puavleej tig nrausqaum rua Vaajtswv, puab txhua tug puavleej ua phem ib yaam nkaus. Puab cov ntawd tsi muaj ib tug ua zoo le, txawm yog ib tug los muaj le.
Vaajtswv nug has tas, “Puab puas paub cov tuabneeg txhum ntawd tsi quavntsej le los? Puab nyag kuv tsaav tuabneeg tug, hab puab tsi pehawm kuv le.”

Tabsis puab yuav tau tej kev txhawj ntshai kws puab yeej tsi tau raug dlua le, rua qhov Vaajtswv yuav muab nwg tsaav tuabneeg cov yeebncuab tej pobtxhaa povtseg. Vaajtswv tsi leeg yuav puab hab cov Yixalayees yuav yeej puab.
Thov kuas txujkev cawm dlim huv lub nroog Xi-oos tuaj rua tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees! Tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees yuav zoo sab kawg nkaus, thaus Vaajtswv ua kuas puab rov muaj kev vaammeej dlua ntxiv.
Vaajtswv, thov koj lub fwjchim cawm kuas kuv dlim; thov koj tug zug nchaav tso kuas kuv dlim!
Vaajtswv, thov koj nov kuv tej lug hab noog kuv tej lug thov.
Cov tuabneeg khaavtheeb taabtom tuaj tawmtsaam kuv, cov tuabneeg limham taabtom nrhav kuv tua, puab yog cov tuabneeg kws tsi quavntsej txug Vaajtswv.
Tabsis Vaajtswv yog tug paab kuv. Tug TSWV yog tug tiv thaiv kuv.
Thov Vaajtswv siv kuv cov yeebncuab tej kev phem rau txim rov rua puab. nwg yuav ua kuas puab raug puamtsuaj, rua qhov nwg yog tug kws ncaaj nceeg.
Tug TSWV, kuv yuav zoo sab hlo muab khoom fij rua koj, kuv yuav ua koj tsaug, rua qhov koj yog tug muaj sab dlawb sab zoo.
Koj tau cawm kuv dlim ntawm kuv tej kev ntxhuv sab, hab kuv pum ntsoov kuv cov yeebncuab swb lawm.
Vaajtswv, thov koj nov kuv tej lug, thov tsi xob tsi quavntsej kuv tej lug thov.
Thov noog kuv tej lug hab teb tej kws kuv thov koj, kuv nyuaj sab heev, ua rua kuv ib ce tuag taag.
Kuv cov yeebncuab hem kuv, ua rua kuv ntshai kawg le, cov tuabneeg sab phem tsimtxom kuv, ua rua kuv raug kev puamtsuaj. Puab ua rua kuv raug kev ntxhuv sab; puab chim rua kuv hab ntxub kuv kawg le.
Kuv ntshai kawg nkaus hab txujkev tuag tsuam rawv kuv.
Kuv ntshai ua ib ce tshee nyo hab txhaav taag, txujkev txhawj ntshai ua rua kuv taag kev ca sab lawm.
Kuv xaav kuas kuv muaj tis ib yaam le tug nquab. Kuv yuav yaa moog nrhav chaw su.
Kuv yuav yaa moog dleb dleb hab moog nyob tom roob mojsaab qhua.
Kuv yuav maaj nrooj moog nrhav tsev rua kuv nyob nkaum tej khaub zeeg cua, hab tej tuamtsaam naag.
Tug TSWV, thov koj ua kuas kuv cov yeebncuab has lug tsi sis hum! Kuv pum tej kev limham hab tsi sis humxeeb nyob puv nkaus huv lub nroog,
tej ntawd nyob puagncig lub nroog nruab nub hab mo ntuj, kev ua phem hab kev kub ntxhuv nyob puv nkaus huv lub nroog.
Muaj kev puamtsuaj nyob txhua thaaj chaw, kev tsimtxom hab kev limham nyob puv nkaus tom tej kev.
Yog ib tug yeebncuab luag kuv plig, kuv yeej ua taug sab ntev, yog ib tug yeebncuab saib tsi taug kuv, kuv yuav tsiv nkaum nwg.
Tabsis tub yog koj kws yog kuv tug phoojywg, kuv tug kwvluag hab tug kws txheeb ze kuv.
Peb ib leeg yeej qha sab hlo rua ib leeg, hab ua ke pehawm Vaajtswv huv lub Tuamtsev.
Thov kuas kuv cov yeebncuab tuag ua ntej puab lub noobnyoog kws teem tseg, thov kuas puab ca le moog caj rua huv tubtuag teb! Kev phem nyob puv nkaus huv puab tej tsev hab huv puab lub sab.
Tabsis kuv thov tug TSWV kws yog Vaajtswv paab kuv hab nwg yuav cawm kuas kuv dlim.
Tej lug kws kuv ywg hab quaj thaus sawv ntxuv, thaus taav su, hab thaus tsaus ntuj yuav nrov moog txug nwg hab nwg yuav nov kuv lub suab.
Nwg yuav coj kuv huv lub tshaav rog kws tawmtsaam yeebncuab rov qaab lug tsi raug mob le caag.
Vaajtswv tug kws kaav moog ibtxhis, yuav nov kuv tej lug thov hab kuv tej yeebncuab yuav swb, rua qhov puab tsi kaam hloov sab hab tsi paub ntshai Vaajtswv.
Kuv tug qub phoojywg thaus u ntxeev sab tawmtsaam nwg cov phoojywg; nwg rhuav nwg tej lug cog tseg.
Nwg tej lug mog lug muas kawg le, tabsis nwg lub sab puv nkaus tej kev ntxub ntxaug; nwg tej lug nplag ib yaam le roj, tabsis tej lug ntawd ntse ib yaam le nav ntaaj.
Ca le muab mej tej kev nyuaj sab tso rua tug TSWV, nwg yuav tsomkwm mej, nwg yeej ibtxwm tsi tso cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg tseg le.
Tabsis Vaajtswv, koj yuav coj cov tuabneeg tua tuabneeg hab cov tuabneeg dlaag moog rua huv puab tej qhov ntxaa thaus puab tseem yog ib nraab neej. Tabsis kuv yuav tso sab plhuav rua koj.
Vaajtswv, thov koj taabncuab kuv, rua qhov kuv raug luas tawmtsaam, kuv cov yeebncuab tsimtxom kuv txhua lub sijhawm.
Tug TSWV kws muaj fwjchim, kuv cov yeebncuab tawmtsaam kuv ib nub tsaus ntuj ndlais. Cov kws tuaj tawmtsaam kuv ntawd coob kawg le.
Thaus kuv muaj kev txhawj ntshai, kuv ca sab rua koj xwb.
Kuv ca sab rua Vaajtswv kuv tsi ntshai le, kuv qhuas nwg vim nwg tej lug cog tseg. Noobneej puas muaj peevxwm ua tau le caag rua kuv?
Kuv cov yeebncuab tsimtxom kuv ib nub tsaus ntuj, puab tuavhuv nrhav kev ua kuas kuv raug mob.
Puab sis sau tuaj nkaum rua huv tej chaw kws nraim nkoog, soj txhua yaam kws kuv ua hab nrhav kev tua kuv povtseg.
Vaajtswv, thov koj ca le rau txim rua puab tej kev ua phem nuav hab ca koj txujkev chim ua kuas puab raug kev puamtsuaj!
Koj yeej paub kuv raug kev txomnyem npaum le caag; koj yeej teev kuv tej kua muag tseg huv tuabsi. Kuv tej kua muag koj puas tau muab sau tseg rua huv koj phoo ntawv?
Nub kws kuv hu koj paab, kuv cov yeebncuab yuav thim rov qaab. Kuv paub has tas Vaajtswv tuaj kuv tog,
kuv qhuas tug TSWV, vim nwg tej lug cog tseg.
Kuv ca sab rua nwg, hab kuv yuav tsi ntshai. Tej tuabneeg nplajteb puas muaj peevxwm ua tau le caag rua kuv?
Vaajtswv, kuv yuav muab khoom tuaj fij rua koj lawv le kuv tau coglug tseg lawm; kuv yuav muab tej khoom kws kuv ua tsaug pub rua koj,
rua qhov koj tau cawm kuv dlim ntawm txujkev tuag hab tsi pub kuv qaug. Kuv txhaj moog tau rua ntawm Vaajtswv xubndlag kws yog tug dluab ci rua cov tuabneeg kws muaj sa nyob.

Vaajtswv, thov koj taabncuab kuv! Thov koj taabncuab kuv lauj, rua qhov kuv lug cuag koj ua tug paab cawm kuv dlim. Kuv nrhav tau qhov chaw roog kuv huv koj ob phob tis moog txug thaus tej khaub zeeg cua dlhau lawm.
Kuv tsaa ncauj thov Vaajtswv tug kws muaj Fwjchim Luj tshaaj plawg, thov tug Vaajtswv kws pub kuv muaj txhua yaam tsi tu.

Nwg yuav teb kuv tej lug thov sau ntuj tuaj hab cawm kuas kuv dlim; nwg yuav yeej cov tuabneeg kws tsimtxom kuv. Vaajtswv yuav qha nwg txujkev hlub kws tsi paub kawg hab nwg txujkev ncaaj nceeg rua kuv.

Kuv cov yeebncuab nyob puag puagncig kuv, puab zoo ib yaam le tej tsuv ntxhuav tog tum tuabneeg noj. Puab tej nav ntse ib yaam le tej muv hab tej xub vug, puab tej nplaig ntse zuag plag ib yaam le nav ntaaj.
Vaajtswv, thov qha koj lub fwjchim kws luj kawg nkaus rua sau nruab ntug, hab qha koj tej txujci kuas puv nkaus huv nplajteb nuav.
Kuv cov yeebncuab cuab vaag yuav khwb kuas tau kuv, kuv muaj kev nyuaj sab kawg le. Puab khawb qhov tog kuv kev, tabsis puab rov poob taag rua huv lub qhov ntawd lawm.
Vaajtswv, kuv tso sab plhuav lawm lauj! Kuv yuav hu nkauj hab qhuas koj moog le!
Kuv lub sab, ca le tsim dlheev! Kuv tej nkauj nogncaas hab tej raaj, ca le raag dlheev! Kuv yuav tsaa kuas lub nub sawv.
Tug TSWV, kuv yuav ua koj tsaug taabmeeg txhua lub tebchaws; kuv yuav qhuas koj taabmeeg txhua tsaav tuabneeg.
Koj txujkev hlub kws tsi paub kawg sab moog nto ntuj, koj txujkev ncaaj nceeg sab moog txug sau nruab ntug.
Vaajtswv, thov qha koj lub fwjchim kws luj kawg nkaus rua sau nruab ntug hab qha koj tej txujci kuas puv nkaus rua huv nplajteb nuav.
Puas yog mej cov numtswv yeej ibtxwm txav txim tsi ncaaj nceeg? Mej puas txav txim ncaaj rua txhua tug?
Tsi yog le ntawd! Mej tsuas xaav ntsoov rua txujkev ua phem xwb hab ua limham kawg nkaus rua lub tebchaws.
Cov tuabneeg ua phem yeej ua kev txhum moog taag puab simneej; puab yeej dlaag txij thaus yug tau puab lug.
Puab muaj taug ib yaam le naab; puab ntsaws qhovntsej kuas tsi nov lug ib yaam le tug naab raaj kubsai laag ntseg
kws yeej tsi nov tug dlib naab lub suab lossis nov tug kws txawj ua khawvkoob tej lug ntxag hlo le.
Vaajtswv, thov koj ca le muab cov tsuv ntxhuav nuav tej kaug tsoo kuas luv.
Thov kuas puab pluj moog ib yaam le tej dlej kws muab nqug povtseg, thov kuas puab raug luas tsuj ib yaam le tej nroj tsuag rua huv plawv kev.
Thov kuas puab zoo le cov qwj kws yaaj taag rua huv lub plhaub lawm. Thov kuas puab zoo ib yaam le tug mivnyuas mog kws yug tau lug xwb tub tuag lawm tsi tau pum lub nub.
Thaus puab tsi tau paub tej nuav, puab tub raug muab txav tu taag ib yaam le tej nroj tsuag lawm. Thaus Vaajtswv chim heev, nwg yuav muab puab tshuab moog povtseg thaus puab tseem muaj sa nyob.
Cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg yuav zoo sab heev thaus puab pum cov tuabneeg txhum raug txim. Puab yuav kwm cov tuabneeg sab phem tej ntshaav moog.
Tej tuabneeg yuav has zum zawg tas, “Cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg yeej tau txais nqe zug, tseeb tag, Vaajtswv yuav txav txim rua tuabneeg nplajteb.”
Kuv tug Vaajtswv, thov cawm kuas kuv dlim ntawm kuv cov yeebncuab, thov tsomkwm kuv kuas kuv dlim ntawm cov tuabneeg kws tawmtsaam kuv!
Thov cawm kuas kuv dlim ntawm cov tuabneeg sab phem, thov paab kuas kuv dlim ntawm cov tuabneeg tua tuabneeg!
Taamsim nuav puab yeej zuv rawv tog tua kuv povtseg, cov tuabneeg limham sis sau tuaj tawmtsaam kuv. Tug TSWV, tsi yog vim kuv lub txim lossis tej kev txhum kws kuv ua.
Kuv yeej tsi tau ua txhum, puab ca le maaj ceev nrooj tuaj tawmtsaam kuv xwb. Thov koj tsaa qhovmuag saib kuv hab lug paab kuv.

Tug TSWV kws yog Vaajtswv tug muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus, ca le sawv tseeg hab lug paab kuv; cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv, thov koj tsaa qhovmuag saib zaaj nuav! Thov koj ca le sawv tseeg lug hab rau txim rua cov tuabneeg nruj tsiv, thov tsi xob taabncuab txug cov tuabneeg ntxeev sab ntawd le.
Thaus tsaus ntuj puab rov qaab lug hab qw zum zawg ib yaam le cov dlev kws tum ncig lub nroog.
Ca le noog puab tej lug thuam hab tej lug tshev. Puab tej nplaig ntse zuag plag le nav ntaaj huv puab qhovncauj, puab tseem xaav has tas yeej tsi muaj tuabneeg nov puab tej lug le.
Tabsis tug TSWV, koj luag puab plig kawg le; koj thuam cov tuabneeg kws nruj tsiv.
Vaajtswv, kuv ca sab ntsoov rua koj tug zug luj zug nchaav, koj yog kuv qhov chaw cawm sav.
Kuv tug Vaajtswv yeej hlub kuv hab yuav lug paab kuv, nwg yuav ca kuv saib ntsoov kuv cov yeebncuab swb.

Vaajtswv, thov koj tsi xob tua puab povtseg, nyob tsaam kuv tsaav tuabneeg tsi ncu qaab puab lawm. Tug TSWV kws yog tug tsomkwm peb, thov koj tug zug luj zug nchaav ua kuas puab swb hab tawg tsiv moog.
Kev txhum nyob ntawm puab dlaim tawv ncauj, puab tej lug puavleej yog kev txhum xwb, thov kuas puab raug nteg vim puab txujkev khaavtheeb! Rua qhov puab tej lug yog lug tsawm hab lug dlaag xwb.

Koj ca le ua kuas puab puamtsuaj, vim koj chim, thov ua kuas puab puamtsuaj tu noob nrho moog. Ces suavdlawg txhaj paub has tas Vaajtswv yog tug kws kaav tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees hab nwg kaav thoob plawg huv nplajteb nuav.
Thaus tsaus ntuj, kuv cov yeebncuab rov lug, puab qw zum zawg ib yaam le cov dlev tsej ncig lub nroog,
puab zoo ib yaam le cov dlev kws nrhav noj hab nyooj sis txeeb noj.

Tabsis kuv yuav hu nkauj qhuas koj tug zug luj zug nchaav, txhua taagkig kuv hu nkauj qhuas koj txujkev hlub kws tsi paub kawg. Koj yog kuv lub chaw cawm sav, yog lub tsev rua kuv nkaum thaus kuv raug kev txomnyem.
kuv yuav qhuas koj, koj yog tug tsomkwm kuv. Vaajtswv yog kuv lub chaw cawm sav. Vaajtswv txhaj yog tug hlub kuv.
Vaajtswv, koj muab peb tso tseg hab koj ua rua peb swb lawm, koj tau chim heev rua peb, tabsis nwgnuav thov koj tig rov lug paab peb.
Koj tau muab lub tebchaws cu ua zug koog, hab koj muab phua tawg rhe lawm, thov koj ca le khu nwg tej qhov txhaab taamsim nuav, rua qhov nwg tawg ua ntau dlaim lawm.
Koj ua rua koj tsaav tuabneeg raug kev txomnyem luj kawg le, peb dlaa ntxeev laj khwb rwg ib yaam le peb qaug cawv.
Koj tsaa ib tug chij rua cov kws fwm koj kuas puab tsiv dlim ntawm txujkev puamtsuaj.
Thov koj lub fwjchim cawm kuas peb dlim, thov teb peb tej lug thov, kuas cov tuabneeg kws koj hlub txhaj yuav tau txais kev cawm dlim.
Vaajtswv has lug ntawm chaav pehawm nwg tuaj has tas, “Ntawm txujkev muaj yeej kuv yuav muab lub nroog Sekhees faib hab muab lub Haav Xukaus pub rua kuv tsaav tuabneeg.
Nkile-as yog kuv tug, hab Manaxes los yog kuv tug ib yaam nkaus, Efalayees yog kuv lub mom hlau hab Yudas yog kuv tug cwj.
Cov Mau-am yog kuv lub taig ntxuav taw; hab kuv yuav hle kuv txhais khau pov moog rua sau Edoos; kuv yuav qw has tas, kuv yeej cov Filitees lawm.”
Vaajtswv, leejtwg yuav coj kuv moog rua huv lub nroog kws muaj ntsaa yeej khov kho? Leejtwg yuav coj kuv moog rua huv Edoos?
Tsi yog koj tub muab peb tso povtseg lawm los? Tsi yog koj tsi kaam tawm nrug peb cov tubrog moog lawm los?
Thov paab peb tawmtsaam peb cov yeebncuab, yog noobneej paab xwb tsi muaj qaabhau le.
Yog has tas Vaajtswv tuaj peb tog peb txhaj yuav yeej, nwg yuav kovyeej peb cov yeebncuab.
Vaajtswv, thov koj nov kuv lub suab quaj, thov noog kuv tej lug thov lauj!
Thaus kuv taag kev ca sab hab nyob nrug dleb kuv lub tsev lawm, kuv thov koj paab kuv. Thov koj coj kuv moog rua ntawm qhov chaw cawm sav,
rua qhov koj yog tug tiv thaiv kuv, koj yog kuv lub chaw tsomfaaj kws tawmtsaam kuv cov yeebncuab ntaag.
Thov ca kuv nyob huv koj lub tuamtsev moog taag kuv simneej, thov ca kuv nkaum kaaj sab lug huv qaab koj ob phob tis.
Vaajtswv, koj tub nov kuv tej lug cog tseg lawm, hab koj tub muab tej kws yog cov tuabneeg fwm koj le tug rua kuv lawm.
Thov koj ntxiv noobnyoog rua vaajntxwv kuas muaj sa nyob ntau xyoo, thov ca nwg ua vaajntxwv moog le.
Vaajtswv, thov ca nwg ua tug kaav moog ibtxhis ntawm koj lub xubndlag, thov tsomkwm nwg ntawm koj txujkev hlub kws tsi paub kawg hab kev ncaaj nceeg.
Yog le ntawd, kuv yuav naj nub hu nkauj qhuas koj moog le, ib yaam le kuv tau coglug fij khoom pub rua koj txhua txhua nub.
Kuv ua sab ntev tog Vaajtswv ua tug cawm kuv, kuv muab sab npuab nwg tuab leeg xwb.
Nwg tuab leeg txhaj yog tug tsomkwm kuv hab cawm kuv dlim, nwg yog tug tiv thaiv kuv, hab kuv yuav tsi swb ib zag le.
Mej suavdlawg tseem yuav tawmtsaam tug tuabneeg ntawd moog txug thaus twg? nwg tub tsi muaj zug npaum le tug ntsaa laajkaab kws tub qaug taag lawm los sav.
Mej tsuas xaav txu tug tuabneeg kws muaj koob meej, hab mej nyam has tej lug dlaag xwb. Mej lub ncauj foom koob moov, tabsis mej lub sab foom tsi zoo.
Kuv muab sab npuab Vaajtswv tuab leeg xwb, nwg txhaj yog tug kws kuv ca sab.
Nwg tuab leeg txhaj yog tug tsomkwm hab cawm kuv dlim, nwg yog tug tiv thaiv kuv, hab kuv yuav tsi swb ib zag le.
Vaajtswv yog tug cawm kuv dlim hab pub kuv muaj koob meej, nwg yog tug tsomkwm kuv zoo heev hab nwg yog kuv lub chaw nkaum.
Kuv tsaav tuabneeg, mej yuavtsum ca sab rua Vaajtswv txhua lub sijhawm. Qha mej lub sab rua nwg, rua qhov nwg yog peb lub chaw cawm sav.
Tej tuabneeg zoo ib yaam le luas ua paa xwb, tug hlub tug yau los tsi muaj nqes dlaabtsi le. Muab puab tso rua sau teev luj los puab tsi tsuam teev le, puab tseem sib tshaaj tej paa hab.

Mej tsi xob xaav has tas ua nruj ua tsiv ces yuav tau luas tug yuav, tsi xob ca sab has tas, moog nyag luas tug ces yuav tau dlawb tau dlo. Txawm yog mej yuav muaj txag npluanuj ntau zuj zug los tsi xob qaug rua tej ntawd.
Kuv nov Vaajtswv has ntau zag has tas, lub fwjchim yog nwg le,
hab nwg txujkev hlub yeej tsi paub kawg. Tug TSWV, koj yog tug kws yuav muab nqe zug rua txhua tug lawv le nyag teg num.
Vaajtswv, koj yog kuv tug Vaajtswv, kuv tog ntsoov koj kuv lub sab xaav tau koj ib yaam le thaaj aav qhuav kws tsi muaj dlej; kuv tug ntsujplig nqhes koj qhuav sab qhawv.
Thov kuas kuv pum koj huv chaav kws tuabneeg tuaj pehawm koj, thov ca kuv pum koj lub fwjchim hab koj tug tshwjchim kws luj kawg nkaus.
Koj txujkev hlub kws tsi paub kawg zoo dlua txujsa, vim le ntawd kuv yuav qhuas koj.
Kuv yuav ua koj tsaug moog taag kuv simneej, kuv yuav tsaa teg thov koj.
Kuv tug ntsujplig yuav tau noj hab txaus sab kawg le, hab kuv yuav zoo sab luag ntxhi hu nkauj qhuas koj.
Thaus kuv pw sau txaaj, kuv yeej ncu ntsoov txug koj, kuv lub sab xaav ntsoov rua koj ib mos kaaj ntug plawg,
rua qhov koj ibtxwm paab kuv lug lawm. Kuv zoo sab hu nkauj huv qaab koj ob phob tis kws ua dluab ntxoov ntxoo roog kuv.
Kuv nyob ze rawv koj, hab koj txhais teg xis thaiv tsi pub kuv raug kev nyuaj sab.
Cov tuabneeg kws nrhav kuv tua povtseg yuav moog taag rua huv tubtuag teb.
Puab yuav raug tua tuag taag rua huv tshaav rog hab maa yuav lug noj puab.
Rua qhov Vaajtswv pub rua vaajntxwv kovyeej, vaajntxwv yuav zoo sab kawg le. Cov tuabneeg kws tuav Vaajtswv lub npe coglug yuav qhuas nwg, tabsis yuav muab cov tuabneeg dlaag tej qhovncauj kaw.
Vaajtswv, kuv taabtom raug kev nyuaj sab, thov koj noog kuv tej lug thov! Kuv ntshai kuv cov yeebncuab kawg le! Thov koj cawm kuv txujsa.
Thov tsomkwm kuas kuv dlim ntawm cov tuabneeg sab phem tej tswvyim kws tuavhuv ua phem, hab dlim ntawm cov tuabneeg sab phem kws yuam cai.
Puab tej nplaig ntse ib yaam le nav ntaaj, hab puab tej lug ab lug dlaw zuag ib yaam le tej xub vug.
Puab maaj nrooj has tej lug dlaag, puab tsi txaajmuag, puab txobthuam cov tuabneeg zoo, puab tsi ntshai leejtwg.
Puab ib leeg txhawb ib leeg kuas tuavhuv ua phem, puab sis thaam saib puab yuav moog cuab hlua rua qhov twg. Puab has tas, “Yeej tsi muaj leejtwg pum peb le.”
Puab tuav tswvyim ua phem hab has tas, “Peb npaaj tau tswvyim zoo kawg nkaus.” Tuabneeg lub sab hab lub hlwb xaav txug tej kws phem kawg le.
Tabsis Vaajtswv tua nwg tej xub vug tuaj rua puab, hab tuab plag ntshis xwb puab raug mob taag.
Nwg yuav ua kuas puab puamtsuaj taag vim puab tej kev xaav ntawd, txhua tug kws pum puab, yuav cu hau nyo.
Ces puab yuav ntshai kawg, puab txhaj yuav xaav txug tej kws Vaajtswv ua taag lug hab qha rua suavdlawg paub txug Vaajtswv teg num.
Cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg txhua tug yuav zoo sab kawg le, vim tej kws tug TSWV tau ua taag lug. Puab yuav tau txujkev cawm dlim ntawm nwg, cov tuabneeg sab zoo yuav qhuas nwg.
Vaajtswv, yeej tsimnyog peb qhuas koj nyob huv lub nroog Xi-oos hab ua lawv le peb tub tau coglug tseg rua koj,
rua qhov koj teb peb tej lug thov lawm. Tej tuabneeg kws nyob txhua qhov yuav lug cuag koj,
vim puab xaav txug puab tej kev txhum. Peb kov tsi yeej peb tej kev txhum lawm.

Cov tuabneeg kws koj xaiv tseg yuav zoo sab heev, puab yog cov kws koj coj lug nyob rua huv lub tsev kws tuabneeg tuaj pehawm koj. Peb yuav txaus sab rua txhua yaam zoo kws nyob huv koj lub tsev, tej koob moov nuav tub yog koj lub Tuamtsev kws dlawbhuv ntaag.

Qhov kws koj paab peb kovyeej lawm tub yog koj teb peb tej lug thov ntaag, hab koj tej txujci kws zoo kawg nkaus tau cawm peb dlim. Tej tuabneeg kws nyob thoob nplajteb hab nyob saab havtxwv tim u puavleej ca sab rua koj xwb.
Koj tug zug tsaa tej roob nyob muaj chaw, kuas suavdlawg pum koj lub fwjchim kws luj kawg nkaus.
Koj ua rua havtxwv lub suab kws nrov nroo ntwg nyob ntsag tu; hab ua rua tej dlej kws ndlaas nrov qeeg nkawg nyob tug yeeg, koj ua rua tuabneeg lub suab qw nrov ntshu nrooj ntsag moog.

Tej tuabneeg kws nyob thoob qaab ntuj puavleej ntshai hab fwm koj, thaus puab pum tej txujci tseemceeb kws koj tau ua taag lug lawm. Koj teg num ua rua suavdlawg zoo sab qw saab ntuj tim nuav moog rua saab ntuj kawg tim u.

Koj tso naag lug ywg thaaj aav kws koj tsomkwm, koj ua rua thaaj aav ntawd rog hab muaj chiv. Koj ua rua dlej ndlwg puv nkaus tej kwj dleg, koj pub muaj qoobloo puv nkaus huv nplajteb nuav. Tej nuav yog koj ua ntaag,
Koj tso tuamtsaam naag lug ywg tej laj kws laij ca hab ua rua tej nraag laj ntxaum dlej thoob plawg, koj ua rua tej aav phom nphoob vim muaj naag ywg. hab ua rua tej yub qoob hlub mog nyoos.
Koj txuj koob moov ua rua tej qoobloo ntsu, koj moog txug qhov twg, qhov ntawd muaj nplua mag.
Tej tshaav zaub muaj tsaj txhu nyob ua npoj ntwg, tej toj roob puv nkaus kev zoo sab.
Tom tej nraag muaj yaaj nyob ua npoj ntwg, muaj nplej puv nkaus tej haav. Txhua yaam puavleej qw hab hu nkauj zoo sab.
Txhua tsaav tuabneeg, ca le qw zoo sab hab ua Vaajtswv tsaug!
Ca le hu nkauj qhuas nwg lub npe hab nwg tug tshwjchim, thov kuas tej lug qhuas ua rua nwg tau koob meej.
Has rua Vaajtswv has tas, “Teg num kws koj ua xaav tsi thoob le! Koj lub fwjchim luj kawg nkaus ua rua koj cov yeebncuab ntshai hab pehawm koj ntawm koj xubndlag.
Txhua tug kws nyob huv nplajteb nuav puavleej pehawm koj, puab hu nkauj qhuas koj, puab hu nkauj qhuas koj lub npe.”
Mej ca le saib tej kws Vaajtswv tub ua taag lug lawm, nwg ua tej num kws zoo kawg nkaus rua suavdlawg pum.
Nwg muab dlej havtxwv hloov ua aav qhuav; peb cov yawmkoob txhaj moog kutaw hlaa dlhau dlej. Peb txhaj zoo sab vim tej kws nwg tau ua.
Nwg lub fwjchim kaav moog ib txhis hab nwg tsaa qhovmuag saib ntsoov txhua tsaav tuabneeg. Tsi pub leejtwg ntxeev sab tawmtsaam nwg.
Txhua tsaav tuabneeg, ca le qhuas peb tug Vaajtswv, ca peb nov mej tej suab qhuas Vaajtswv.
Nwg yog tug tuav peb txujsa hab tsi pub peb qaug le.
Vaajtswv, koj tau sim peb sab; koj sim peb ib yaam le nchuav nyaj huv qhovcub.
Koj ca peb moog maag luas lub vuj hlua hab koj tsuam nraa nyaav rua nrau peb lub nrausqaum.
Koj ca peb cov yeebncuab tsuj peb, peb txhaj raug suavtawg kub hab dlej nyaab, tabsis nwgnuav koj coj peb rov lug nyob rua qhov chaw kaaj sab.
Kuv yuav coj khoom tuaj hlawv fij rua huv koj lub tsev; kuv yuav muab khoom fij rua koj lawv le kuv tau coglug tseg lawm.
Kuv yuav muab rua koj lawv le kuv tau has thaus kuv raug kev txomnyem.
Kuv yuav muab yaaj tuaj tua hlawv fij rua sau lub thaaj, kuv yuav muab nyuj hab tshis tuaj tua hlawv fij hab tej paa yuav nchu moog rua sau nruab ntug.
Cov tuabneeg kws fwm Vaajtswv, mej ca le lug ntawm nuav, kuv yuav pav tej kws tug TSWV has rua kuv lawm rua mej noog.
Kuv quaj thov nwg paab, kuv yuav hu nkauj qhuas nwg.
Yog kuv tsi leeg kuv tej kev txhum, tug TSWV yuav tsi noog kuv tej lug thov.
Tabsis Vaajtswv yeej tig qhovntsej noog kuv tej lug; nwg yeej nov kuv tej lug thov.
Kuv qhuas Vaajtswv, rua qhov nwg tsi tau muab kuv tej lug thov tso tseg, hab tsi tau rhu nwg txujkev hlub kws tsi paub kawg ntawm kuv moog.
Vaajtswv, thov koj taabncuab peb hab foom koob moov rua peb, tsaa qhovmuag saib peb ua sab dlawb sab zoo rua peb,
kuas tej tuabneeg nyob thoob huv nplajteb txhaj paub koj, hab txhua tsaav tuabneeg txhaj yuav paub koj txujkev cawm dlim.
Vaajtswv, thov kuas tsoom pejxeem qhuas koj; thov kuas txhua tsaav tuabneeg qhuas koj!
Thov ca txhua tsaav tuabneeg zoo sab hab hu nkauj luag ntxhi, rua qhov koj txav txim ncaaj nceeg rua suavdlawg hab koj coj txhua tsaav tuabneeg huv qaab ntuj nuav.
Vaajtswv, thov kuas suavdlawg qhuas koj, thov kuas txhua tsaav tuabneeg qhuas koj!
Lub tebchaws muaj qoobloo sau, Vaajtswv kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv foom koob moov rua peb lawm.
Vaajtswv tau foom koob moov rua peb, thov kuas tej tuabneeg nyob txhua qhov ca le fwm nwg.
Vaajtswv sawv tseeg ua rua nwg cov yeebncuab tsiv ri sua. Cov tuabneeg kws ntxub Vaajtswv swb hab tsiv tsi yeej ua nwg ntej.
Vaajtswv ntab puab tawm ib yaam le cua ntsawj tej paa tawg, hab ib yaam le suavtawg txhab cab ntaab yaaj, yog le ntawd, cov tuabneeg sab phem yuav pluj ntawm Vaajtswv lub xubndlag moog.
Tabsis cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg txaus sab hab zoo sab nyob ntawm Vaajtswv xubndlag, puab xyivfaab hab qw zoo sab.
Hu nkauj qhuas Vaajtswv, hu nkauj qhuas nwg lub npe; khu kev tog tug kws caij rawv sau tauv fuab lug, nwg lub npe yog tug TSWV, ca le zoo sab hlo nyob ntawm nwg lub xubndlag.
Vaajtswv tug kws nyob huv lub Tuamtsev dlawbhuv, nwg tu cov mivnyuas ntsuag hab tsomkwm cov puj ntsuag.

Nwg pub cov tuabneeg kws txomnyem muaj vaaj muaj tsev nyob, hab nwg tso cov tuabneeg raug txim tawm moog nyob ywj sab, tabsis cov tuabneeg ntxeev sab yuav tau nyob huv lub tebchaws kws qhuav nkig nkuav.
Vaajtswv, thaus koj coj koj tsaav tuabneeg, hab thaus koj tawm moog hlaa taj suabpuam.
Lub nplajteb ua zug koog, hab lub ntuj tso naag laub lug lug, rua qhov tug Vaajtswv kws nyob ntawm roob Xinais nqeg lug, yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv taabtom nqeg lug.
Vaajtswv, koj tso tuamtsaam naag lug hab ua rua koj lub tebchaws kws tsuag taag kuas rov ua tau noj.
Koj tsaav tuabneeg lug nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd, koj ua zoo koj txhaj npaaj pub rua cov pluag.
Tug TSWV yog tug has tej lug nuav, hab muaj coob leej moog qha:
“Cov vaajntxwv hab puab tej tubrog dlha tsiv lawm!” Cov quaspuj kws nyob huv tsev muab tej khoom kws txeeb tau lug sis faib:
tej tis nquab puavleej vuam nyaj thoob plawg, hab tej plaub tis puavleej vuam tej tseem kub. (Vim le caag nub kws taabtom ntaus rog mej qee leej moog nkaum huv tej nkuaj yaaj?)
Thaus Vaajtswv tug kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus lawv cov vaajntxwv tawg ri sua, nwg ua kuas muaj dlaus lug rua sau Roob Zalemoos.
Lub roob huv lub nroog Npasaas yog lub roob kws luj sab; lub roob ntawd muaj ntau lub ncov!
Lub roob luj sab, vim le caag koj khib hab saib tsi taug lub roob kws Vaajtswv xaiv ua nwg qhov chaw nyob? Tug TSWV yeej yuav nyob sau moog ibtxhis le.
Nwg cov tsheb neeg ntau txheeb ntau vaam lub nrug tug TSWV nqeg sau roob Xinais lug rua huv nwg qhov chaw dlawbhuv.

Thaus koj nce moog rua sau qhov chaw sab, koj coj cov tuabneeg kws raug luas nteg coob leej nrug koj moog, koj tau txais tej khoom pub lug ntawm tej tuabneeg, hab txawm yog cov tuabneeg kws ntxeev sab rua koj los muab khoom pub rua koj, tug TSWV kws yog Vaajtswv yuav nyob sau ntuj.
Ca le qhuas tug TSWV, nwg yog tug kws ris peb lub nraa ib nub dlhau ib nub, nwg yog Vaajtswv tug kws cawm peb dlim ntaag.
Peb tug Vaajtswv yog tug Vaajtswv kws cawm peb dlim; nwg yog Vaajtswv, peb tug TSWV kws cawm peb dlim txujkev tuag.
Vaajtswv yeej yuav muab nwg cov yeebncuab taubhau tsoo kuas tawg, puab yog cov tuabneeg kws tsi kaam thau hau tawm ntawm puab tej kev txhum le.
Tug TSWV has tas, “Kuv yuav coj mej cov yeebncuab tawm huv Npasaas rov qaab lug; kuv yuav coj puab tawm huv qaab thu havtxwv qhov kws tub tshaaj plawg lug,
yog le ntawd, mej txhaj raus kutaw rua huv yeebncuab cov ntshaav, hab mej tej dlev txhaj tau yaim tej ntshaav ntawd.”
Vaajtswv, suavdlawg puavleej pum koj cov tuabneeg moog ua tsheej paab, Vaajtswv kws yog kuv tug Vaajntxwv, koj cov tuabneeg moog tsheej kev rua huv koj lub tuamtsev.
Cov hu nkauj moog ua ntej, cov ntaus nkauj nogncaas moog ua qaab, hab cov hluas nkauj kws ntaus nruag tuaj nruab nraab.
“Nwg tsaav tuabeeg kws tuaj saablaaj ua ke, ca le qhuas Vaajtswv, taagnrho Yakhauj cov xeebntxwv ca le qhuas tug TSWV!”
Npeenyamees yog cov kws xub lug, puab yog xeem tsawg tshaaj plawg, ces xeem Yudas cov thawjcoj txhaj lug nrug puab paab ntawd, xeem Xenpuloos hab xeem Nathalis cov thawjcoj txhaj tawm lawv qaab.
Vaajtswv, qha koj lub fwjchim rua peb, lub fwjchim kws koj siv tuaj peb tog.
Rua qhov koj lub Tuamtsev nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees, cov vaajntxwv txhaj nqaa khoom tuaj pub rua koj.

Ca le tshev cov tsaj qus kws nkaum tom tej haav lojkov, Ca le tshev cov txiv nyuj kws nyob nrug cov mivnyuas nyuj kws yog txhua tsaav tuabneeg moog txug thaus puab qhau cev pe hab muab nyaj fij rua koj. Thov muab cov tuabneeg kws nyam ua tsuv ua rog ntab tawm moog!
Cov xeebcom  yuav tuaj nraag tebchaws Iziv tuaj, cov tuabneeg Eti-aupias yuav tsaa puab tej teg thov Vaajtswv.
Txhua lub tebchaws huv nplajteb nuav, ca le hu nkauj qhuas Vaajtswv, hu nkauj txhawb nqaa tug TSWV,
qhuas tug kws kaav nyob sau nruab ntug kws yog lub ntuj kws ibtxwm nyob thaus u lug lawm. Ca le noog nwg lub suab nthe nyooj lawg kws muaj fwjchim.
Tshaajtawm Vaajtswv lub fwjchim, nwg lub koob meej nrov nchaa thoob plawg tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees, nwg lub fwjchim puv nkaus sau nruab ntug.
Vaajtswv tug kws txaus ntshai nyob huv nwg lub Tuamtsev, nwg yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv! Nwg muab tug zug luj zug nchaav hab lub fwjchim pub rua nwg tsaav tuabneeg. Ca le qhuas Vaajtswv!
Vaajtswv, thov koj paab cawm kuv! Dlej nyaab nto plawg sau kuv cejdlaab lawm;
kuv zum rua huv lub paag haav av tub heev kws tsi muaj chaw tag taw le; kuv poob rua huv lub paag dlej kws tub heev, hab dlej nphau lug nyaab kuv taag.
Kuv hu koj paab, kuv qaug zug hab kuv lub qaa qhuav taag. Kuv tog koj ntev heev ua rua kuv qhovmuag lig taag.

Cov tuabneeg kws laam ntxub kuv, ntau tshaaj kuv cov plaubhau lawm. Kuv cov yeebncuab ua timkhawv tsi tseeb kom kuv; puab muaj zug heev hab xaav tua kuv povtseg. Puab yuam kuas kuv xaa tej khoom kws tsi yog kuv nyag rov qaab huv tuabsi.
Vaajtswv, kuv tsi tau muab kuv tej kev txhum zais tsi pub koj pum, koj yeej paub kuv yog ib tug tuabneeg ruag kawg nkaus le.
Tug TSWV kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus, thov tsi xob ca kuv coj kev txaajmuag lug rua cov tuabneeg kws ca sab rua koj. Kuv lub sab kub cuag suavtawg, vim kuv mob sab rua koj lub Tuamtsev.
Tub yog vim koj kuv txhaj raug luas thuam hab kuv raug kev txaajmuag.
Kuv zoo ib yaam le tug qhua rua kuv cov kwvtij, hab zoo ib yaam le tug tuabneeg txawv tebchaws rua kuv tsev tuabneeg.
Kuv mob sab rua koj lub Tuamtsev ib yaam le suavtawg kub huv kuv lub sab, tej lug kws luas thuam koj poob rua kuv huv tuabsi.
Thaus kuv txu fwjchim hab ua kevcai yoo mov, mas tej tuabneeg thuam kuv kawg le.
Thaus kuv naav tej rig tsho kws tau kev quaj ntsuag, mas puab luag kuv plig kawg.
Puab xyaav kuv moo tom tej kev hab puab lomtxwm haus cawv kuas qaug hab hu nkauj luag kuv plig.

Tabsis tug TSWV, kuv yuav thov koj xwb, Vaajtswv, thov koj teb kuv thaus lub sijhawm kws koj teem tseg. Vim koj txujkev hlub kws luj kawg nkaus, thov koj teb kuv, rua qhov koj coglug tseg lawm has tas, koj yuav cawm kuas kuv dlim.
Thov cawm kuv tsi xob ca kuv zum rua huv paag haav av, thov paab kuas kuv dlim ntawm kuv cov yeebncuab, hab dlim ntawm lub paag dlej kws tub heev.
Thov tsi xob pub dlej lug nyaab kuv, thov tsi xob pub kuv tog rua huv qaab thu dlej kws tub, lossis poob rua huv lub qhov ntxaa.
Tug TSWV, koj yog tug muaj txujkev hlub tsi paub kawg, koj yog tug muaj txujkev hlub luj kawg nkaus, thov koj tig lug rua ntawm kuv.
Thov koj tsi xob tsiv nkaum koj tug tubkhai; kuv ntxhuv sab kawg nkaus, thov koj teb kuv taamsim nuav lauj!
Thov koj lug cuag kuv hab cawm kuas kuv dlim, hab tso kuv dlim ntawm kuv cov yeebncuab.
Koj yeej paub kuv raug luas txobthuam, raug txaajmuag hab raug luas saib tsi taug kag le; koj pum taagnrho kuv cov yeebncuab.
Kev txobthuam ua rua kuv sab ntsws puag taag hab kuv taag kev ca sab; kuv ca sab tog txujkev hlub, tabsis tsi muaj le; kuv nrhav tug kws nplig kuv sab, tabsis nrhav tsi tau le.
Thaus kuv tshaib plaab, puab muab tej tshuaj muaj taug rua kuv noj, thaus kuv nqhes dlej, puab muab kua txiv maab qaub rua kuv haus.
Thov kuas puab rooj mov ua rua puab raug kev puamtsuaj, thov kuas puab rooj mov tseemceeb ua rua puab qaug taag.
Thov ua rua puab qhovmuag tsi pum kev! Thov ua kuas puab lub nrausqaum tsi muaj zug!
Laub koj txujkev chim rua puab; thov ca koj txujkev nruj tsiv kaav taagnrho puab.
Thov kuas puab tej yeej ua taj suabpuam taag, thov tsi xob ca ib tug seem nyob huv puab tej tsevntaub le.
Puab tsimtxom cov tuabneeg kws koj tub rau txim rua lawm, puab has cov tuabneeg raug mob kws tiv tej kev txomnyem plig.
Thov muab puab tej kev txhum teev huv tuabsi rua huv koj phoo ntawv, tsi xob pub kuas puab muaj feem rua koj txujkev cawm dlim.
Thov muab puab tej npe tshem tawm huv koj phoo ntawv kws teev cov tuabneeg muaj sa nyob tej npe, thov kuas puab tsi xob muaj npe nyob nrug koj tsaav tuabneeg.
Tabsis Vaajtswv, kuv mob nyaav heev hab taag kev ca sab lawm, thov koj tsaa kuv hab cawm kuv!
Kuv yuav hu nkauj qhuas Vaajtswv, kuv yuav qha nwg lub fwjchim kws luj kawg nkaus hab ua nwg tsaug.
Ua le nuav txaus tug TSWV sab dlua le muab nyuj tua hlawv taagnrho ua khoom fij.
Thaus cov tuabneeg kws raug tsimtxom pum tej nuav, puab zoo sab heev; hab yuav txhawb cov tuabneeg kws muab sab rau pehawm Vaajtswv tug zug.
Tug TSWV yeej noog cov tuabneeg txomnyem tej lug thov, hab nwg ncu ntsoov nwg tsaav tuabneeg kws nyob huv tsev lojcuj.
Lub ntuj hab lub teb, tej havtxwv hab txhua yaam tsaj huv havtxwv ca le qhuas Vaajtswv;
nwg yuav cawm lub nroog Yeluxalees hab txhim khu cov Yudas tej nroog dlua tshab. Nwg tsaav tuabneeg yuav nyob huv cov nroog hab kaav lub tebchaws ntawd.
Lub tebchaws ntawd yuav yog nwg cov tubkhai tej xeebntxwv tug, hab cov kws hlub nwg yuav tau nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd moog le.
Vaajtswv, thov cawm kuv lauj! Tug TSWV, thov paab kuv taamsim nuav!
Thov kuas cov tuabneeg kws pheej nrhav kuv tua, ca le swb hab tsi sis humxeeb! Thov kuas cov tuabneeg kws zoo sab vim kuv raug kev txomnyem thim rov qaab hab poob ntsejmuag.
Thov kuas cov kws pheej luag kuv plig swb hab txaajmuag.
Thov kuas txhua tug kws lug cuag koj zoo sab hab xyivfaab hlo. Thov kuas txhua tug kws koj tau cawm dlim ua koj tsaug tsi tseg has tas “Vaajtswv yog tug muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus!”
Kuv qaug zug hab txomnyem kawg; Vaajtswv, thov koj ca le lug cawm kuv. Koj yog kuv tug cawmseej hab yog kuv tug TSWV. Thov koj ca le maaj nrooj lug cawm kuv!
Tug TSWV, kuv lug cuag koj, thov koj ua tug tsomkwm kuv, thov tsi xob pub kuv swb luas ib zag le!
Rua qhov koj yog tug ncaaj nceeg, thov paab kuv hab cawm kuas kuv dlim. Thov noog kuv tej lug thov hab cawm kuv lauj!
Thov kuas koj yog kuv lub chaw nkaum hab ua lub chaw faajxwm  kws tiv thaiv kuv, koj yog kuv qhov chaw cawm sav hab tiv thaiv kuv.
Kuv tug Vaajtswv, thov cawm kuas kuv dlim ntawm cov tuabneeg sab phem, dlim ntawm cov tuabneeg limham hab cov tuabneeg ua phem ua qas.
Vaajtswv tug kws kaav txhua tsaav yaam, kuv muab kuv txujkev ca sab tso plhuav rua koj, kuv yeej ibtxwm ca sab rua koj thaus kuv tseem hluas lug lawm.
Kuv ca sab rua koj taag kuv simneej, koj yeej tsomkwm  kuv txij thaus yug kuv poob nthaav lug lawm. Kuv yuav naj nub qhuas koj.
Kuv lub neej tub ua yaam ntxwv rua coob leej xyum, rua qhov koj yog kuv lub chaw nkaum kws ruaj khov.
Kuv qhuas koj ib nub tsaus ntuj hab pav txug koj tug tshwjchim.
Txawm yog taamsim nuav kuv laug lawm los thov koj tsi xob tso kuv tseg, taamsim nuav kuv qaug zug heev los thov koj ncu ntsoov kuv.
Kuv cov yeebncuab xaav nrhav kuv tua povtseg, puab sis thaam hab tuav tswvyim tawmtsaam kuv.
Puab has tas, “Vaajtswv tub tso nwg tseg lawm, ca le moog soj nwg qaab hab nteg kuas tau nwg, yeej tsi muaj leejtwg cawm nwg hlo le.”
Vaajtswv, thov tsi xob nyob nrug dleb ntawm kuv, kuv tug Vaajtswv, ca le maaj nrooj lug paab kuv lauj!
Thov kuas cov tuabneeg kws tuaj tua kuv ca le swb hab raug kev puamtsuaj. Thov kuas cov tuabneeg kws pheej nrhav kev ua kuas kuv raug mob ca le txaajmuag hab poob ntsejmuag.
Kuv yuav naj nub ca sab rua koj moog tsi tso tseg le.
Kuv yuav qha koj lub sab dlawb sab zoo rua luas paub, kuv yuav naj nub qha koj txujkev cawm dlim, txawm yog kuv paub tsi txhua los kuv yuav qha.
Tug TSWV kws kaav txhua tsaav yaam, kuv yuav qhuas koj lub fwjchim, kuv yuav pav koj txujkev ua sab dlawb sab zoo nkaus xwb.
Koj yeej ibtxwm qha kuv thaus kuv tseem hluas lug, hab kuv tseem pheej tshaajtawm koj teg num kws zoo kawg nkaus lug txug naj nub nua.
Vaajtswv, nwgnuav kuv laug hab kuv tej plaubhau tub dlawb taag lawm, thov koj tsi xob tso kuv tseg.
Vaajtswv, koj txujkev ncaaj nceeg sab nto ntuj plawg. Koj tau ua ntau yaam txujci tseemceeb lug lawm, yeej tsi muaj ib tug zoo cuag koj lawm.
Koj tso kev nyuaj sab ntxhuv plawv hab kev txomnyem lug rua kuv, tabsis koj yuav txhawb kuv tug zug dlua ntxiv, koj yuav paab kuas kuv dlim ntawm txujkev tuag rov qaab lug.
Koj yuav tsaa kuv ua tug muaj fwjchim luj dlua qhov qub, hab koj yuav nplig kuv sab dlua ib zag ntxiv.
Kuv yuav ntaus nkauj nogncaas qhuas koj, kuv tug Vaajtswv, kuv yuav qhuas koj txujkev ncaaj nceeg. Cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws dlawbhuv, kuv yuav ntaus nkauj nogncaas hu nkauj qhuas koj.
Thaus kuv ntaus nkauj nogncaas, kuv yuav hu nkauj zoo sab, kuv yuav hu nkauj kawg kuv lub sab lub ntsws, rua qhov koj tau cawm kuv dlim lawm.
Kuv yuav pav koj txujkev ncaaj nceeg taag nub, rua qhov cov tuabneeg kws pheej nrhav kev ua kuas kuv raug kev txomnyem tub swb hab txaajmuag kawg le lawm.
Vaajtswv, thov koj qha rua vaajntxwv kuas txav txim lawv le koj txujkev ncaaj nceeg, thov muab koj txujkev txav txim ncaaj nceeg pub rua nwg,
nwg txhaj yuav muab txujkev txav txim ncaaj nceeg lug kaav koj tsaav tuabneeg hab muab txujkev ncaaj nceeg lug tswj cov kws raug kev tsimtxom.
Thov kuas lub tebchaws muaj kev vaammeej; hab ca lub tebchaws tau txais kev ncaaj nceeg.
Thov kuas vaajntxwv txav txim ncaaj rua cov pluag, thov kuas nwg paab cov txomnyem hab muab cov tuabneeg kws tsimtxom puab tsuj ntag rua huv aav.
Thov kuas koj tsaav tuabneeg pehawm koj tsi paub kawg, ib yaam le lub nub hab ib yaam le lub hli pum kev ib tam dlhau rua ib tam moog le.
Thov kuas vaajntxwv zoo le cov naag kws lug ywg tej laj tej teb, hab zoo le kob naag tshauv lug ywg lub tebchaws.
Thov kuas tej kev ncaaj nceeg muaj nyob rua nwg tam, hab thov kuas muaj kev vaammeej tsi tu ib yaam le lub hli ci pum kev.
Nwg yuav kaav saab havtxwv tim nuav moog txug ndlua saab havtxwv tim u.
Cov tuabneeg kws nyob tom taj suabpuam yuav qhau cev hlo pehawm nwg, nwg cov yeebncuab yuav qhau hlo cev dlaa rua huv aav.

Cov vaajntxwv kws nyob huv tebchaws Xapees hab huv tej koog povtxwv yuav coj khoom tuaj rua nwg, hab cov vaajntxwv kws nyob huv tebchaws Alanpias hab tebchaws Eti-aupias yuav coj khoom tuaj pub rua nwg.
Txhua tug vaajntxwv yuav txhus caug pe nwg, hab txhua tsaav tuabneeg yuav ua num rua nwg.
Nwg cawm cov tuabneeg pluag kws thov txug nwg, hab cov tuabneeg txomnyem kws tsi muaj leejtwg paab.
Nwg taabncuab cov kws qaug zug hab cov pluag, nwg cawm cov tuabneeg txomnyem txujsa.
Nwg cawm puab dlim ntawm cov tuabneeg tsimtxom hab cov tuabneeg limham; nwg saib puab txujsa tseemceeb.

Thov kuas vaajntxwv muaj sa nyob txhab naj moog pua xyoo! Thov kuas luas coj kub huv tebchaws Senpas tuaj pub rua nwg, thov kuas luas thov Vaajtswv paab nwg tsi tseg tsi tu, thov Vaajtswv foom koob moov rua nwg moog le!

Thov kuas lub tebchaws ntawd muaj nplej ntsu nplua mag, thov kuas muaj qoobloo puv nkaus sau tej pov roob, tej txiv ntoo kuas muaj ntau ib yaam le peg tebchaws Lenpanoos. Thov kuas muaj tuabneeg nyob puv nkaus huv tej nroog ib yaam le tej nyom tuaj puv nkaus huv tej nraag laj.

Vaajntxwv lub npe yuav nyob moog ibtxhis, nwg lub koob meej yuav nyob ntev ib yaam le lub nub. Ca txhua tsaav tuabneeg thov Vaajtswv foom koob moov rua puab ib yaam le nwg tau foom koob moov rua vaajntxwv.
Ca le qhuas tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv! Nwg tuab leeg xwb txhaj ua tau tej txujci tseemceeb nuav.
Qhuas nwg lub npe kws muaj tshwjchim moog ibtxhis le! Thov kuas nwg tug tshwjchim nyob puv nkaus huv lub nplajteb nuav. Amees! Amees!
Yexais tug tub Daviv tej lug thov Vaajtswv xaus le nuav lawm xwb.
Vaajtswv ua zoo kawg nkaus rua cov Yixalayees kws muaj lub sab ncaaj nceeg.
Tabsis kuv tub tsi tshua muaj sab vaam lawm; kuv kev ntseeg tub pluj yuav taag,
rua qhov kuv khib cov tuabneeg khaavtheeb, thaus kuv pum has tas, cov tuabneeg sab phem lub neej zoo dlua.
Puab tsi tau tiv kev mob kev nkeeg, puab noj qaab nyob zoo hab puab muaj zug quas npho
Puab tsi tau tiv kev txomnyem le luas tej; hab puab tsi muaj kev ntxhuv sab le lwm tug.
Yog le ntawd, puab txhaj muab kev khaavtheeb lug coj ib yaam le puab coj paug cejdlaab hab muab kev nruj tsiv lug naav ib yaam le naav lub tsho ntev.
Puab lub sab nthuav tej kev phem tawm tuaj, hab puab lub tswvyim npaaj rawv ua kev phem kev qas.
Puab luag lwm tug plig hab has tej lug phem lug qas. Puab khaavtheeb hab tuavhuv tsimtxom luas.
Puab thuam Vaajtswv tug kws nyob sau ntuj hab has lug khaavtheeb ntxhas yuam tej tuabneeg huv nplajteb nuav.
Txawm yog Vaajtswv tsaav tuabneeg los ca le yuam kev nrug cov tuabneeg ntawd hab ntseeg puab tej lug heev.
Puab has tas, “Vaajtswv yeej tsi paub le, tug kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus los yeej tsi paub zaaj nuav le.”
Cov tuabneeg sab phem yeej los zoo le ntawd, puab muaj txhua yaam nplua mag lawm los puab yimfuab muaj ntau ntxiv.
Qhov kws kuv tswj kuv lub sab kuas ua tau tuabneeg zoo hab tsi ua txhum ntawd, txawm tsi muaj nqes le los?
Vaajtswv, koj tau ua rua kuv tiv kev txomnyem taag nub; hab koj rau txim rua kuv txhua taagkig sawv ntxuv.
Yog kuv laam tau laam has le ntawd, ntshai kuv tsi coj lub neej zoo le koj tsaav tuabneeg.
Zaaj nuav yeej nyuaj kawg le, tabsis kuv muab lug xaav txhij xaav txhua saib zoo le caag, txawm le ntawd los kuv yeej tsi totaub
moog txug thaus kuv moog rua huv koj lub Tuamtsev. Thaus ntawd kuv maam paub tseeb txug tej kws yuav lug raug cov tuabneeg sab phem ntawd.
Qhov tseemceeb yog koj yuav kuas puab taug txujkev kws nplua nplua hab ua kuas puab qaug puamtsuaj moog.
Tuab ntsais muag xwb, puab ca le raug kev puamtsuaj taag. Thaus kawg puab yuav poob moog rua txujkev txomnyem heev.
Puab lub neej zoo ib yaam le tuabneeg ua npau suav, thaus nwg tsim lug nwg yeej tsi ncu qaab txhua yaam taag lawm. Tug TSWV, thaus koj sawv tseeg lug, cov tuabneeg ntawd yuav pluj ndlais moog.
Thaus kuv chim hab tu sab heev,
kuv ruag ib yaam le tug tsaj, kuv yeej tsi totaub tej kws koj ua hlo le.
Txawm yog le ntawd los kuv yeej nrug nraim koj ua ke hab koj tuav rawv kuv txhais teg.
Koj tej lug qhuab ntuag naj nub coj kuv txuj hauv kev, hab txug thaus kawg koj yuav lug tog kuv moog hab pub rua kuv tau ntsejmuag.
Dlhau koj lawm, tsi muaj lwm yaam kws kuv xaav tau nyob sau ntuj. Yog muaj koj lawm, kuv tsi ntshaw ib yaam dlaabtsi huv nplajteb nuav le.
Kuv tug zug hab kuv lub sab qaug zug zuj zug lawm. Tabsis Vaajtswv yog kuv tug zug, nwg yog tug kws kuv ntshaw moog ibtxhis.
Cov tuabneeg kws tso koj tseg yuav pluj taag moog; koj yuav ua kuas cov tuabneeg kws tsi muab sab npuab koj raug puamtsuaj taag.
Tabsis kuv mas zoo sab kawg, vim kuv nyob ze Vaajtswv; kuv muaj tug TSWV kws yog Vaajtswv ua tug tsomkwm kuv. Hab kuv yuav qha txhua yaam kws nwg ua rua suavdlawg paub.
Vaajtswv, vim le caag koj muab peb tso tseg le nuav? Koj yuav chim rua koj tsaav tuabneeg moog ibtxhis le los?

Thov koj ncu ntsoov tsaav tuabneeg kws koj xaiv lug ua koj tug ntau xyoo lug lawm, yog tsaav tuabneeg kws koj tau tso dlim kev ua luas qhev lug ua koj tsaav tuabneeg. Thov ncu ntsoov lub Roob Xi-oos kws koj tau lug nyob ib zag lawm.
Koj sim moog ncig kuas thoob plawg tej tsev kws puag ntsoog taag ntawd saib; peb cov yeebncuab tuaj muab txhua tsaav yaam kws nyob huv lub Tuamtsev rhuav puamtsuaj taag dlu lug.
Koj cov yeebncuab tuaj qw ua tsuj ua tsaug huv koj lub Tuamtsev; puab tuaj txhus puab tej chij ua cim qha has tas puab kovyeej lawm.
Puab zoo ib yaam le cov tuabneeg txawj ntuv ntoo, puab muab taus  ntuv piskag tej ntoo qaug zum zawg povtseg.
Puab nqaa taus hab rauj tuaj tsoo tej txag ntoo tawg taag povtseg.
Puab tuaj lauj koj lub Tuamtsev hab tis suavtawg hlawv kub nyab taag; puab ua rua thaaj chaw kws peb pehawm koj tsi huv lawm.
Puab yeej xaav tuaj tsoo kuas peb tawg mog nyoos; puab tis suavtawg hlawv txhua thaaj chaw kws pehawm Vaajtswv huv lub tebchaws nuav.
Peb tej cim tseemceeb pluj taag lawm tsi tshuav ib tug cev Vaajtswv lug seem nyob le, hab yeej tsi muaj leejtwg paub has tas qhov nuav tseem tshuav ntev le caag.
Vaajtswv, yuav ca peb cov yeebncuab luag koj ntev npaum le caag hab? Yuav ca puab txobthuam koj lub npe moog ibtxhis le los?
Yog vim le caag koj txhaj tsi kaam paab peb le? Vim le caag koj muab koj ob txhais teg zais rua tom koj nrausqaum?
Vaajtswv, koj yeej yog peb tug vaajntxwv thaus chivkeeb lug; koj yeej tau cawm peb dlim ntau zag lug lawm.
Koj siv koj tug zug nchaav muab havtxwv faib ua ob saab, hab koj muab tej zaaj huv havtxwv tej taubhau tsoo ntsoog taag;
hab koj muab tug Levi-athas lub taubhau tsoo, hab muab nwg lub cev coj moog rua tej tsaj tom taj suabpuam noj.
Koj tsim muaj tej qhovdlej txhawv hab dlej cag ndlwg laub lug; hab koj ua rua tej dlej kws ndlwg qhuav taag huv tuabsi.
Koj yog tug kws tsim kuas muaj nruab nub hab mo ntuj; koj muab lub nub hab lub hli tso nyag nyob muaj nyag chaw;
koj tau cais kuas muaj nrim rua lub nplajteb nuav; koj teem kuas muaj caij ntuj kub hab muaj caij ntuj no.
Tabsis tug TSWV, ncu ntsoov has tas koj cov yeebncuab luag koj plig kawg, puab yog cov tuabneeg kws tsi fwm koj hab txobthuam koj heev.
Thov tsi xob ca koj tsaav tuabneeg kws taag kev ca sab poob moog rua puab cov yeebncuab kws sab phem teg; hab tsi xob muab koj tsaav neeg kws pheej raug luas tsimtxom tso tseg!
Ncu ntsoov tej kws koj tau nrug peb coglug ua ke lawm; rua qhov naj nub muaj kev yuam cai nyob rua txhua ceg kaum kws muaj kev tsaus ntuj nti huv lub tebchaws.
Thov tsi xob ca cov tuabneeg kws raug luas tsimtxom poob ntsejmuag; thov ca cov tuabneeg pluag hab cov tuabneeg txomnyem tau qhuas koj.
Vaajtswv, ca le sawv lug has koj rooj plaub! Ncu ntsoov has tas, cov tuabneeg kws tsi fwm koj luag koj plig taag nub le.
Ncu ntsoov koj cov yeebncuab tej suab qw kws npautawg vog, koj cov yeebncuab tej suab qw yeej nrov taag nub tsi ntsag le.
Vaajtswv, peb ua koj tsaug, peb ua koj tsaug! Peb qha has tas koj muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus, qha txug ntau yaam txujci tseemceeb kws koj tau ua lawm.
Vaajtswv has tas, “Kuv teem kuas muaj ib lub sijhawm ca txav txim. Hab kuv yuav txav txim kuas ncaaj nceeg.
Thaus txhua yaam kws muaj sa tshee nyo hab lub nplajteb ua zug kais lawm, kuv yuav tuav lub nplajteb kuas nyob ruaj khov kho.
Kuv has rua cov tuabneeg kws tsaav fwjchim kuas tsi xob khaavtheeb;
kuv txwv kuas puab tsi xob has lug khaavtheeb.”
Kev txav txim tsi yog yuav tuaj saab nubtuaj lossis saab nubpoob tuaj, hab tsi yog tuaj saab qaumteb lossis saab qaabteb tuaj;
tabsis Vaajtswv yog tug kws yuav txav txim ntaag, nwg txav txim rua qee leej hab zaam txim rua qee leej.

Vaajtswv tuav rawv ib lub khob ntawm nwg txhais teg, lub khob ntawd puv nkaus cov cawv qaab heev kws yog Vaajtswv txujkev chim. Vaajtswv muab laub lug, hab cov tuabneeg sab phem haus zum zawg; puab haus khee hlo huv qaab khob.
Tabsis kuv yuav tsi tseg qhov kws has txug Yakhauj tug Vaajtswv lossis hu nkauj qhuas nwg.
Vaajtswv yuav txu cov tuabneeg phem lub fwjchim kuas poob moog, tabsis nwg yuav tsaa cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg lub fwjchim kuas sab.
Cov Yudas yeej ibtxwm paub Vaajtswv zoo; cov Yixalayees yeej ibtxwm qhuas nwg lub npe.
Vaajtswv lub tsev nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees; nwg nyob sau lub Roob Xi-oos.
Nyob qhov ntawd, Vaajtswv luv cov yeebncuab tej xub neevnti, tej thaiv nav ntaaj, tej ntaaj hab tej cuabyeej ua rog.
Vaajtswv, koj tug tshwjchim ci ntsaa ab! Thaus koj nqeg sau tej roob kws koj tua yeej koj cov yeebncuab lug, koj muaj fwvxyeej kawg le.
Cov yeebncuab tej tubrog kws sab tawv tshaaj plawg, tuaj fuab luas tej khoom los yeej tuag taag huv tuabsi lawm, puab tug zug hab tej peevxwm paab tsi tau puab le.
Yakhauj tug Vaajtswv, thaus koj tawmtsaam cov yeebncuab, ua rua puab cov tubrog caij neeg hab puab tej neeg tuag taag.
Tabsis tug TSWV, txhua leej txhua tug yeej ntshai koj. Thaus koj chim tsi muaj leejtwg yuav muaj cuabkaav sawv taabmeeg koj.
Koj qha koj txujkev txav txim sau ntuj lug rua suavdlawg paub; tuabneeg nplajteb ntshai koj hab nyob ntsag tu.
Thaus kws koj sawv tseeg txav txim, koj cawm taagnrho cov tuabneeg kws raug luas tsimtxom huv nplajteb nuav.
Tuabneeg txujkev chim yuav hloov ua kev qhuas Vaajtswv; cov tuabneeg kws seem tuag huv tshaav rog los yuav npaaj kuas muaj rooj noj rooj haus  zoo sab ua koj tsaug.
Ca le muab yaam kws koj tau coglug rua tug TSWV kws yog koj tug Vaajtswv lawm rua nwg; txhua tsaav tuabneeg kws nyob ze, ca le nqaa mej tej khoom tuaj pub rua nwg. Vaajtswv ua rua tuabneeg fwm nwg;
Vaajtswv muab tej vaajntxwv cov tub kws khaavtheeb txu fwjchim hab ua kuas cov vaajntxwv kws muaj fwjchim ntshai kawg le.
Kuv tsaa suab hlo quaj rua Vaajtswv; kuv tsaa suab hlo quaj rua Vaajtswv, hab nwg nov kuv lub suab quaj.
Thaus kuv muaj kev ntxhuv sab, kuv thov tug Tswv; kuv tsaa teg thov Vaajtswv ib mos kaaj ntug plawg, tabsis kuv tseem tsi muaj kev kaaj sab le.
Thaus kuv xaav txug Vaajtswv, kuv ntxhuv sab kawg le; thaus kuv lub sab xaav txug Vaajtswv kuv qaug zug heev.
Nwg tsi pub kuv tsaug zug ib mos kaaj ntug plawg; kuv ntxhuv sab heev kuv has tsi tau lug le.
Kuv xaav txug lub caij lub nyoog kws dlhau moog zuj zug, hab ncu txug ntau xyoo kws tub dlhau lug tau ntev lawm.
Kuv xaav tsheej taag mo, kuv lub sab has tujtawg le nuav rua kuv:
“Tug TSWV txawm tsi leeg yuav peb le los? Nwg txawm yuav tsi txaus sab rua peb ntxiv le lawm los?
Vaajtswv tso peb tseg tsi hlub peb lawm los? Nwg tej lug cog tseg txawm yuav tsi tav le los?
Puas yog Vaajtswv tsi ncu qaab hlub peb lawm? Puas yog nwg txujkev chim hloov txujkev hlub chaw lawm?”
Kuv has tas, “Tej yaam kws mob kuv sab tshaaj plawg, zoo le Vaajtswv txawm tsi muaj fwjchim le lawm.”
Tug TSWV, kuv yuav ncu txug koj tej num kws tseemceeb; Kuv yuav rov ncu txug tej txujci tseemceeb kws koj ua yaav taag lug lawm.
Kuv yuav xaav txug txhua yaam kws koj tau ua taag lug lawm; kuv yuav ua tuab zoo xaav txug koj tej num kws tseemceeb.
Vaajtswv, txhua yaam kws koj ua, yeej yog yaam dlawbhuv; tsi muaj ib tug vaajtswv twg kws muaj fwjchim cuag koj.
Koj yog tug Vaajtswv kws ua tau tej txujci tseemceeb; koj qha rua ntau tsaav tuabneeg pum koj lub fwjchim.
Koj tau siv koj lub fwjchim cawm koj tsaav tuabneeg kws yog Yakhauj hab Yauxej obtug cov xeebntxwv.
Vaajtswv, thaus tej dlej pum dlheev koj puab ntshai koj, hab havtxwv qhov tub tub los yeej ntshai koj tshee nyo.
Tej fuab ua kuas muaj naag lug; hab xub nroo nrov nroo ntwg sau nruab ntug tuaj; hab tsaglig xub laim cig lab vog rua txhua qhov.
Koj ua rua xub nroo nrov nroo ntwg tuaj, hab tsaglig xub laim cig lab vog thoob nplajteb, ua rua lub nplajteb ua zug koog.
Koj moog kev sau tej nthwv dlej kws ndlaas nphau nphwv; koj rhais ruam hlaa pis hlo tej havtxwv tub, tabsis tsi pum koj tug neev taw tsuj qhov twg le.
Koj coj koj tsaav tuabneeg kev kev ib yaam le tug tswv yug yaaj coj paaj yaaj kws yog Aloos hab Mauxes obtug ua ob tug coj.
Kuv tsaav tuabneeg, mej ca le noog kuv tej lug qha, hab ua tuab zoo noog tej lug kws kuv has.
Kuv yuav siv tej lug txawj lug ntse has hab ua tuab zoo qha tej kws yaav taag lug tsi muaj tuabneeg paub.
Tej ntawd yog yaam kws peb tau nov hab paub, yog tej kws peb cov yawmkoob tau qha rua peb lawm.

Peb yuav tsi muab tej ntawd zais tsi qha rua peb tej mivnyuas; peb yuav qha tug TSWV lub fwjchim hab nwg teg num kws tseemceeb ib tam rua ib tam, hab qha has txug tej txujci luj kws nwg tau ua taag lug lawm.
Vaajtswv muab kevcai cob rua cov Yixalayees, hab muab Kaum Nqai Kevcai cob rua Yakhauj cov xeebntxwv. Nwg saamfwm kuas peb cov yawmkoob muab nwg tej Kevcai qha rua puab cov mivnyuas,
kuas tej xeebntxwv yaav tom ntej txhaj tau tej ntawd lug rua puab kawm, hab muab qha rua puab cov mivnyuas moog ntxiv.
Ua le nuav puab txhaj yuav ca sab rua Vaajtswv, ncu ntsoov tej num kws nwg tau ua lug lawm, hab naj nub coj lawv le Vaajtswv tej lug saamfwm.
Puab yuavtsum tsi xob coj lawv le puab cov yawmkoob kws yog tuabneeg ntxeev sab hab tsi noog lug, puab txujkev ca sab rua Vaajtswv tsi ruaj tsi khov hab puab tsi muab sab npuab Vaajtswv.
Cov Efalayees tub muaj neevnti hab muaj xub vug los tseem ca le tsiv huv tshaav rog moog lawm hab.
Puab tsi ceev Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg; puab tsi fwm hab ua lawv le Vaajtswv txuj kevcai.
Puab tsi ncu qaab txhua yaam kws Vaajtswv tau ua, hab tej txujci tseemceeb kws nwg ua rua puab pum lawm.
Vaajtswv ua tej txujci ntawd rua puab cov yawmkoob pum, thaus puab taug kev lug txug ntawm lub taj Xau-as huv tebchaws Iziv.
Vaajtswv ua rua dlej havtxwv faib hlo rua ob saab hab coj puab moog dlhau plawg rua saab tim u; Vaajtswv ua rua dlej sawv tseeg zoo le tej phaab ntsaa.
Thaus nruab nub nwg ua ib tauv fuab roog puab hab mo ntuj nwg ua ib tug nplaim tawg cig rua puab pum kev.
Nyob ntawm taj suabpuam nwg ua rua phaab pobzeb tawg txua hab muaj dlej txhawv huv qhov kws tub heev lug rua puab haus.
Nwg ua rua dlej txhawv huv qhov pobzeb tuaj, hab ndlwg ib yaam le tug dlej.
Tabsis puab pheej ua txhum rua Vaajtswv tsi tseg le, hab thaus nyob ntawm taj suabpuam puab tau ntxeev sab rua tug kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus.
Puab txhobtxwm sim Vaajtswv sab sab hab thov kuas Vaajtswv tso mov lug rua puab.
Puab has lug twm Vaajtswv has tas, “Vaajtswv puas muaj cuabkaav muab tau mov rua peb noj nyob ntawm taj suabpuam nuav?
Yeej muaj tseeb, Vaajtswv ntaus pobzeb tawg txua dlej txhawv ndlwg laub lug lug; tabsis nwg puas muaj cuabkaav muab tau mov hab nqaj rua peb noj?”
Thaus tug TSWV nov puab has le ntawd, nwg chim heev rua puab; nwg txhaj ua kuas muaj nplaim tawg tuaj kub nwg tsaav tuabneeg, hab nwg txujkev chim tau tawmtsaam puab,
rua qhov puab tsi ntseeg Vaajtswv hab tsi ntseeg has tas nwg muaj peevxwm cawm tau puab dlim le.
Tabsis nwg has rua lub ntuj kws nyob sau hab saamfwm kuas rooj ntug qheb;
Nwg tso mov sau ntuj lug rua puab, yog tso manas sau ntuj lug rua puab noj.
Yog le ntawd, puab txhaj tau noj cov timtswv ceebtsheej tej mov, hab Vaajtswv muab txhua yaam kws puab xaav tau rua puab.
Vaajtswv tseem ua kuas cov cua saab nubtuaj ntsawj tuaj, hab nwg siv nwg lub fwjchim ua rua kuas cov cua saab qaabteb ntsawj tuaj;
hab nwg tso noog lug rua nwg tsaav tuabneeg noj, cov noog ntawd ntau ib yaam le tej xuabzeb ntawm ntug havtxwv;
cov noog ntawd lug puv nkaus rua huv lub plawv yeej hab puagncig tej tsevntaub kws puab nyob.
Yog le ntawd, cov Yixalayees txhaj muaj nqaj noj txaus puab sab; Vaajtswv tau muab txhua yaam kws puab xaav tau rua puab.
Txawm yog puab tseem npuav rawv mov huv qhovncauj los puab tseem pheej tsi txaus sab le,
thaus ntawd Vaajtswv chim kawg rua puab, Vaajtswv txhaj tua puab cov tuabneeg kws muaj zug heev hab cov Yixalayees tej tub hluas kws zoo heev povtseg.
Txawm yog tub muaj tej nuav los puab tseem ua txhum quas qeeg; txawm yog nwg ua ntau yaam txujci rua puab pum los puab yeej tsi ntseeg nwg le.
Yog le ntawd, Vaajtswv txhaj ua rua puab txujsa yaaj ntshis moog ib yaam le ua paa hab tuab ntsais muag xwb, puab lub neej raug kev puamtsuaj taag.
Thaus Vaajtswv tua puab ibtxha lawm, cov kws seem rov lug cuag nwg, puab txhaj thov Vaajtswv hab hloov dlua sab tshab.
Puab rov ncu txug has tas, Vaajtswv txhaj yog tug kws tiv thaiv puab, hab tug muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus yog tug kws tau lug paab puab.
Tabsis tej lug kws puab has ntawd yog lug dlaag xwb; tsi muaj ib lus kws yog lug tseeb le.
Puab tsi muab sab npuab Vaajtswv; puab tsi ua sab ncaaj rua Vaajtswv tej lug kws cog tseg rua puab.

Tabsis Vaajtswv tseem hlub hab taabncuab nwg tsaav tuabneeg. Nwg zaam puab tej kev txhum hab tsi ua kuas puab puamtsuaj. Muaj ntau zag Vaajtswv tau thim nwg txujkev chim hab cheem nwg txujkev npautawg.
Vaajtswv yeej ncu txug has tas, puab yog tuabneeg xwb, puab zoo ib yaam le nthwv cua kws ntsawj lug hab tub dlhau moog lawm.
Nyob ntawm taj suabpuam, puab pheej ntxeev sab rua Vaajtswv hab puab tau ua rua Vaajtswv tu sab heev.
Puab pheej sim Vaajtswv sab ib zag taag ib zag tuaj; hab ua rua cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws Dlawbhuv chim kawg le.
Puab tsi ncu qaab Vaajtswv lub fwjchim kws luj hab nub kws nwg cawm puab dlim ntawm puab cov yeebncuab txhais teg,
hab siv nwg lub fwjchim luj ua tej txujci tseemceeb rua puab pum ntawm lub taj nraag Xau-as huv tebchaws Iziv.
Vaajtswv muab tej dlej hloov ua ntshaav, hab ua rua cov tuabneeg Iziv tsi tau dlej haus le.
Nwg tso yoov yaa lug puv nkaus txhua qhov tsimtxom cov Iziv hab tso qaav lug ua rua puab lub tebchaws puamtsuaj.
Hab tso kooj txomfaav lug noj puab tej qoobloo huv puab tej laj teb puamtsuaj taag.
Nwg tseem tso lawg lug ntaus puab tej txiv maab hab tso te lug tua puab tej ntoo txiv ncuav pas tuag taag.
Nwg tso lawg lug ntaus puab tej nyuj, hab tso tsaglig xub laim tua puab tej yaaj tej tshis tuag taag huv tuabsi.
Nwg tso nwg txujkev chim kws nruj tsiv lug rua puab, ua rua puab ntxhuv sab kawg le, qhov ntawd yog nwg tso ib paab timtswv ceebtsheej coj txujkev tuag lug rua puab.
Vaajtswv yeej tsi cheem nwg txujkev chim lossis tsi txuag puab sav le, tabsis nwg tso kaab mob aws lug tua puab tuag coob heev.
Nwg tua cov Iziv txhua yim tug tub hlub tuag taag.
Ces nwg coj nwg tsaav tuabneeg tawm lug ib yaam le tug tub yug yaaj, hab coj puab kev lug hlaa taj suabpuam.
Nwg coj puab lug kaaj sab lug, hab tsi ntshai dlaabtsi le; tabsis dlej havtxwv nphau nphwv lug npug puab tej yeebncuab.
Nwg coj puab lug rua huv nwg lub tebchaws dlawbhuv, hab lug nyob sau tej roob kws nwg tua yeej lawm.

Nwg muab lwm tsaav tuabneeg ntab tawm tsiv thaus nwg coj nwg tsaav tuabneeg lug nyob; nwg muab lub tebchaws ntawd faib rua txhua xeem Yixalayees hab muab puab tej vaaj tej tsev rua nwg tsaav tuabneeg nyob.
Tabsis puab tseem ntxeev sab tawmtsaam tug Vaajtswv kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus hab puab pheej sim nwg sab. Puab tsi noog Vaajtswv tej lug saamfwm le.
Puab ntxeev sab hab tsi muab sab npuab Vaajtswv ib yaam le puab cov yawmkoob, puab zoo ib yaam le xibxub nkhaus kws siv tsi tau lawm.
Puab ua rua Vaajtswv chim kawg, vim puab tej chaw teev dlaab, hab puab ua rua Vaajtswv npautawg heev vim puab pe mlom.
Vaajtswv chim heev thaus nwg pum tej mlom ntawd, yog le ntawd, nwg txhaj tso nwg tsaav tuabneeg tseg tsi quavntsej puab lawm.
Vaajtswv muab nwg lub tsevntaub huv Silaus yog lub tsev kws nwg nrug peb nyob ntawd tso tseg lawm hab.
Nwg ca peb cov yeebncuab tuaj txeeb tau lub Phijxaab kws ntim Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg, yog lub cim ntawm Vaajtswv lub fwjchim hab tug tshwjchim kws ci ntsaa ab.
Nwg chim heev rua nwg tsaav tuabneeg, nwg txhaj ca puab cov yeebncuab tuaj tua puab.
Puab cov tub hluas tuag taag rua huv tshaav rog, tsi muaj leejtwg yuav puab tej ntxhais le.
Cov povthawj los raug luas tua tuag taag, hab luas tsi pub puab cov quaspuj quaj nyav le.
Thaus kawg tug TSWV txhaj sawv tseeg, ib yaam le tug kws tsim nruab dlaab ndlub, nwg zoo ib yaam le tug txivneej kws haus cawv ua rua nwg muaj zug.
Nwg ua rua nwg cov yeebncuab swb kag hab thim plhawv rov qaab poob ntsejmuag moog ibtxhis le lawm.
Tabsis nwg tsi leeg paub Yauxej cov xeebntxwv. Vaajtswv tsi xaiv xeem Efalayees.
Tabsis Vaajtswv xaiv xeem Yudas hab lub Roob Xi-oos kws nwg hlub tshaaj plawg.
Nwg tsim nwg lub Tuamtsev zoo le nwg lub tsev kws nyob sau ntuj; nwg ua lub tsev ntawd ruaj ib yaam le lub nplajteb kws nyob ruaj khov moog ibtxhis.
Nwg xaiv Daviv kws yog nwg tug tubkhai; nwg coj Daviv tawm huv tshaav zaub
qhov chaw kws Daviv zuv Daviv paab yaaj lug, hab muab Daviv tsaa ua vaajntxwv kaav cov Yixalayees, Daviv yog tug tub yug yaaj kws saib Vaajtswv tsaav tuabneeg.
Daviv muaj lub sab dlawb paug saib puab, hab nwg muaj tswvyim zoo coj puab.
Vaajtswv, lwm tsaav tuabneeg tub tuaj vij koj lub tebchaws lawm; puab tuaj ua tsi huv rua koj lub Tuamtsev kws dlawbhuv, hab ca lub nroog Yeluxalees pob puag taag.
Puab ca koj tsaav tuabneeg tej cev tuag rua dlaav npoj noj, hab ca koj cov tubkhai tej cev tuag rua tej tsaj qus noj.
Puab tua koj tsaav tuabneeg tej ntshaav tawm ndlwg cuag dlej; ntshaav ndlwg moog thoob plawg lub nroog Yeluxalees, hab tsi muaj leejtwg faus cov tuabneeg tuag ntawd le.
Tub yog cov tuabneeg kws nyob puagncig peb tuaj tsimtxom peb ntaag; puab luag peb plig hab thuam peb lub npe kawg le.
Tug TSWV, koj yuav chim rua peb moog ibtxhis le los? Koj txujkev chim yuav kub le suavtawg moog tsi paub tuag le los?
Ca koj txujkev chim moog rua tsaav tuabneeg kws tsi pehawm koj, moog rua cov tuabneeg kws tsi tsaa ncauj thov koj.
Vim puab tau tuaj tua koj tsaav tuabneeg tuag taag, hab tau ua rua koj lub tebchaws puamtsuaj taag lawm.
Thov koj tsi xob rau txim rua peb vim peb cov yawmkoob tej kev txhum. Thov koj taabncuab peb; nwgnuav peb taag kev ca sab lawm.
Vaajtswv, thov paab peb hab cawm peb; thov tso peb dlim hab zaam peb tej kev txhum, kuas koj tau koob meej.

Vim le caag yuav ca lwm tsaav tuabneeg nug peb has tas, “Mej tug Vaajtswv dlua twg lawm?” Thov ca peb pum koj rau txim rua lwm tsaav tuabneeg, vim puab tuaj ua rua koj cov tubkhai nqaj ndluag ntshaav nrug.
Thov koj noog cov tuabneeg kws raug luas kaw tej suab quaj, hab siv koj lub fwjchim tso cov tuabneeg kws raug teem txim tuag kuas dlim.
Tug TSWV, thov koj ua xyaa npaug pauj rua cov tuabneeg sab phem ntawd. Vim tej kws puab tau ua txobthuam koj lub koob lub npe lawm.
Ces peb cov kws yog koj tsaav tuabneeg, paab yaaj kws yog koj tug, yuav ua koj tsaug hab qhuas koj lub npe moog ibtxhis le.
Cov Yixalayees tug Tswv Yug Yaaj, thov koj noog peb tej lug thov; tug thawj kws coj koj paab yaaj, thov noog peb tej suab hu lauj. Koj ca le moog nyob sau lub zwmtxwv sau ob tug qhelunpees.
Thov qha koj rua xeem Efalayees, xeem Npeenyamees, hab xeem Manaxes. Thov qha koj lub fwjchim rua peb hab lug cawm peb!
Vaajtswv, thov coj peb rov qaab lug! Thov qha koj txujkev hlub rua peb, peb txhaj le yuav dlim!
Tug TSWV kws yog Vaajtswv tug muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus, koj tseem yuav chim rua koj tsaav tuabneeg tej lug thov ntev npaum le caag hab?
Koj muab cov mov kws yog kev quaj ntsuag rua peb noj, hab muab lub khob kws yog cov kua muag rua peb haus lawm.
Koj ca cov tuabneeg kws nyob puagncig peb tuaj tua peb lub tebchaws; peb cov yeebncuab tuaj txob thuam peb kawg le.
