Vaajtswv tug muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus coj peb rov qaab lug! Thov qha koj txujkev hlub rua peb, peb txhaj yuav dlim!
Koj muab lwm tsaav tuabneeg ntab tsiv moog; hab coj txiv maab nraag tebchaws Iziv lug cog rua huv lub tebchaws nuav.
Koj tu thaaj chaw dlu dlav rua cov txiv maab luj hlub; nrhau caag moog tub hab hlaav moog puv nkaus lub tebchaws.
Nwg ua dluab ntxoo tuaj roog tej hauv roob; nwg tej ceg ua dluab ntxoo roog taagnrho tej ntoo cab kws luj sab.
Nwg tej ceg dlauv moog ti nkaus ntawm ntug Havtxwv Meditelanees hab nthuav moog tis nkaus rua peg tug dlej Efalates.
Vim le caag koj muab tug ntsaa laajkaab kws xov lub vaaj ntawd rhuav lawm? Nwgnuav txhua tug tuabneeg kws dlua kev moog lug txhaj nyag tau tej txiv maab ntawd;
npuateb nkaag lug rua huv vaaj hab tsuj tej txiv maab taag, hab tej tsaj qus lug muab noj taag dlu lug lawm.
Vaajtswv tug kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus, ca le rov qaab lug cuag peb! Thov koj tsaa qhovmuag sau ntuj tuaj saib peb; thov koj ca le lug hab cawm koj tsaav tuabneeg!
Thov koj ca le lug cawm tsob txiv maab kws koj cog ca, cov txiv maab kws koj tu hlub mog nyoos!
Peb cov yeebncuab muab tsob txiv maab ntawd ntuv hab puab tis suavtawg hlawv, thov koj ca le saib puab hab muab puab ua kuas puab puamtsuaj taag!
Thov koj tsomkwm hab tiv thaiv tsaav tuabneeg kws koj xaiv tseg, yog tsaav tuabneeg kws koj tau pub kuas muaj zug heev.
Peb yuav tsi tsiv tawm ntawm koj moog lawm; thov koj paab kuas peb muaj sa nyob, peb yuav qhuas koj xwb.
Tug TSWV kws yog Vaajtswv tug muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus, thov coj peb rov qaab lug. Thov qha koj txujkev hlub rua peb, peb txhaj yuav dlim.
Ca le qw zoo sab rua Vaajtswv tug kws tiv thaiv peb; ca le hu nkauj qhuas Yakhauj tug Vaajtswv!
Ca le pib ntaus nkauj nogncaas hab nruag npuaj; ca le tshuab raaj hab ntaus nkauj nogncaas.
Ca le tshuab xyu rua rooj noj rooj haus thaus hli xab hab thaus hli nraa.
Nuav yog cov Yixalayees txuj kevcai, hab yog cov lug kws Yakhauj tug Vaajtswv tau saamfwm kuas ua le ntawd.
Nwg muab txuj kevcai nuav cob rua cov Yixalayees thaus kws nwg tawmtsaam lub tebchaws Iziv. Kuv nov ib lub suab kws kuv tsi paub, lub suab ntawd has tas,
“Kuv tsaws lub nraa nyaav kws nyob sau mej nrausqaum; kuv tso mej dlim ntawm txujkev kws nqaa tej thwvcib nyaav heev.

Thaus mej raug kev txomnyem, mej hu txug kuv, kuv tau cawm mej dlim. Kuv teb mej tej lug thov huv cov naag xub naag cua kws kuv nyob tuaj; kuv tau sim mej sab thaus mej tseem nyob ntawm lub qhov dlej txhawv Melinpas.
Kuv tsaav tuabneeg, mej ca le noog kuv tej lug ntuag; cov Yixalayees, kuv xaav kuas mej noog kuv tej lug!
Mej tsi xob moog pe lwm tug vaajtswv.
Kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv, kws tau coj mej tsiv nraag tebchaws Iziv lug. Ca le rua ncauj, kuv yuav pub mov rua mej noj.
“Tabsis kuv tsaav tuabneeg tsi noog kuv tej lug; cov Yixalayees tsi fwm kuv le.
Yog le ntawd, kuv txhaj ca puab ua lawv le puab lub sab tawv hab ua lawv le puab sab xaav.
Kuv xaav kuas kuv tsaav tuabneeg noog kuv lug; hab xaav kuas puab fwm kuv kawg le!
Ces kuv yuav ceev nrooj moog ua kuas puab cov yeebncuab swb, hab ua kuas yeej taagnrho puab cov yeebncuab.
Cov tuabneeg kws ntxub kuv, yuav ntshai hab txhus caug ndlua ntawm kuv xubndlag; hab kuv yuav rau txim rua puab moog ibtxhis le.
Tabsis kuv yuav muab cov mov kws zoo tshaaj plawg rua mej noj hab muab tej zib ntaab kws mej txaus sab heev rua mej noj.”
Vaajtswv nyob ntawm lub rooj txav txim sau ntuj; nwg txav txim rua tej vaajtswv has tas:
“Mej yuavtsum tseg txujkev txav txim tsi ncaaj; mej tsi xob tuaj cov tuabneeg tsi ncaaj tog!
Mej ca le tsaa cov tuabneeg pluag hab cov mivnyuas ntsuag txuj cai; mej ca le ua ncaaj rua cov tuabneeg txomnyem hab cov tuabneeg kws tsi muaj leejtwg paab.
Ca le cawm cov tuabneeg txomnyem kuas dlim ntawm cov tuabneeg sab phem txhais teg.
“Ua caag mej tsi totaub le! Ua caag mej ruag ua luaj le! Mej yeej ua tsi ncaaj le, kev ncaaj nceeg txhaj pluj huv lub nplajteb nuav moog lawm.
Kuv has tas, ‘Mej yog tej vaajtswv, mej puavleej yog tug kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus cov mivnyuas;’
tabsis mej yuav tuag ib yaam le tej tuabneeg; hab mej kev ua neej yuav xaus moog ib yaam le tej numtswv txhua tug.”
Vaajtswv, ca le nqeg lug tswj lub nplajteb nuav; txhua tsaav tuabneeg kws nyob huv nplajteb nuav puavleej yog koj tug.
Vaajtswv, thov koj tsi xob nyob ntsag tu; tsi xob ua tug tsi paub hab tsi xob nyob tuabywv!
Ca le saib! Koj tej yeebncuab tub ntxeev sab hab cov kws ntxub koj tub sawv tawmtsaam koj lawm.
Puab lub sab xaav nraim nkoog ua phem rua koj tsaav tuabneeg; puab ntxeev sab rua tsaav tuabneeg kws koj naj nub tsomkwm.
Puab has tas, “Ca le tuaj peb moog tua puab lub tebchaws kuas puamtsuaj taag; kuas luas txhaj tsi ncu txug tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees moog ibtxhis le lawm.”
Cov yeebncuab kws pum zoo ua le puab has hab koom sab ua ke tawmtsaam koj yog:
Cov Edoos, cov Yisamayees, cov Mau-am hab cov Hakis,
cov Nkenpas, cov Amoos hab cov Amalej, cov Filitees hab hab cov Tiles.
Cov Axilias los kuj koom teg nrug puab hab ua phoojywg nrug cov Amoos hab cov Mau-am kws yog Lauj cov xeebntxwv.
Thov koj ca le ua rua puab ib yaam le koj ua rua cov Midias, cov Xixelas hab cov Yanpees kws nyob ntawm tug Dlej Kisoos.
Koj tau tua puab swb nyob ntawm Edaules, puab tuag hab lwj taag rua huv aav.
Thov koj tua puab cov thawjcoj ib yaam le koj tua Aules hab Xees; thov koj tua kuas puab cov numtswv swb ib yaam le koj tua Xenpas hab Xamunas,
vim puab khaav has tas, “Peb yuav moog txeeb lub tebchaws kws yog Vaajtswv tug lug ua peb tug.”
Vaajtswv, thov koj muab puab ntab tsiv kuas taag ib yaam le tej moov aav, hab ib yaam le tej quavnyaab kws cua muab ntsawj yaa taag,
hab ib yaam le suavtawg kub haav zoov, ib yaam le tej nplaim tawg kws cig laim lag sau tej ncov roob,
thov koj tso naag xub naag cua lawv puab tsiv tawm moog, hab tso cua dlaaj cua dlub lug ntsawj ua kuas puab ntshai heev.
Tug TSWV, thov koj ua kuas puab raug kev txaajmuag. Hab kuas puab pum koj lub fwjchim.
Thov kuas puab swb hab ntshai moog taag ibtxhis le; thov kuas puab tuag ua rhuav plhu ntsuav.
Kuas puab paub has tas, koj tuab leeg txhaj yog tug TSWV, hab yog tug muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus kws kaav lub qaab ntuj nuav.
Tug TSWV kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus, kuv nyam koj lub Tuamtsev heev!
Kuv xaav moog nyob huv kawg le! kuv kub sab lug xaav moog nyob huv tug TSWV lub Tuamtsev. kuv yuav hu nkauj xyivfaab kawg sab kawg ntsws qhuas Vaajtswv tug kws muaj sa nyob.

Tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus, yog kuv tug Vaajntxwv hab kuv tug Vaajtswv; txawm yog tej noog tsev los tub txawj ua zeg nyob, hab tej noog luv los yeej muaj chaw rua puab nyob, cov noog ntawd coj puab tej mivnyuas lug nyob ze ntawm koj lub thaaj,
Cov tuabneeg kws muaj lub sab tug yog cov kws nyob huv koj lub Tuamtsev, puab hu nkauj qhuas koj tsi tseg tsi tu le.
Cov tuabneeg kws tau lub sab tug yog cov kws koj pub kuas puab muaj dlaag muaj zug, hab moog pehawm koj tsi tseg sau lub Roob Xi-oos.
Thaus puab taug kev lug hlaa lub haav qhuav Npakas, lub haav ntawd ca le txhawv dlej ntau qhov; thaus txug lub caij ntuj naag tej chaw ntawd muaj paag dlej teev mag.
Thaus puab taug kev moog, puab pheej muaj zug heev dlua qub; puab yuav pum Vaajtswv nyob sau Roob Xi-oos. Nwg yog tej vaajtswv tug Vaajtswv.
Tug TSWV kws yog Vaajtswv tug muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus, thov noog kuv tej lug thov; Yakhauj tug Vaajtswv, thov noog kuv lub suab!
Vaajtswv, thov koj foom koob moov rua peb tug vaajntxwv, nwg yog tug kws koj tau xaiv ca lawm.
Nyob ib nub huv koj lub Tuamtsev zoo dlua le nyob lwm qhov ib txheeb nub; kuv ua tug zuv kuv tug Vaajtswv lub qhovrooj zoo dlua moog nyob nyob huv cov tuabneeg sab phem tej tsev.

Tug TSWV yog tug tiv thaiv peb hab yog peb tug vaajntxwv kws muaj koob meej, nwg foom koob moov rua peb hab ua zoo kuas peb tau ntsejmuag. Nwg zoo sab pub txhua yaam zoo rua cov tuabneeg kws ua ncaaj ua nceeg.
Tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus, cov tuabneeg kws ca sab rua koj, tau nyob kaaj sab lug.
Tug TSWV, koj yeej hlub koj lub tebchaws; koj ua rua tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees rov vaammeej dlua.
Koj zaam koj tsaav tuabneeg tej kev txhum, hab tsi suav tej kws puab ua tsi yog le.
Koj tub tseg tsi chim rua koj tsaav tuabneeg lawm, hab koj tswj qhov kws koj npautawg rua puab ca.
Vaajtswv kws yog peb tug Cawmseej, thov coj peb rov lug cuag koj, hab thov koj tsi xob chim rua peb lawm!
Koj yuav chim rua peb moog ibtxhis le los? Koj txujkev chim yuav tsi xaam ib zag le los?
Thov koj pub kuas peb rov muaj zug dlua, mas peb cov kws yog koj tsaav tuabneeg yuav qhuas koj.
Tug TSWV, thov koj hlub peb naj nub txhua mo, hab paab kuas peb dlim.

Kuv taabtom noog tug TSWV kws yog Vaajtswv tej lug has rua kuv; nwg coglug has tas, yog peb tsi tig rov moog ua txhum le tej tuabneeg ruag, ces nwg yuav pub peb cov kws yog nwg tsaav tuabneeg tau nyob kaaj sab lug.
Qhov tseemceeb, nwg yeej npaaj txhij cawm cov tuabneeg kws fwm nwg lawm, hab nwg yuav nyob huv peb lub tebchaws paab kuas peb dlim.
Kev sis hlub hab kev ua sab dlawb sab zoo yuav lug ua ke; kev ncaaj nceeg hab kev sis humxeeb yuav lug sis puag.
Tuabneeg txujkev ua sab mog sab muas yuav tsaa teg huv nplajteb nuav rua sau, hab Vaajtswv txujkev ncaaj nceeg yuav saib sau ntuj tuaj.
Tug TSWV yuav ua rua peb vaammeej, ces peb lub tebchaws yuav muaj qoobloo nplua mag rua peb sau.
Txujkev ncaaj nceeg yuav ua tug TSWV ntej lug hab khu kev rua nwg.
Tug TSWV, thov koj noog hab teb kuv tej lug thov, vim kuv taag kev ca sab hab qaug zug heev lawm.
Thov cawm kuas kuv dlim Ntawm txujkev tuag, rua qhov kuv yeej fwm koj; thov cawm kuv kws yog koj tug tubkhai, kuv ca sab ntsoov rua koj.
Koj yog kuv tug Vaajtswv, thov Koj taabncuab kuv; kuv thov ib nub tsaus ntuj ndlais.
Tug TSWV, thov paab kuas koj tug tubkhai tau kev zoo sab, vim kuv tau thov koj lawm.
Koj yeej ua zoo rua peb hab zaam peb lub txim, koj txujkev hlub kws tsi paub kawg muaj rua txhua tug kws thov koj.
Tug TSWV, thov koj noog kuv tej lug thov hab noog kuv lub suab quaj thov paab.
Thaus kuv muaj kev ntxhuv sab kuv hu txug koj, koj yeej teb kuv tej lug thov.
Tug TSWV, tsi muaj dlua lwm tug vaajtswv zoo cuag koj, tsi muaj leejtwg txawj ua tau tej txujci zoo le koj ua.
Txhua tsaav tuabneeg kws koj tsim yuav tuaj txhus caug pehawm koj; puab yuav qhuas koj lub npe kws zoo kawg nkaus.
Koj yog tug muaj fwjchim luj hab ua tau tej txujci tseemceeb; koj tuab leeg xwb txhaj yog Vaajtswv.
Tug TSWV, thov koj qha kuas kuv paub ua lawv le koj lub sab nyam, kuv yuav fwm koj ntawm lub sab ncaaj nceeg; thov pub kuas kuv muaj lub sab dlawb paug pehawm koj.
Tug TSWV kws yog kuv tug Vaajtswv, kuv yuav qhuas koj lub npe kawg sab kawg ntsws; hab kuv yuav tshaajtawm koj lub npe kuas nrov nchaa moog ibtxhis.
Koj txujkev hlub muaj nyob moog tsi paub kawg le! Koj tau cawm kuv dlim ntawm lub qhov tuag lug.
Vaajtswv, cov tuabneeg khaavtheeb pheej tuaj tawmtsaam kuv; cov tuabneeg sab phem pheej yuav muab kuv tua povtseg, cov tuabneeg ntawd yog cov kws tsi quavntsej koj le.
Tabsis tug TSWV, koj yog tug kws muaj kev taabncuab, hab yog tug Vaajtswv kws muaj kev hlub. Koj ibtxwm muaj lub sab ntev, sab zoo hab ua ncaaj nceeg.
Thov koj tig lug cuag kuv hab taabncuab kuv; thov txhawb kuv tug zug hab cawm kuv; rua qhov kuv muaj lub sab dlawb paug pehawm koj ib yaam le koj tug tubkhai kws muab sab npuab koj.
Tug TSWV, thov qha koj txujkev ua sab dlawb sab zoo rua kuv; cov tuabneeg kws ntxub kuv yuav raug kev txaajmuag thaus puab pum koj pub kuv muaj kev zoo sab hab paab kuv.
Tug TSWV tsim nwg lub nroog rua sau lub roob dlawbhuv;
tug TSWV hlub lub nroog Yeluxalees tshaaj lwm thaaj chaw kws nyob huv lub tebchaws Yixalayees.
Vaajtswv lub nroog, ca le ua tuab zoo noog tej lug zoo kws nwg has txug koj:

“Thaus kuv suav tej tsaav tuabneeg kws noog kuv lug npe, kuv suav cov Iziv hab cov Npanpiloos huv tuabsi; cov Filitees, cov Tiles hab cov Sudaas, kuv yuav suav puab npe nrug cov pejxeem huv lub nroog Yeluxalees.”
Puab yuav has tas txhua tsaav tuabneeg kws nyob sau roob Xi-oos has tas, tug kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus yuav ua kuas lub Roob Xi-oos nyob ruaj khov.
Tug TSWV yuav sau cov tuabneeg ntawd tej npe rua huv ntawv khaws ca hab suav has tas puab puavleej yog pejxeem huv lub nroog Yeluxalees.
Puab dlha seev cev hu nkauj has tas, “Xi-oos yog lub hauvpaug kws txhawv koob moov lug rua peb suavdlawg.”
Tug TSWV kws yog Vaajtswv hab yog kuv tug Cawmseej, kuv quaj ib nub tsaus ntuj ndlais, hab thaus tsaus ntuj; kuv txaav lug nyob ntawm koj xubndlag.
Thov noog kuv tej lug thov; thov noog kuv lub suab quaj kws thov paab!
Muaj ntau yaam kev ntxhuv sab lug raug kuv ua rua kuv yuav laug tuag,
kuv zoo ib yaam le tug tuabneeg kws tub yuav tuag; kuv tug zug ntaug taag lawm.
Kuv raug muab tso nrug cov tuabneeg kws tuag lawm; kuv zoo ib yaam le cov tuabneeg kws luas muab tua tso huv qhov ntxaa, cov tuabneeg kws koj ncu tsi txug hab koj muab puab tso tseg lawm.
Koj muab kuv pov rua huv lub qhov ntxaa kws tub, hab pov rua huv lub qhov ntuj kws tsaus nti.
Koj txujkev chim tsuam kuv nyaav kawg le, hab nphau lug npug kuv ib yaam le nthwv dlej havtxwv ndlaas.
Koj ua rua kuv cov phoojywg tsiv taag tso kuv tseg; koj ua rua kuv txaus puab ntxub kawg le. Kuv raug kaw rua saab huv hab tsiv tsi dlim le;
kuv ob lub qhovmuag qheb tsi taug vim kev txomnyem. Tug TSWV, kuv naj nub hu txug koj hab tsaa teg thov koj.
Koj ua tej txujci tseemceeb rua cov tuabneeg tuag lawm hab los? Puab puas sawv lug hab qhuas koj?
Luas puas pav koj txujkev hlub kws tsi paub kawg rua huv tej qhov ntxaa lossis pav koj txujkev ncaaj nceeg rua huv qhov chaw puamtsuaj?
Puas pum koj tej txujci tseemceeb nyob huv qhov chaw tsaus ntuj nti lossis koj txujkev ua zoo puas nyob huv lub tebchaws kws muab tso tseg lawm?
Tug TSWV, kuv thov koj paab; kuv naj taagkig thov koj.
Tug TSWV, vim le caag koj tso kuv tseg? Vim le caag koj tig rausqaum rua kuv lawm?
Kuv yeej raug kev txomnyem txij thaus kuv tseem hluas lug, hab kuv tub yuav laug tuag; kuv taag kev ca sab, vim koj txujkev rau txim nyaav heev.
Koj txujkev chim tsuam nkaus kuv; koj txujkev npautawg kws txaus ntshai ua rua kuv puamtsuaj taag.
Tej ntawd vij puagncig kuv ib nub tsaus ntuj ib yaam le dlej nyaab; tej ntawd thaiv kuv kev txhua phaab taagnrho.
Koj ua rua kuv tug phoojywg kws zoo tshaaj plawg tso kuv tseg, tsuas yog kev tsaus ntuj txhaj tseem ua phoojywg rua kuv xwb.
Tug TSWV, kuv yuav naj nub hu nkauj qhuas koj txujkev hlub kws tsi paub kawg; kuv yuav qha koj txujkev ncaaj nceeg moog ibtxhis.
Kuv paub has tas, koj txujkev hlub yeej muaj nyob moog ibtxhis, hab koj txujkev ncaaj nceeg nyob ruaj nreeg ib yaam le lub ntuj.
Koj has tas, “Kuv tau coglug nrug tug tuabneeg kws kuv xaiv lawm; kuv tau coglug rua kuv tug tubkhai Daviv has tas,
‘Koj cov xeebntxwv yuav tau ua vaajntxwv moog le; kuv yuav ceev koj lub zwmtxwv kuas muaj nyob moog ibtxhis.’ ”
Qaum ntuj hu nkauj qhuas tej txujci tseemceeb kws koj ua; tug TSWV, cov tuabneeg dlawbhuv yuav hu nkauj qhuas koj txujkev ncaaj nceeg.
Tug TSWV, nyob sau ntuj yeej tsi muaj leejtwg zoo le koj; cov timtswv ceebtsheej tsi muaj ib tug yuav zoo npaum le koj.
Cov tuabneeg dlawbhuv txhua tug puavleej fwm koj; hab sawv ntawm koj xubndlag huv lub rooj saablaaj.
Tug TSWV kws yog Vaajtswv tug muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus, tsi muaj lwm tug muaj fwjchim npaum le koj lawm; tug TSWV, koj yeej ncaaj nceeg rua txhua yaam kws koj ua.
Koj kaav taagnrho tej havtxwv kws muaj zug; koj ua rua tej nthwv dlej kws ndlaas ntawd tug hab nyob ntsag tu.
Koj muab tug Lahaj kws yog tug zaaj huv havtxwv tsuj nthi hab muab tua kag; koj siv koj tug zug luj zug nchaav ua rua koj cov yeebncuab swb lawm.
Lub ntuj hab lub nplajteb yog koj tug; koj tsim ib puas tsaav yaam kws muaj nyob huv lub nplajteb nuav.
Koj yog tug tsim saab qaumteb hab saab qaabteb; lub Roob Tanpaus hab lub Roob Helemoos hu nkauj zoo sab qhuas koj.
Ua caag koj muaj fwjchim luj ua luaj! Ua caag koj muaj zug luj zug nchaav ua luaj le!
Koj lub tebchaws cog ruaj khov rua ntawm txujkev ncaaj nceeg hab kev tseeb; txhua yaam kws koj ua qha rua peb paub has tas koj yog tug sab zoo hab muaj kev hlub.
Cov tuabneeg kws hu nkauj qhuas koj hab cov tuabneeg kws ua lub neej nyob huv qhov kaaj ntawm koj txujkev ua sab dlawb sab zoo mas puab muaj kev zoo sab heev.
Vim muaj koj puab txhaj zoo sab taag nub; hab puab qhuas koj txujkev ua sab dlawb sab zoo.
Koj paab peb muaj yeej luj kawg le; vim koj txujkev hlub, koj txhaj pub peb kovyeej.
Tug TSWV, koj xaiv tug kws tiv thaiv peb; koj yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv Dlawbhuv kws pub peb muaj vaajntxwv.

Tau ntev lug lawm zaaj ywgtoog kws koj has rua koj tug tubkhai kws muab sab npuab koj has tas, “Kuv tau paab ib tug tubrog kws nto npe heev; kuv tau muab lub zwmtxwv cob rua tug kws kuv xaiv ntawm cov pejxeem lug.
Kuv tau muab roj laub rua sau kuv tug tubkhai Daviv taubhau hab tsaa nwg ua vaajntxwv.
Kuv yuav txhawb nwg tug zug moog le, kuv lub fwjchim yuav ua rua nwg muaj zug heev.
Nwg cov yeebncuab yuav kov kov tsi yeej nwg; hab cov tuabneeg sab phem yuav kov tsi yeej nwg.
Kuv yuav tsuj ntag nwg cov yeebncuab hab tua txhua tug kws ntxub nwg.
Kuv yuav hlub nwg hab ua sab zoo rua nwg; kuv yuav paab kuas nwg kovyeej luas moog le.
Kuv yuav nthuav nwg lub tebchaws kuas dlaav txij ndlua ntawm Havtxwv Meditelanees moog txug ndlua tug Dlej Efalates.
Nwg yuav has rua kuv tas, ‘Koj yog kuv leej Txiv hab yog kuv tug Vaajtswv; koj yog lub pobzeb kws yog kuv txujkev cawm dlim.’
Kuv yuav tsaa nwg ua kuv tug tub hlub, nwg yog tug Vaajntxwv kws muaj fwjchim luj dlua lwm tug vaajntxwv.
Kuv yuav ceev kuv tej lug cog tseg rua nwg moog le, hab tej kws kuv tau nrug nwg sis coglug yuav nyob moog ibtxhis.
Nwg lub zwmtxwv yuav nyob ruaj khov ib yaam le lub ntuj; hab nwg caajceg yuav ua vaajntxwv moog le.
“Tabsis yog nwg caajceg tsi fwm kuv tej kevcai, hab tsi ua lub neej lawv le kuv tej lug saamfwm,
hab yog puab tsi ceev kuv tej lug qhuab ntuag, hab tsi khaws kuv tej lug saamfwm ca,
ces kuv yuav rau txim rua puab vim puab tej kev txhum; kuv yuav ua kuas puab raug kev txomnyem vim tej kev txhum kws puab ua.
Txawm le caag los kuv yuav tsi tso txujkev hlub Daviv tseg lossis yuav ncu ntsoov tej lug kws kuv cog tseg rua nwg lawm.
Kuv yuav tsi rhuav tej lug kws kuv cog tseg rua nwg, lossis yuav tsi thim tej lug kws kuv cog tseg rua nwg.
“Kuv tuav kuv lub npe kws dlawbhuv coglug ib zag xwb kaav moog taag ibtxhis; kuv yuav tsi dlaag Daviv ib zag le.
Nwg yuav muaj xeebntxwv tsi tu moog le hab yog tseem muaj lub nub tawm tuaj, kuv yuav tsomkwm nwg lub tebchaws moog le.
Nwg lub tebchaws yuav nyob ruaj khov ib yaam le lub hli, ua tug timkhawv tseeb nyob sau nruab ntug.”
Tabsis koj chim kawg rua tug vaajntxwv kws koj tau xaiv tseg; koj tau tso nwg tseg hab ca nwg nyob qhuav nkuag ca.
Koj rhuav koj tej lug cog tseg rua koj tug tubkhai, hab muab nwg lub mom kub pov rua huv paag aav.
Koj muab nwg lub nroog tej ntsaa yeej rhuav puag taag hab ca tej chaw faajxwm pob puag taag.
Cov tuabneeg kws dlua kev, nyag nwg tej khoom taag; tej tuabneeg zej zog puavleej luag nwg plig.
Koj pub nwg cov yeebncuab tua yeej nwg lawm; koj ua rua nwg cov yeebncuab muaj kev zoo sab.
Koj ua kuas nwg tej cuabyeej ua rog siv tsi tau, hab ca nwg cov yeebncuab kovyeej nwg.
Koj tau tshem nwg tug cwj tawm ntawm nwg moog hab muab nwg lub zwmtxwv tsoo qaug rua huv aav lawm.
Koj txav nwg lub noobnyoog kuas tuab lu, hab tsi pub kuas nwg tau ntsejmuag hlo le.
Tug TSWV, koj txawm yuav nraim peb moog ibtxhis le los? Koj txujkev chim kws kub le suavtawg tseem yuav nyob ntev npaum le caag?
Ncu ntsoov has tas, kuv txujsa tuab lu heev; Ncu ntsoov has tas koj tsim peb lug ua tuabneeg xwb!
Leejtwg txhaj yuav nyob ibtxhis tsi txawj tuag? Yuav ua le caag tuabneeg txhaj le tsiv dlim lub qhov ntxaa?
Tug TSWV, koj txujkev hlub thaus u dlua qhov twg lawm? Tej lug kws koj cog tseg rua Daviv nyob qhov twg lawm?
Thov koj ncu ntsoov kuv kws yog koj tug tubkhai kws raug luas thuam heev, kuv tiv tsi taug cov tuabneeg sab phem tej lug tsawm foom le lawm.
Tug TSWV, koj cov yeebncuab tau txobthuam tug vaajntxwv kws koj xaiv! Nwg moog txug qhov twg los luas pheej thuam nwg.
Thov qhuas tug TSWV moog ibtxhis le! Amees! Amees!
Tug TSWV, koj yeej ibtxwm yog peb lub chaw nyob.
Thaus koj tsi tau tsim lub nplajteb hab tej toj roob hauv peg, koj yeej muaj nyob lug lawm, hab koj yeej yog Vaajtswv moog ibtxhis le.
Koj kuas tuabneeg rov moog ua aav, koj muab tuabneeg hloov moog ua aav dlua.
Koj saib ib txheeb xyoo tsuas ntev le ib nub xwb; ib txheeb xyoo tsuas zoo ib yaam le naag mo kws lawm lossis zoo ib yaam le ib txoog teev thaus tsaus ntuj.
Koj kuav hlo peb moog ib yaam le nthwv dlej kuav; peb ua neej nyob tub tsi ntev npaum le zaaj npau suav. Peb zoo ib yaam le tej nroj tsuag kws nthaw kaug thaus sawv ntxuv,
nwg luj hlub hab tawg paaj, thaus yaav tsaus ntuj ca le ntsws hab qhuav lawm.
Koj txujkev chim ua rua peb raug puamtsuaj taag; koj txujkev npautawg ua rua peb ntshai kawg le.
Koj muab peb tej kev txhum tso rua ntawm koj xubndlag, txawm yog tej kev txhum kws peb ua nraim nkoog los koj yeej pum huv tuabsi.
Vim koj txujkev chim txav peb txujsa, peb txhaj ua neej nyob tsi ntev peb lub neej xaus moog ib yaam le lub suab ntxhi kws pluj zuj zug lawm.

Peb tsuas ua neej nyob txug xyaa caum xyoo xwb, tug kws khov kawg tsuas nyob txug yim caum xyoo; txawm yog ua neej nyob ntev los tsuas muaj kev txomnyem hab nyuaj sab xwb, peb ua neej nyob tsi ntev, ces peb txujsa txawm yaaj ntxhis lawm.
Puas muaj leejtwg paub txug koj txujkev chim? Puas muaj leejtwg paub has tas thaus koj npautawg tuabneeg yuav ntshai npaum twg?
Thov koj qha kuas peb paub has tas, peb txujsa tuab lu kawg le, peb txhaj yuav xeev lug ua tuabneeg ntse.
Koj tseem yuav chim ntev le caag ntxiv hab? Tug TSWV, thov koj hlub koj cov tubkhai hab!
Thov kuas peb naj taagkig tau txais koj txujkev hlub kws tsi paub kawg kuas puv npo peb lub sab, peb txhaj muaj lub sab xyivfaab hab hu nkauj taag peb simneej.
Thov koj pub kuas peb muaj kev zoo sab ntau npaum le tej kev nyuaj sab kws koj tso lug raug peb ntau xyoo lawm.
Thov pub peb cov kws yog koj tubkhai pum koj tej num tseemceeb; hab thov ca peb cov xeebntxwv pum koj tug tshwjchim kws ci ntsaa ab.
Tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv, thov koj foom koob moov rua peb; thov paab kuas txhua yaam num kws peb ua ntawd tav hab vaammeej!
Tug kws moog cawm sav rua ntawm tug TSWV, hab tug kws nyob huv tug kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus txujkev tiv thaiv,
mas tug ntawd txhaj has tau rua tug TSWV has tas, “Koj yog tug tiv thaiv hab tsomkwm kuv. Koj yog kuv tug Vaajtswv; kuv ca sab ntsoov rua koj.”
Nwg yuav tsi pub koj maag luas lub vuj hlua, hab nwg yuav paab koj dlim ntawm tej kaab mob kev tuag.
Nwg yuav nthuav hlo nwg ob phob tis lug roog koj; nwg yuav tsomkwm koj, koj yuav nyob tso sab plhuav, nwg txujkev ncaaj nceeg yuav tsomkwm hab tiv thaiv koj.
Mo ntuj los koj yuav tsi ntshai kev puamtsuaj lossis tsi ntshai tej xub neevnti kws luas tua nthawv nthaav thaus nruab nub,
lossis tej kaab mob kws lug raug suavdlawg thaus mo ntuj, lossis tej kev puamtsuaj kws tuaj raug suavdlawg thaus nruab nub.
Txawm yog muaj ib txheeb leej tuag nyob ntawm koj ib saab, hab muaj ib vaam leej tuag puagncig koj los yuav tsi muaj xwm dlaabtsi raug koj le.
Koj yuav tsaa qhovmuag saib hab pum luas rau txim rua cov tuabneeg sab phem.
Koj muab tug TSWV ua tug tiv thaiv koj, tug kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus yog tug tsomkwm koj,
txhaj yuav tsi muaj kev puamtsuaj lug raug koj, hab kev nruj kev tsiv yuav tsi lug ze koj vaaj koj tsev.
Vaajtswv yuav khaiv nwg cov timtswv ceebtsheej lug tsomkwm koj, puab yuav tiv thaiv koj txhua qhov kws koj moog.
Puab ob txhais teg yuav fwj koj, tsi pub koj ob txhais kutaw raug pobzeb le.
Koj yuav tsuj pis ntag tsuv ntxhuav hab naab, txawm yog tej tsuv ntxhuav kws nyaum hab tej naab kws muaj taug los koj yuav muab tsuj nthi rua huv koj qaab xibtaws.
Vaajtswv has tas, “Kuv yuav cawm cov tuabneeg kws hlub kuv hab yuav tiv thaiv cov tuabneeg kws leeg kuv ua puab tug TSWV.
Thaus puab thov txug kuv, kuv yuav teb puab; thaus puab raug kev nyuaj sab, kuv yuav nrug puab nyob; kuv yuav cawm puab kuas dlim hab pub puab tau ntsejmuag.
Kuv yuav pub puab muaj sa ntev ua neej nyob hab kuv yuav cawm kuas puab dlim.”
Tug TSWV, kuv ua koj tsaug hab hu nkauj qhuas koj kws yog Vaajtswv tug muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus,
Naj taagkig qha koj txujkev hlub kws tsi paub kawg, hab naj mo qha koj txujkev ncaaj nceeg,
nrug tej suab nkauj nogncaas hab tej suab raaj kws zoo heev.
Tug TSWV, koj tej num kws tseemceeb ua rua kuv zoo sab heev; kuv hu nkauj zoo sab rua txhua yaam kws koj tau ua lug lawm.
Tug TSWV, koj tej num tseemceeb kawg le! Koj txujkev xaav tub kawg nkaus!
Qhov nuav ua rua tug tuabneeg ruag paub tsi txug; tug tuabneeg ruag tsi totaub tej ntawd le.
Cov tuabneeg sab phem yuav luj hlub ib yaam le tej nroj tsuag, hab cov tuabneeg txhum yuav vaammeej, tabsis puab yuav raug kev puamtsuaj taag,
rua qhov koj yog tug TSWV kws muaj fwjchim nyob moog ibtxhis.
Peb paub has tas koj cov yeebncuab yuav tuag taag, hab cov tuabneeg sab phem yuav swb.
Koj pub rua kuv muaj zug ib yaam le tug nyuj qus; koj foom koob moov rua kuv muaj kev zoo sab.
Kuv pum has tas kuv cov yeebncuab swb taag lawm, hab nov cov tuabneeg sab phem quaj ntshu nrooj.
Cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg yuav luj hlub ib yaam le tej ntsuag txoob; hab puab yuav hlub zoo ib yaam le tej ntoo cab peg Lenpanoos.
Puab zoo ib yaam le cov ntoo kws cog huv tug TSWV lub tsev kws tawg paaj ntsaa ab nyob huv peb tug Vaajtswv lub Tuamtsev,
txawm yog cov ntoo tub laug lawm los tseem ntsuab, txi taug txiv hab khov heev.
Qhov nuav qha has tas tug TSWV yeej ncaaj nceeg, tug kws tsomkwm kuv, nwg yeej tsi muaj ib qho txhum le.
Tug TSWV yog Vaajntxwv. Nwg tug tshwjchim ci ntsaa ab hab nwg tug zug luj zug nchaav ua nwg tsoog tsho naav lub nplajteb yeej muaj chaw nyob ruaj nreeg tsi txawj txaav le.
Tug TSWV, koj lub zwmtxwv yeej nyob khov kho thaus chivkeeb lug lawm hab koj yeej nyob ibtxhab ibtxhis thaus u lug lawm.
Tug TSWV, tej havtxwv kws tub heev ua suab nrov nroo ntwg; tej suab ntawd nrov tseeg nkawg tuaj.
Tug TSWV yog tug kws muaj fwjchim luj kaav sau ntuj ceebtsheej, nwg muaj fwjchim luj tshaaj tej suab havtxwv nrov hab muaj fwjchim luj dlua tej nthwv dlej havtxwv kws ndlaas nphau nphwv.
Tug TSWV, koj txuj kevcai muaj nyob moog tsi paub pluj, hab koj lub Tuamtsev kws dlawbhuv yuav nyob moog ibtxhis.
Tug TSWV, koj yog Vaajtswv tug kws rau txim; thov qha koj txujkev chim rua suavdlawg pum!
Koj yog tug txav txim rua tuabneeg nplajteb; thov koj sawv hab ua pauj kuas txaus nkaus rua cov tuabneeg khaavtheeb.
Tug TSWV, cov tuabneeg sab phem yuav zoo sab ntev le caag? Tseem tshuav ntev le caag hab?
Puab yuav has lug phem khaavtheeb ntsuav hab khaav tej kev phem kws puab ua moog ntev le caag?
Tug TSWV, puab caij tsuj koj tsaav tuabneeg hab puab tsimtxom cov tuabneeg kws yog koj tug.
Puab tua cov puj ntsuag hab cov mivnyuas ntsuag, hab puab tua lwm tsaav tuabneeg kws lug nyob huv peb lub tebchaws.
Puab has tas, “Tug TSWV yeej tsi pum peb le; cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv tsi paub hlo le.”
Kuv tsaav tuabneeg, ua caag mej yuav ruag ua luaj le? Cov tuabneeg ruag, thaus twg mej maam le ntse?
Vaajtswv yog tug kws tsim peb muaj qhovntsej, nwg tseem tsi nov hab los? Vaajtswv yog tug tsim peb muaj qhovmuag, nwg tseem tsi pum hab los?
Vaajtswv qhuab ntuag txhua tsaav tuabneeg, nwg tseem tsi tau rau txim rua puab  hab los? Nwg yog xwbfwb rua txhua tug, nwg tseem tsi muaj kev txawj ntse le los?
Tug TSWV paub tej kws tuabneeg xaav huv sab; nwg paub has tas tej kws tuabneeg xaav tsi muaj qaabhau dlaabtsi.
Tug TSWV, tug tuabneeg kws koj qha hab koj muab koj txuj kevcai cob rua, mas muaj kev kaaj sab lug!
Koj pub tug ntawd tau su nub kws muaj kev ntxhuv sab moog txug nub kws luas khawb tau qhov cuab tug tuabneeg sab phem tsaiv.
Tug TSWV yuav tsi tso nwg tsaav tuabneeg tseg; nwg yuav tsi ncaim nwg cov tuabneeg hlo le.
Yuav rov muaj kev ua ncaaj nyob huv tej tsev tu plaub, ces cov tuabneeg ncaaj yuav ua ncaaj nceeg moog le.
Leejtwg yuav sawv kuv cev moog tawmtsaam cov tuabneeg sab phem? Leejtwg yuav tuaj kuv tog tawmtsaam cov tuabneeg ua phem ua qas?
Yog tug TSWV tsi cawm kuv, kuv yuav ca le moog rua huv tubtuag teb.
Kuv has tas “Kuv qaug lawm lauj”; tabsis tug TSWV, koj txujkev hlub kws tsi paub kawg paab kuv sawv rov lug.
Thaus kuv ntxhuv sab hab ywjfaab ywjfwj, koj nplig kuv lub sab kuas kuv rov muaj kev zoo sab.
Vaajtswv, koj yeej tsi koom sab nrug tug txav txim tsi ncaaj kws nwg txav txim tsi lawv le txuj cai,
nwg tuavhuv ua tsi ncaaj rua cov tuabneeg zoo hab txav txim tuag rua tug tuabneeg tsi muaj txim.
Tabsis tug TSWV tiv thaiv kuv; kuv tug Vaajtswv tsomkwm kuv.
Nwg yuav rau txim rua puab, vim tej kev phem kws puab ua hab ua kuas puab puamtsuaj vim puab tej kev txhum; tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv yuav ua kuas puab puamtsuaj.
Ca le nrug peb qhuas tug TSWV! Peb ca le hu nkauj zoo sab qhuas Vaajtswv tug kws tsomkwm peb!
Peb ca le lug cuag nwg, ua nwg tsaug hab hu nkauj zoo sab qhuas nwg.
Rua qhov tug TSWV yog Vaajtswv tug kws muaj fwjchim luj, nwg yog tug Vaajntxwv kws muaj fwjchim luj tshaaj lwm tug vaajtswv.
Nwg kaav taagnrho lub qaab ntuj nuav, txij ndlua huv tej qhov tsua kws t ub tub moog txug sau tej hauv roob sab.
Nwg kaav taagnrho tej havtxwv kws nwg tsim; hab kaav thooj aav kws nwg txhais teg puab.
Ca le lug hab peb khoov ntshis pehawm nwg; peb ca le txhus caug ntawm tug TSWV lub xubndlag, nwg yog tug tsim peb!
Nwg yog peb tug Vaajtswv; peb yog cov tuabneeg kws nwg tsomkwm, peb yog paab yaaj kws nwg pub zaub rua noj. Nub nua ca le noog tej lug kws nwg has:
“Mej tsi xob ua tuabneeg tawv ncauj le mej cov yawmkoob ua thaus nyob nraag taj suabpuam Melinpas hab Maxas.
Thaus nyob nraag puab sim kuv sab, puab pum txhua yaam kws kuv ua paab puab lawm los puab tseem sim kuv sab le ntawd.
Plaub caug xyoo ntawd kuv dlhuav cov tuabneeg nuav kawg le, kuv has tas ‘Ua caag puab yuav tsi muab sab npuab kuv hlo le; puab tsi kaam noog kuv tej lug qhuab qha.’
Chim kuv sab, kuv txhaj has lug txav npluav rua puab has tas, ‘Mej yuav tsi tau moog nyob huv lub tebchaws kws kuv muab rua mej.’ ”
Ca le hu ib zaaj nkauj tshab qhuas tug TSWV! Tuabneeg thoob nplajteb ca le hu nkauj qhuas tug TSWV!
Ca le hu nkauj qhuas tug TSWV hab ua nwg tsaug! Naj nub pav nwg txujkev cawm dlim rua suavdlawg noog.
Ca le pav nwg lub koob lub npe kws nrov nchaa moo lug rua txhua lub tebchaws, pav nwg tej num tseemceeb rua txhua tsaav tuabneeg tau nov; qha nwg teg num kws luj kawg nkaus rua txhua tsaav tuabneeg.
Tug TSWV yog tug kws muaj fwjchim luj, tsimnyog suavdlawg qhuas nwg kawg le; suavdlawg yuavtsum fwm nwg heev dlua fwm tej vaajtswv huv tuabsi.
Lwm tsaav tuabneeg tej vaajtswv tsuas yog mlom xwb. tabsis tug TSWV yog tug tsim lub ntuj.
Nwg lub koob meej hab tug tshwjchim ci ntsaa ab nyob puagncig nwg; nwg lub fwjchim hab kev zoo nkauj nyob puagncig nwg lub Tuamtsev.
Tuabneeg thoob nplajteb, ca le qhuas tug TSWV; ca le qhuas nwg tug tshwjchim hab nwg tug zug.
Ca le qhuas tug TSWV lub npe kws muaj koob muaj meej; ca le nqaa khoom tuaj fij rua huv nwg lub Tuamtsev.
Suavdlawg yuavtsum tu lub sab kuas dlawbhuv moog pehawm tug TSWV; tuabneeg nplajteb, ca le tshee quas nyo ntawm nwg xubndlag!
Ca le has rua txhua lub tebchaws has tas, “Tug TSWV yog Vaajntxwv! Lub nplajteb yeej nyob ruaj nreeg tsi txaav chaw le; nwg yuav txav txim ncaaj nceeg rua txhua tsaav tuabneeg.”
Lub nplajteb hab lub ntuj ca le zoo sab hlo! Havtxwv hab txhua yaam tsaj kws nyob huv havtxwv ca le qw ntshu nrooj;
tej laj teb hab tej qoobloo kws nyob huv tej teb ca le zoo sab; tej ntoo huv haav zoov yuav qw zoo sab
thaus kws tug TSWV lug kaav lub nplajteb nuav. Nwg txujkev ncaaj nceeg hab dlawbhuv yuav kaav tuabneeg nplajteb.
Tug TSWV yog vaajntxwv! Lub nplajteb ca le zoo sab! Tej koog povtxwv huv havtxwv, mej ca le zoo sab!
Muaj fuab tsaus nti nyob puasncig nwg; nwg kaav tuabneeg nplajteb ntawm kev ncaaj nceeg hab dlawbhuv.
Muaj nplaim tawg ua nwg ntej hab kub nwg cov yeebncuab kws nyob puagncig nwg.
Nwg ua kuas tsaglig xub ci pum kev thoob nplajteb; lub nplajteb pum hab ntshai tshee nyo.
Tej hauv roob yaaj le cab ntaab taabmeeg tug TSWV, taabmeeg tug TSWV kws kaav taagnrho lub nplajteb.
Lub ntuj pav nwg txujkev ncaaj nceeg, hab txhua tsaav tuabneeg pum nwg tug tshwjchim kws ci ntsaa ab.
Txhua tug kws pe tej mlom yuav poob ntsejmuag; taagnrho tej vaajtswv yuav txhus caug  pehawm tug TSWV.
Tug TSWV, vim koj txujkev txav txim, cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv Xi-oos muaj kev zoo sab heev, hab tej nroog huv tebchaws Yudas los zoo sab kawg le.
Tug TSWV kws muaj Fwjchim Luj luj kawg nkaus, koj yog tug kws kaav taagnrho lub nplajteb nuav; koj yog tug kws muaj fwjchim luj dlua tej vaajtswv huv tuabsi.
Tug TSWV hlub cov tuabneeg kws ntxub tej kev phem kev qas; nwg tsomkwm nwg tsaav tuabneeg txujsa; nwg tso puab dlim ntawm cov tuabneeg sab phem txhais teg.
Qhov kaaj ci rua cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg, hab ua rua cov tuabneeg zoo muaj kev zoo sab kawg.
Mej cov kws yog tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg ca le zoo sab, vim txhua yaam kws tug TSWV ua taag lug lawm! Ncu ntsoov txhua yaam kws tug Vaajtswv dlawbhuv ua taag lug lawm, hab ua nwg tsaug.
Ca le hu ib zaaj nkauj tshab qhuas tug TSWV; nwg tau ua tej txujci kws tseemceeb heev! Nwg kovyeej lug ntawm nwg lub fwjchim hab nwg tug zug.
Tug TSWV qha nwg txujkev muaj yeej; nwg qha nwg lub fwjchim rua txhua tsaav tuabneeg paub.

Nwg ua lawv le tej lug kws nwg cog tseg rua tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees, nwg ua sab dlawb sab zoo hab hlub puab moog ibtxhis. Txhua tsaav tuabneeg kws nyob txhua qhov puavleej pum peb tug Vaajtswv txujkev muaj yeej.
Tuabneeg nplajteb ca le hu nkauj zoo sab qhuas tug TSWV; ca le hu nkauj qhuas nwg hab zoo sab ua nwg tsaug!
Ca le hu nkauj qhuas tug TSWV! Ca le ntaus nkauj nogncaas!
Ca le tshuab raaj tshuab xyu! hab qw zoo sab qhuas tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajntxwv.
Dlej havtxwv hab txhua yaam kws nyob huv havtxwv ca le qw ntshu nrooj; lub nplajteb hab txhua yaam kws nyob huv lub nplajteb ca le hu nkauj!
Tej dlej, mej ca le npuaj teg; tej hauv roob, mej ca le hu nkauj zoo sab ua ke ntawm tug TSWV lub xubndlag,
rua qhov nwg lug kaav lub nplajteb nuav lawm, nwg txujkev ncaaj nceeg hab dlawbhuv yuav kaav tuabneeg nplajteb.
Tug TSWV yog Vaajntxwv, hab tej tuabneeg ntshai nwg tshee nyo. Nwg nyob sau nwg lub zwmtxwv ntawm ob tug qhelunpees, hab lub nplajteb ua zug koog.
Tug TSWV yog tug muaj fwjchim luj nyob huv Xi-oos; nwg yog tug kws kaav txhua lub tebchaws huv tuabsi.
Txhua tug yuav qhuas nwg lub npe hab lub koob meej kws nrov nchaa moo lug. Nwg tuab leeg yog tug Dlawbhuv!
Vaajntxwv tug kws muaj fwjchim luj, nyam txujkev ncaaj nceeg, koj muab txujkev ncaaj nceeg rua cov Yixalayees; koj coj txujkev ncaaj nceeg hab kev dlawbhuv lug.
Ca le qhuas tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv; ca le pehawm nwg ntawm nwg lub zwmtxwv! Nwg tuab leeg yog tug Dlawbhuv!
Mauxes hab Aloos yog nwg ob tug povthawj, hab Xamuyees tuab leeg yog tug kws thov tug TSWV; puab hu tug TSWV hab nwg teb puab tej lug thov.
Tug TSWV has lug huv tauv fuab tuaj rua puab; puab fwm tej kevcai hab tej lug saamfwm kws nwg muab cob rua puab lawm.

Tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv, koj teb koj tsaav tuabneeg tej lug thov; txawm yog koj tau rau txim rua puab, vim puab tej kev txhum los koj qha rua puab has tas, koj yog tug Vaajtswv kws zaam txim.
Ca le qhuas tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv; hab pehawm nwg ntawm nwg lub roob dlawbhuv! Vim tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv, nwg yog tug Dlawbhuv.
Tuabneeg thoob plawg nplajteb ca le hu nkauj qhuas tug TSWV!
Ca le zoo sab hab pehawm tug TSWV; ca le txaav lug nyob ntawm nwg lub xubndlag hab hu nkauj zoo sab!
Ca le leeg has tas tug TSWV yog Vaajtswv. Nwg tsim peb hab peb yog nwg tug; peb yog nwg tsaav tuabneeg hab peb yog nwg paab yaaj.
Ca le moog huv nwg lub Tuamtsev hab ua nwg tsaug; ca le moog rua huv tej chaav tsev hab qhuas nwg. Ca le ua nwg tsaug hab qhuas nwg lub npe.
Tug TSWV yog tug kws zoo kawg nkaus, nwg txujkev hlub nyob moog ibtxhis; hab nwg txujkev ncaaj nceeg nyob moog ibtxhis tsi kawg.
Tug Tswv, kuv hu nkauj qhuas koj, kuv zaaj nkauj yog has txug qhov kws koj ua sab dlawb sab zoo hab ncaaj nceeg.
Kuv yuav xyum ua lub neej kuas tsi muaj leejtwg thuam tau le. Thaus twg koj maam lug cuag kuv? Kuv yuav ua lub neej dlawbhuv nyob huv kuv lub tsev
hab kuv yuav tsi quavntsej tej kev phem kev qas le. Kuv ntxub tej kws cov tuabneeg tsiv tawm ntawm Vaajtswv moog lawm ua; kuv yuav tsi raus teg rua tej kev phem kev qas ntawd le.
Kuv yuav tsi ua tuabneeg sab nkhaus hab kuv yuav tsi koom nrug cov tuabneeg sab phem.
Kuv yuav muab cov tuabneeg kws has luas plig ua kuas puamtsuaj; kuv yuav tsi ua sab ntev rua tug tuabneeg khaavtheeb hab muaj plhus hlo le.
Kuv yuav pub cov tuabneeg kws muaj lub sab npuab Vaajtswv nyob huv kuv lub loog. Kuv yuav ca cov tuabneeg kws muaj lub sab ncaaj ua kuv teg num.
Yuav tsi muaj tuabneeg dlaag nyob huv kuv lub loog; yuav tsi muaj cov tuabneeg ntsejmuag ncaaj sab nkhaus nyob taabmeeg kuv.
Kuv yuav rhuav cov tuabneeg sab phem kws nyob huv peb lub tebchaws ib nub dlhau ib nub kuas pluj taag; kuv yuav muab cov tuabneeg limham ntab tawm huv tug TSWV lub nroog moog.
Tug TSWV, thov koj noog kuv tej lug thov, hab noog kuv lub suab kws thov koj paab!
Thaus kuv raug kev txomnyem, thov koj tsi xob tsiv nraim kuv! Thov koj tig ntsej noog kuv tej lug hab teb kuv thaus kuv thov koj!
Kuv txujsa taabtom yuav pluj moog ib yaam le cov paa nchu; hab kuv lub cev taabtom kub cuag suavtawg hlawv.
Kuv raug luas tsuj qaug ib yaam le tej nroj qhuav; kuv txhaj tsi qaab lus noj kuv cov mov lawm.
Kuv ntsaaj quas lawg; kuv lub cev tshuav tawv qhwv pobtxhaa lawm xwb.
Kuv zoo le tug noog kws nyob tom taj suabpuam, zoo ib yaam le tug plaas kws nyob huv lub zog kws dlo quas cuas.
Kuv pw tsi tsaug zug le; kuv zoo ib yaam le tug noog kws nyob khua sab khuav sau ruv tsev.
Kuv tej yeebncuab tuaj txobthuam kuv taag nub; cov tuabneeg kws tuam mom kuv siv kuv lub npe foom tsi zoo.
Vim koj chim hab npautawg, kuv txhaj noj tshauv ib yaam le noj mov, hab haus dlej los haus tau kuv cov kua muag. Koj muab kuv nqaa hab laim povtseg.
Kuv txujsa zoo ib yaam le tug dluab ntxoov ntxoo thaus yuav tsaus ntuj; kuv zoo ib yaam le tej nroj kws qhuav lawm.
Tabsis tug TSWV, koj nyob sau koj lub zwmtxwv moog ibtxhis; Txhua tam tuabneeg yuav ncu ntsoov koj.
Koj yuav sawv tseeg lug hlub Xi-oos; rua qhov tub txug lub sijhawm kws taabncuab Xi-oos lawm; lub sijhawm kws teem ca lug txug lawm lauj!
Koj cov tubkhai nyam Xi-oos kawg le, txawm yog Xi-oos raug rhuav puamtsuaj ua tej pawg pobzeb lawm los puab tseem tshua nwg kawg le.
Txhua tsaav tuabneeg yuav ntshai tug TSWV; txhua tug vaajntxwv kws nyob huv nplajteb nuav yuav ntshai nwg lub fwjchim.
Thaus tug TSWV rov txhim khu lub nroog Xi-oos dlua tshab, nwg lub fwjchim yuav tshwm lug rua suavdlawg pum.
Nwg yuav noog nwg tsaav tuabneeg kws tsi muaj leejtwg mob sab rua tej lug thov.
Ca le muab tej kws tug TSWV tau ua taag lug lawm sau ca rua tej xeebntxwv yaav tom ntej tau nyeem, kuas cov tuabneeg kws tseem yuav yug lug txhaj tau qhuas Vaajtswv.
Tug TSWV saib sau nwg lub chaw dlawbhuv sau ntuj tuaj, nwg nyob sau ntuj saib tuaj rua huv nplajteb.
Nwg nov cov tuabneeg kws raug txim tej suab quaj, hab nwg tso cov tuabneeg kws raug luas rau txim kuas dlim kev tuag.
Hab tuabneeg yuav pav nwg lub npe huv Xi-oos, hab tuabneeg yuav qhuas nwg nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees
rua thaus kws ntau tsaav tuabneeg hab ntau lub tebchaws tuaj sis sau ua ke pehawm tug TSWV.
Tug TSWV txu kuv tug zug rua thaus kuv tseem hluas; nwg txav kuv txujsa kuas kuv ua neej nyob tsi ntev.
Vaajtswv, thov koj tsi xob coj kuv moog thaus kuv tseem yog ib nraab neej. Tug TSWV, koj yog tug nyob moog ibtxhis;
Thaus chivkeeb koj txhais teg tsim lub nplajteb hab tsim lub ntuj.

Tej ntawd yuav pluj moog taag, tabsis koj yuav nyob moog ibtxhis; tej ntawd yuav txawj qub hab ndluag ib yaam le tej tsoog tsho. Koj yuav muab tej ntawd hloov ib yaam le luas hloov rig tsho, ces tej ntawd yuav pluj moog.
Tabsis koj zoo le qub hab koj yuav nyob moog ibtxhis tsi txawj kawg le.
Peb tej tubki yuav nyob kaaj sab lug, vim koj yog tug tiv thaiv, mas puab cov xeebntxwv yuav nyob tso sab plhuav.
Kuv lub sab, ca le qhuas tug TSWV! Taagnrho kuv lub cev ca le qhuas nwg lub npe kws dlawbhuv!
Kuv lub sab, ca le qhuas tug TSWV, hab ncu ntsoov nwg txaj ntsig.
Nwg zaam kuv tej kev txhum huv tuabsi, hab khu kuv tej mob zoo hlo.
Nwg paab kuv dlim kev pluj kev tuag nwg hlub kuv hab taabncuab kuv, nwg foom koob moov rua kuv.
Nwg pub txhua yaam zoo rua kuv lub neej,  yog le ntawd kuv txhaj tseem hluas hab muaj zug khov kho ib yaam le tug dlaav.
Tug TSWV paab cov kws raug luas tsimtxom hab nwg tuaj puab tog paab kuas puab yeej.
Tug TSWV qha nwg teg num rua Mauxes hab pub rua cov Yixalayees pum nwg tej txujci kws tseemceeb.
Tug TSWV yog tug muaj sab dlawb sab zoo hab muaj kev hlub, nwg tsi chim sai hab nwg hlub moog ibtxhis.
Nwg tsi tshev hab nwg tsi chim moog ibtxhis.
Nwg tsi rau txim rua peb lawv le tej kev txhum kws tsimnyog peb raug lossis tsi ua pauj peb lub txim hab tej kev txhum kws peb ua.
Lub ntuj nyob sab dlhau lub nplajteb npaum le caag, tug TSWV hlub cov kws fwm nwg heev npaum le ntawd.
Nubtuaj dleb nubpoob npaum le caag, tug TSWV muab peb tej kev txhum moog povtseg dleb npaum le ntawd.
Leej txiv hlub nwg cov mivnyuas npaum le caag, tug TSWV hlub cov kws fwm nwg npaum le ntawd.
Tug TSWV paub has tas, nwg muab dlaabtsi lug tsim peb; nwg ncu ntsoov has tas, peb yog moov aav xwb.
Peb txujsa zoo ib yaam le tej nroj tsuag; peb luj hlub mog nyoos ib yaam le lub paaj nroj;
thaus cua ntsawj lub paaj ntawd txawm zeeg lawm, hab tsi muaj leejtwg rov pum lub paaj ntawd dlua.
Tabsis tug TSWV hlub cov tuabneeg kws fwm nwg moog ibtxhis, hab nwg muaj sab dlawb sab zoo rua txhua tam tuabneeg.
Yog pub rua cov tuabneeg kws coj lawv le nwg tej lug cog tseg; hab noog nwg tej lug qhuab qha kawg sab kawg ntsws.
Tug TSWV muab nwg lub zwmtxwv txawb rua sau ntuj; nwg yog tug kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam huv tuabsi.
Cov timtswv ceebtsheej kws muaj zug hab muaj fwjchim ua lawv le tug TSWV tej lug qhuab qha, hab noog tej lug kws nwg has, mej ca le qhuas tug TSWV!
Txhua yaam kws muaj fwjchim nyob sau qaum ntuj, mej yog tug TSWV cov tubkhai kws ua lawv le nwg sab nyam, ca le qhuas tug TSWV!
Txhua yaam kws tug TSWV tsim lug nyob txhua qhov kws tug TSWV kaav, ca le qhuas tug TSWV. Kuv lub sab ca le qhuas tug TSWV!
Kuv lub sab ca le qhuas tug TSWV! Tug TSWV kws yog kuv tug Vaajtswv, koj yog tug muaj fwjchim luj! Koj lub koob meej hab tug tshwjchim ci ntsaa ab puagncig koj;
koj muab qhov kaaj qhwv koj. Koj muab lub ntuj nthuav ib yaam le nthuav lub tsevntaub,
koj tsim koj lub tsev rua sau cov nplaim dlej kws nyob sau qaum ntuj. Koj siv cov fuab ua koj lub tsheb hab koj caij sau tej cua.
Koj siv tej cua ua koj cov tub xaa xuv hab tej tsaglig xub kws cig lab vog ua koj cov tubkhai.
Koj muab lub nplajteb txawb khov rua ntawm tej ncej kws txheem, lub nplajteb yuav nyob qhov ntawd tsi txaav chaw le.
Koj kuas dlej havtxwv laum nkaus lub nplajteb; ib yaam le tej tsoog tsho qhwv nkaus tuabneeg lub cev, hab dlej nyaab puv nkaus sau tej hauv roob.
Thaus koj nthe nqho, dlej txawm ndlwg; thaus dlej nov koj lub suab has, dlej ca le ndlwg laub lug lawm.
Tej dlej ntawd ndlwg sau tej roob hab huv tej haav txhua nrho lug rua ntawm qhov chaw kws koj tsim ca rua tej dlej ntawd.
Koj kem nrim tseg kuas dlej tsi muaj peevxwm ndlwg dlhau tug nrim ntawd, kuas tej dlej ntawd txhaj tsi ndlwg lug nyaab lub nplajteb nuav dlua.
Koj tsim tej dlej cag ndlwg lawv tej kwj haa hab tej dlej kws ndlwg lawv tej kwj dleg.
Tej dlej ntawd txhawv lug rua tej tsaj qus haus; hab tej neeg luav qus haus thaus tshaib nqhes.
Tej naag noog lug ua zeg rua sau tej ntoo kws nyob ze rua ntawm ntug dlej hab quaj seev yeeg.
Koj tso naag sau ntuj lug ywg tej roob, koj foom koob moov rua txhua qhov thoob plawg lub nplajteb.
Koj tsim kuas muaj tej nroj tsuag hlaav mog nyoos rua tej tsaj txhu noj hab muaj qoobloo rua tuabneeg cog kuas tuabneeg txhaj muaj noj muaj haus,
hab muaj cawv txiv maab lug haus ua rua tuabneeg zoo sab, kuas muaj tej roj txiv ntoo ua rua tuabneeg luag ntxhi hab muaj mov ua rua tuabneeg muaj zug tuaj.
Tej ntoo cab peg Lenpanoos puavleej tau dlej naag txaus, tej ntoo ntawd yeej yog tug TSWV le, nwg yog tug cog ca.
Tej noog lug ua zeg rua sau tej ntoo ntawd hab us dlej lug ua zeg rua ntawm tej ntoo thuv.
Tej sai nyob sau tej roob sab hab tej Ntximtsua nyob huv tej qhov tsua.
Koj tsim muaj lub hli lug quas hli hab quas xyoo; lub nub nwg paub nwg lub caij kws poob qho.
Koj tsim kuas muaj mo ntuj hab thaus tsaus ntuj tej tsaj nruab nraag tawm tuaj nrhav noj.
Tej thaav tsuv ntxhuav nyooj lawg tawm moog nrhav tej tsaj kws Vaajtswv pub rua puab noj.
Thaus nub tawm tuaj tej tsaj ntawd txawm rov moog nkaum rua huv tej qhov kws puab txeev pw;
ces tej tuabneeg maam le tawm moog ua puab tej num, hab ua num tsi su moog txug thaus tsaus ntuj.
Tug TSWV, koj tsim ib puas tsaav yaam! Thaus peb saib tej kws koj tsim ntawd ua rua peb pum has tas koj yog tug muaj tswvyim! Lub nplajteb puv nkaus ib puas tsaav yaam kws koj tsim tseg.
Muaj havtxwv luj hab dlaav heev, muaj tsaj luj hab tsaj miv suav tsi txheeb nyob huv.
Muaj tej nkoj kws tuabneeg tsaav moog lug huv havtxwv, muaj Levi-athas kws yog tug zaaj kws koj tsim tseg nyob ua si khuav huv havtxwv.
Tej zaaj ntawd tog ntsoov koj pub rua puab noj puab haus thaus tshaib nqhes.
Thaus koj pub rua puab noj, puab txhaj tau noj; koj pub rua puab muaj noj muaj haus, puab txhaj tau noj tau haus tsau.
Thaus koj fee plhu tsi quavntsej, puab ntshai kawg le; thaus koj rhu koj txuj paa ntawm puab moog lawm, ces puab txawm tuag hab puab moog ua aav luaj le qub.
Tabsis thaus koj rau sav rau paa rua puab  puab caj sa tuaj, koj pub txujsa tshab rua lub nplajteb.
Thov kuas tug TSWV tug tshwjchim kws ci ntsaa ab nyob moog ibtxhis! Thov kuas tug TSWV tsuas muaj zoo sab rua tej kws nwg tsim lawm!
Tug TSWV tsaa muag saib lub nplajteb lub nplajteb ua zug koog; tug TSWV kov tej hauv roob, tej hauv roob txawm nchu paa auv nab tawm tuaj.
Kuv yuav hu nkauj qhuas tug TSWV taag kuv simneej; kuv yuav hu nkauj ua kuv tug Vaajtswv tsaug moog txug nub kuv tuag.
Thov kuas kuv tej nkauj hum nwg sab, rua qhov nwg yog tug kws ua rua kuv zoo sab luag ntxhi.
Thov kuas cov tuabneeg ua txhum raug puamtsuaj tu noob nrho huv nplajteb nuav moog; thov tsi xob tseg ib tug tuabneeg sab phem nyob hlo le. kuv lub sab, ca le qhuas tug TSWV! Ca le qhuas tug TSWV!
Ca le ua tug TSWV tsaug, ca le pav nwg lub koob lub npe kws zoo kawg nkaus; ca le qha kuas txhua tsaav tuabneeg paub tug TSWV tej num kws nwg tau ua.
Ca le hu nkauj qhuas tug TSWV; ca le qha kuas txhua tug paub tug TSWV tej txujci tseemceeb kws nwg tau ua.
Ca le zoo sab rua qhov peb yog Vaajtswv tug; txhua tug kws pehawm nwg ca le zoo sab.
Ca le moog cuag tug TSWV hab thov nwg paab, hab naj nub pehawm nwg.

Mej cov kws yog Anplahaas kws yog tug TSWV tug tubkhai cov xeebntxwv, mej cov kws yog Yakhauj tug kws tug TSWV xaiv tseg cov xeebntxwv: mej yuavtsum ncu ntsoov tej txujci tseemceeb kws tug TSWV ua hab nwg txujkev txav txim.
Tug TSWV yog peb tug Vaajtswv; nwg yog tug kws txav txim rua tuabneeg nplajteb txhua tug.
Nwg yuav ceev nwg tej lug cog tseg moog ibtxhis, nwg tej lug cog tseg kaav txug ib txheeb tam tuabneeg.
Tug TSWV yuav ceev tej lug kws nwg tau cog tseg rua Anplahaas, hab tej lug kws nwg tau cog tseg rua Ixaj lawm.
Tug TSWV coglug rua Yakhauj tuab zag xwb kaav moog ibtxhis.
Nwg has tas “Kuv yuav muab lub tebchaws Kana-aas rua koj ua koj tug moog le.”
Thaus Vaajtswv tsaav tuabneeg tsi tau fuamvaam coob mas puab tsiv ib qho rua ib qho huv lub tebchaws Kana-aas.
Puab tsiv ib tsaav tuabneeg moog rua ib tsaav tuabneeg, hab puab tsiv ib lub tebchaws moog rua ib lub tebchaws.
Tabsis Vaajtswv tsi pub leejtwg tsimtxom puab le; nwg tsomkwm puab hab txwv tej vaajntxwv has tas:
“Mej tsi xob ua le caag rua kuv cov tubkhai kws kuv xaiv lawm; mej tsi xob kov kuv cov cevlug.”
Tug TSWV rhu puab tej zaub mov lawm, hab tso kev tshaib nqhes rua puab lub tebchaws.
Tabsis nwg tso ib tug txivneej ua puab ntej moog, tug ntawd yog Yauxej tug kws raug muab muag moog ua luas qhev.
Luas muab saw hlau khi nwg ob txhais kutaw, hab muab khawb khawm nwg cejdlaab,
moog txug thaus Yauxej tej lug tshwm muaj tseeb. Tug TSWV tej lug ua timkhawv qha has tas Yauxej yog tug ncaaj.
Ces tug vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Iziv txhaj saamfwm kuas cov numtswv kws saib pejxeem muab Yauxej tso.
Vaajntxwv tsaa Yauxej ua ib tug nom luj hab ua tug tswj thoob plawg lub tebchaws;
Yauxej muaj fwjchim luj tshaaj vaajntxwv tsoom numtswv txhua tug hab muaj fwjchim saamfwm rua vaajntxwv cov tuavxaam txhua tug.
Ces Yakhauj txhaj tsiv moog rua nraag tebchaws Iziv, hab moog nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd lawm.
Tug TSWV pub nwg tsaav tuabneeg muaj tubki fuamvaam coob, hab ua rua puab muaj zug tshaaj puab cov yeebncuab.
Nwg ua kuas cov tuabneeg Iziv ntxub nwg tsaav tuabneeg, hab dlaag ntxag nwg cov tubkhai.
Ces nwg khaiv Mauxes kws yog nwg tug tubkhai, hab Aloos tug kws nwg xaiv tseg lawm moog.
Mauxes hab Aloos tau ua Vaajtswv teg num luj hab ua tej txujci tseemceeb huv tebchaws Iziv.
Vaajtswv tso kev tsaus ntuj lug rua huv tebchaws Iziv, tabsis cov tuabneeg Iziv tsi noog nwg tej lug saamfwm.
Tug Tswv muab puab tej dlej hloov ua ntshaav hab ua rua puab tej ntseg tuag taag huv tuabsi.
Muaj qaav lug puv nkaus huv puab lub tebchaws; hab lug puv nkaus rua huv vaajntxwv lub loog.
Vaajtswv has, ces txawm muaj yoov qab hab yoov nyuj yaa lug puv nkaus huv lub tebchaws.
Vaajtswv tso lawg lug hloov naag hab tsaglig xub cig lab vog lug rua huv puab lub tebchaws.
Vaajtswv ua rua puab tej txiv maab, txiv ncuav pas hab tej ntoo luv tuag taag.
Vaajtswv has, ces txawm muaj kooj yaa lug, muaj ntau vaam tug kooj suav tsi txheeb le;
Cov kooj ntawd noj tej ntoo hab tej qoobloo thoob plawg lub tebchaws taag dlu lug.
Vaajtswv tua cov tuabneeg Iziv txhua yim tug tub hlub tuag taag.
Ces tug TSWV txhaj coj cov Yixalayees tsiv tawm; puab coj nyaj coj kub ntau heev nrug puab moog, puab txhua tug puavleej noj qaab nyob zoo hab muaj zug quas npho.
Cov Iziv ntshai cov Yixalayees kawg le hab zoo sab kws cov Yixalayees tsiv moog lawm.
Vaajtswv ua ib tauv fuab lug roog nwg tsaav tuabneeg, hab ua tug nplaim tawg rua puab pum kev mo ntuj.
Puab  thov hab nwg tso noog ncuab lug; nwg tso manas sau ntuj lug rua puab noj nplua mag.
Nwg rua pobzeb ces dlej txawm txhawv tawm lug, hab ndlwg moog rua huv taj suabpuam cuag le ib tug dlej.
Nwg ncu ntsoov nwg tej lug tseemceeb kws nwg tau cog tseg rua nwg tug tubkhai Anplahaas lawm.
Yog le ntawd, nwg txhaj coj tsaav tuabneeg kws nwg xaiv tseg tawm moog, ces puab hu nkauj zoo sab kawg le.
Nwg muab lwm tsaav tuabneeg tej tebchaws lug ua nwg tsaav tuabneeg tug, hab ca nwg tsaav tuabneeg tau kaav luas tej tebchaws.
Yog le ntawd nwg tsaav tuabneeg txhaj le ceev nwg tej kevcai hab ua lawv le nwg tej lug saamfwm. Ca le qhuas tug TSWV!
Ca le qhuas tug TSWV! Ca le ua tug TSWV tsaug, rua qhov nwg muaj sab dlawb sab zoo; nwg txujkev hlub nyob moog ibtxhis.
Leejtwg txhaj muaj cuabkaav pav tau tej txujci tseemceeb kws tug TSWV tau ua? Leejtwg txhaj txawj qhuas nwg taag sab nrho?
Cov tuabneeg kws naj nub ua ncaaj lawv le tug TSWV tej lug saamfwm, mas puab yog cov kws muaj kev zoo sab kawg le.
Tug TSWV, thaus koj paab koj tsaav tuabneeg thov koj ncu ntsoov kuv; thaus koj cawm puab thov xaam txug kuv hab.
Thov kuas kuv pum koj tsaav tuabneeg vaammeej, hab tau koom koj tsaav tuabneeg ua neej nyob kaaj sab lug; kuas kuv txhaj tau nrug koj tsaav tuabneeg tau koob meej.
Peb tau ua txhum ib yaam le peb cov yawmkoob; peb tau ua kev txhum hab ua phem ua qas lawm.

Thaus tseem nyob nraag tebchaws Iziv, peb cov yawmkoob tsi totaub Vaajtswv tej txujci kws tseemceeb le; puab tsi ncu qaab has tas nwg tau qha nwg txujkev hlub rua puab hab thaus nyob ntawm Havtxwv Lab, puab tau ntxeev sab rua tug kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus.
Txawm le ntawd los nwg tseem cawm puab lawv le nwg tau coglug tseg, yog nwg xaav qha nwg lub fwjchim kws luj rua puab pum.
Nwg has rua dlej Havtxwv Lab, ces dlej txawm faib hlo ua kev qhuav qhawv; nwg coj nwg tsaav tuabneeg moog dlhau rua saab tim u.
Nwg paab puab dlim ntawm cov tuabneeg kws ntxub puab; nwg cawm puab dlim ntawm puab cov yeebncuab.
Dlej havtxwv nphau nphwv lug npug nkaus puab cov yeebncuab; ua rua cov yeebncuab tsi seem ib tug le.
Nwg tsaav tuabneeg txhaj ntseeg nwg tej lug cog tseg hab hu nkauj qhuas nwg.
Tabsis puab txawm siv tsi ncu qaab tej txujci kws tug TSWV tau ua lawm, puab laam tau laam ua tsi yuav Vaajtswv ua tug tuavxaam le.
Thaus nyob nraag taj suabpuam, puab sab hlub xaav tau ntau, puab txhaj sim Vaajtswv sab;
nwg kuj muab tej kws puab thov rua puab, tabsis nwg tso tej kaab mob kws txaus ntshai heev lug rua puab.
Thaus nyob nraag taj suabpuam puab ua saib tsi taug Mauxes hab Aloos kws yog tug TSWV ob tug tubkhai kws dlawbhuv.
Ces aav txawm qheb hlo nqog kag Dathaas hab nphau lug txhub Anpilaas tsev tuabneeg;
suavtawg poob lug kub puab cov kwvtij hab hlawv cov tuabneeg sab phem tuag taag huv tuabsi.
Puab muab kub lug nchuav ua ib tug mlom nyuj rua ntawm Roob Xinais hab puab pe tug mlom nyuj ntawd;
puab muab tug mlom kws zoo le tug tsaj noj zaub lug hloov Vaajtswv tug tshwjchim kws ci ntsaa quas ab chaw.
Puab tsi ncu qaab tug Vaajtswv kws tau ua tej txujci luj cawm puab dlim nraag tebchaws Iziv lawm.
Tug TSWV tau ua tej txujci tseemceeb nyob nraag tebchaws Iziv! Hab tau ua tej txujci kws xaav tsi thoob nyob ntawm Havtxwv Lab!
Thaus Vaajtswv has tas nwg yuav ua kuas nwg tsaav tuabneeg puamtsuaj, Mauxes kws yog Vaajtswv tug tubkhai kws nwg xaiv txawm sawv cheem Vaajtswv tsi pub nwg txujkev chim rhuav nwg tsaav tuabneeg.
Cov Yixalayees tsi kaam moog nyob huv lub tebchaws kws tau zoo, rua qhov puab tsi ntseeg Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg.
Puab nyob huv puab tej tsevntaub hab ywg taag zug, tsi kaam noog tug TSWV tej lug le.
Yog le ntawd nwg txhaj has rua puab tas, nwg yuav ca kuas puab tuag taag rua huv taj suabpuam,
hab yuav muab puab cov xeebntxwv ntab tsiv moog nyob ua saab ua sua xyaw lwm tsaav tuabneeg, hab yuav ca puab tuag taag rua huv luas tej tebchaws.
Thaus nyob huv lub nroog Pe-aus, Vaajtswv tsaav tuabneeg tau moog nrug luas pe Npa-aas; hab moog nrug luas noj tej kws muab fij rua tej vaajtswv kws tsi muaj sa.
Tej kws puab ua ntawd ua rua tug TSWV npautawg, nwg txhaj tso tej kaab mob kws txaus ntshai heev lug rua puab.
Tabsis Finehas txawm sawv tseeg rau txim rua cov tuabneeg kws ua txhum, ces tej kaab mob ntawd txhaj dlua moog lawm.
Qhov ntawd yog ua kuas puab ncu ntsoov tseg, ib tam rua ib tam moog ibtxhis le.
Nyob ntawm lub qhovdlej Melinpas, Mauxes ntxhuv sab kawg le, rua qhov cov Yixalayees ua rua tug TSWV chim heev.
Puab tau ua rua Mauxes npautawg kawg le, Mauxes txhaj laam tau laam has lug tsi xaav tom ntej tom qaab.
Puab tsi muab cov yeebncuab tua kuas tuag taag lawv le tug TSWV has,
tabsis puab moog nrug cov tuabneeg ntawd ua tshoob ua kug hab moog xyum ua lawv le cov tuabneeg ntawd ua.
Vaajtswv tsaav tuabneeg moog pe mlom, puab txhaj moog maag luas lub vuj hlua.
Puab muab puab tej tub tej ntxhais tua fij rua tej mlom huv tebchaws Kana-aas.
Puab muab puab tej mivnyuas kws tsi muaj txhum tua, vim puab tua tuabneeg le ntawd, puab lub tebchaws txhaj tsi huv lawm.
Tej kws puab ua ntawd, ua rua puab tsi huv hab puab tsi muab sab npuab Vaajtswv lawm.
Yog le ntawd tug TSWV txhaj chim rua nwg tsaav tuabneeg; hab nwg dlhuav puab heev.
Nwg muab puab cob rua lwm tsaav tuabneeg txhais teg, hab ca puab cov yeebncuab tuaj kaav puab.
Puab raug puab cov yeebncuab tsimtxom hab raug yuam ua qhev.
Tug TSWV tau paab puab ntau zag lawm, tabsis puab txhobtxwm ntxeev sab rua nwg hab puab tau moog ua kev txhum luj heev.
Txawm le ntawd los thaus puab thov tug TSWV, nwg nov puab tej suab quaj hab nwg paab puab dlim kev txomnyem.
Vim nwg taabncuab puab, nwg txhaj ncu txug nwg tej lug cog tseg, hab vim nwg txujkev hlub luj heev, nwg txhaj hloov sab.
Nwg ua rua cov tuabneeg kws tsimtxom puab paub tu sab rua tej kws puab ua limham ntawd.
Tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv, thov cawm peb hab coj peb tawm huv lwm tsaav tuabneeg rov qaab lug; kuas peb txhaj tau ua koj tsaug hab qhuas koj lub npe kws dlawbhuv.
Ca le qhuas tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv; nwgnuav ca le qhuas nwg hab qhuas nwg moog ibtxhis le. Hab suavdlawg has tas, “Amees!” Ca le qhuas tug TSWV!
“Ca le ua tug TSWV tsaug, nwg yog tug kws muaj lub sab zoo; nwg txujkev hlub nyob moog ibtxhis!”
Mej cov kws tug TSWV cawm dlim lawm, ca le rov has cov lug nuav txhua zag kws mej qhuas tug TSWV. Nwg tau cawm mej dlim ntawm mej cov yeebncuab,
hab coj mej tawm huv lwm tsaav tuabneeg tej tebchaws, tsi has nubtuaj, nubpoob, qaumteb hab qaabteb  rov qaab lug.
Muaj ibtxha moog moog lug lug tom taj suabpuam, vim puab nrhav tsi tau kev moog rua huv lub nroog kws puab yuav moog nyob.
Puab tshaib plaab hab nqhes dlej heev, puab tsi muaj chaw ca sab rua qhov twg le.
Thaus puab raug kev nyuaj sab, puab hu txug tug TSWV, nwg kuj cawm puab dlim kev txomnyem.
Nwg coj puab taug kev ncaaj nraim moog rua huv lub nroog kws puab nyob.
Puab yuav ua tug TSWV tsaug, vim nwg txujkev hlub kws tsi paub kawg, hab vim tej txujci tseemceeb kws nwg tau ua paab puab lawm.
Nwg pub dlej rua cov tuabneeg nqhes dlej haus kuas txaus sab, hab pub zaub mov rua cov tuabneeg tshaib plaab noj tsau npo.
Muaj qee leej nyob huv txujkev kws tsaus ntuj nti hab nyuaj sab ntxhuv plawv kawg le, puab raug luas muab saw hlau khi rau txim txomnyem ntsuav;
vim puab tawv nyom tug Vaajtswv kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus tej lug saamfwm hab tsi noog nwg tej lug qha.
Puab qaug zug vim ua num nyaav; puab qaug los tsi muaj leejtwg paab.
Thaus puab raug kev nyuaj sab, puab hu tug TSWV, nwg cawm puab dlim txujkev txomnyem.
Nwg coj puab tawm huv txujkev nyuaj sab ntxhuv plawv hab kev tsaus ntuj nti lug; hab nwg ua rua tej saw hlau kws khi puab tu pis nrho.
Puab yuavtsum ua tug TSWV tsaug, vim nwg txujkev hlub kws tsi paub kawg hab vim nwg tej txujci tseemceeb kws nwg tau ua paab puab lawm.
Nwg tsoo tej qhovrooj kws yog tooj povtseg, hab tsoo tej nqaaj hlau ntsoog mog nyoos.
Muaj qee leej ruag hab raug txomnyem vim tej kev txhum hab kev phem kev qas kws puab ua;
puab dlhuav zaub mov kawg le puab tub yuav tuag.
Thaus puab raug kev nyuaj sab, puab hu tug TSWV, nwg kuj paab puab dlim kev txomnyem.
Tug TSWV has xwb, ces puab tej mob txawm zoo hab nwg cawm puab dlim txujkev tuag.
Puab yuavtsum ua tug TSWV tsaug, vim nwg txujkev hlub kws tsi paub kawg, hab vim tej txujci tseemceeb kws nwg tau ua paab puab lawm.
Puab yuavtsum fij khoom ua nwg tsaug hab zoo sab luag ntxhi hu nkauj qha txhua yaam kws tug TSWV tau ua lawm rua suavdlawg noog.
Muaj qee leej tsaav nkoj moog lug sau havtxwv, ua laag ua luam nrhav noj.
Puab pum tej num kws tug TSWV muaj tswvyim ua tau, yog nwg tej txujci tseemceeb kws nyob huv havtxwv.
Vaajtswv has ces txawm muaj tej nthwv cua ntsawj tuaj ua rua dlej ndlaas nphau nphwv.
Tej nkoj tshoom pis plawg rua sau nruab cua hab poob rov lug. Tej xwm nuav ua rua tuabneeg poob sab hab ntshai kawg;
Puab qaug puj poog ib yaam le tej tuabneeg qaug cawv, puab tej kev txawj ntse paab tsi tau puab lawm.
Thaus puab raug kev nyuaj sab puab hu tug TSWV, nwg kuj cawm puab dlim kev txomnyem.
Nwg ua rua tej cua dlaaj cua dlub tu, hab ua rua dlej havtxwv nyob tug yeeg.
Puab zoo sab heev vim cua dlaaj cua dlub tu hab dlej havtxwv tug lawm, tug TSWV coj puab lug txug ndlua lub chaw nreg nkoj lawv le puab sab xaav tsi raug kev nyuaj sab le caag.
Puab yuavtsum ua tug TSWV tsaug, vim nwg txujkev hlub kws tsi paub kawg hab vim tej txujci tseemceeb kws nwg tau ua paab puab lawm.
Puab yuavtsum pav tug TSWV lub fwjchim kws luj rua zeej tsoom suavdlawg paub, hab qhuas nwg rua ib tsoom thawjcoj kws tuaj ua ke saablaaj noog.
Tug TSWV ua rua tej dlej tu qhuav qhawv hab ua rua tej dlej cag tu nrho tsi ndlwg le lawm.
Nwg ua rua tej aav rog qaab ntsev tsi zoo cog dlaabtsi, vim cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv thaaj aav ntawd ua phem ua qas.
Nwg muab tej taj suabpuam hloov ua paag dlej hab ua kuas muaj qhovdlej txhawv huv tebchaws mojsaab qhua.
Nwg ca cov tuabneeg tshaib nqhes lug nyob rua huv; ces puab txawm rhawv nroog nyob rua qhov ntawd.
Puab cog qoob hab txiv maab rua huv tej teb hab sau tau qoobloo ntau nplua mag.
Tug TSWV foom koob moov rua nwg tsaav tuabneeg muaj tubki fuamvaam coob; nwg tsi pub puab tej tsaj txhu tu noob le.
Thaus Vaajtswv tsaav tuabneeg swb rog, vim raug luas tsimtxom hab raug kev txomnyem,
thaus ntawd Vaajtswv thuam hab saib tsi taug cov numtswv, hab ua kuas puab moog moog lug lug tom taj suabpuam kws tsi muaj kev ca sab.
Tabsis nwg cawm cov tuabneeg pluag kuas dlim txujkev txomnyem hab pub kuas puab tej tubki fuamvaam coob ib yaam le tej paab yaaj.
Thaus cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg pum tej xwm nuav, mas puab zoo sab kawg le, tabsis cov tuabneeg ua phem nyob ntsag tu has tsi taug ib lu lug le.
Thov kuas cov tuabneeg muaj tswvyim raag txug tej nuav, thov kuas puab leeg paub has tas tug TSWV yog tug kws muaj txujkev hlub tsi paub kawg.
Vaajtswv, kuv ca sab rua koj tuab leeg xwb! Kuv yuav hu nkauj hab qhuas koj! kuv lub sab, ca le tsim dlheev!
Kuv lub raaj hab lub nkauj nogncaas, ca le tsim dlheev! Kuv yuav tsaa kuas lub nub sawv.
Tug TSWV kws nrug nraim txhua tsaav tuabneeg nyob, kuv yuav ua koj tsaug, kuv yuav qhuas koj taabmeeg ib tsoom tebchaws.
Koj txujkev hlub kws tsi paub kawg sab moog nto ntuj; hab koj txujkev ncaaj nceeg sab moog nto plawg ntuj ntsuab.
Vaajtswv, thov qha koj lub fwjchim kws luj rua sau nruab ntug, hab qha koj tug tshwjchim kws ci ntsaa ab rua tuabneeg nplajteb pum.
Thov koj siv koj tug zug cawm peb; hab teb kuv tej lug thov, kuas tsaav tuabneeg kws koj hlub txhaj le dlim.
Vaajtswv has lug huv nwg chaav dlawbhuv  tuaj has tas, “Kuv yog tug muaj yeej lawm, kuv yuav muab lub nroog Sekhees faib, hab muab lub Haav Xukaus faib rua kuv tsaav tuabneeg.
Kile-as hab Manaxes puavleej yog kuv tug; Efalayees yog kuv lub mom hab Yudas yog kuv tug cwj.

Tabsis kuv yuav siv Mau-am ua kuv lub taig ntxuav teg, kuv yuav muab kuv nkawm khau khab pov rua huv tebchaws Edoos, ua cim qha has tas lub tebchaws ntawd yog kuv tug lawm. Kuv yuav qw lub suab muaj yeej rua cov tuabneeg Filitees.”
Vaajtswv, leejtwg yuav coj kuv moog rua huv lub nroog kws ruaj khov? Leejtwg yuav coj kuv moog rua huv tebchaws Edoos?
Vaajtswv, koj tso peb tseg lawm los? Koj txawm yuav tsi nrug peb cov tubrog moog le los?
Ca le paab peb tawmtsaam tug yeebncuab ntawd; tuabneeg txujkev paab tsi muaj qaabhau dlaabtsi le.
Yog Vaajtswv tuaj peb tog, peb yuav kovyeej; nwg yuav ua rua peb cov yeebncuab swb.
Vaajtswv, kuv qhuas koj; thov koj tsi xob nyob ntsag tu!
Cov tuabneeg sab phem hab dlaag ntxag tuaj tawmtsaam kuv, hab puab has lug dlaag rhuav kuv rua nuav rua u,
hab puab has tej lug phem qas rua kuv, hab puab laam tau laam tawmtsaam kuv tsi muaj qaabhau le.
Txawm yog kuv hlub puab hab thov Vaajtswv paab puab los puab pheej tawmtsaam kuv le.
Puab ua phem pauj kuv tej kev ua zoo hab puab muab kev ntxub pauj kuv tej kev hlub.
Ca le xaiv ib tug txav txim tsi ncaaj moog sim kuv tug yeebncuab, hab ca kuas nwg cov yeebncuab ib tug tuaj kom nwg.
Thov kuas nwg yog tug kws luas has tas nwg yog tug txhum, hab thov kuas nwg tej lug thov rov rau txim rua nwg.
Thov tsi xob pub nwg muaj sa nyob ntev; ca lwm tug lug ua nwg teg num!
Thov kuas nwg cov mivnyuas ua ntsuag, hab nwg tug quaspuj ua puj ntsuag!
Thov kuas nwg cov mivnyuas ua tuabneeg lajlees hab tsi muaj vaaj tse nyob; thov kuas puab raug lawv tawm huv puab tej tsev kws puag taag ntawd moog!
Thov kuas cov tuabneeg kws qev rua nwg, tuaj txeeb nwg vaaj nwg tsev; thov ca luas tuaj txeeb txhua yaam kws nwg tau lug huv tuabsi moog.
Thov kuas tsi xob muaj ib tug twg ua zoo rua nwg lossis tsi xob quavntsej nwg tej mivnyuas ntsuag kws nwg tso tseg le.
Thov kuas nwg cov xeebntxwv tuag taag huv tuabsi, hab kuas tam tuabneeg tom ntej nuav tsi xob muaj leejtwg ncu txug nwg lub npe le lawm.
Thov kuas tug TSWV ncu ntsoov nwg cov yawmkoob tej kev phem kev qas hab tsi xob zaam nwg nam tej kev txhum hlo le.
Thov Vaajtswv ncu ntsoov puab tej kev txhum, tabsis thov tsi xob ncu txug puab hlo le lawm!
Tug tuabneeg ntawd tsi muaj lub sab dlawb sab zoo; nwg tsimtxom hab tua cov tuabneeg pluag, cov txomnyem hab cov kws taag kev ca sab.
Nwg nyam foom phem rua luas, thov kuas nwg tej lug foom phem ntawd rov lug raug nwg! Nwg ntxub txujkev foom koob moov rua luas, thov kuas tsi xob muaj tuabneeg foom koob moov rua nwg.
Nwg muab tej lug foom phem lug naav ib yaam le naav rig tsho; thov kuas nwg tej lug foom phem nkaag moog rua huv nwg lub cev ib yaam le dlej, hab nkaag moog rua huv nwg cov pobtxhaa ib yaam le roj.
Thov kuas tej lug foom phem ntawd looj nkaus nwg le tej tsoog tsho hab rig nwg lub cev le txuj hlaab.
Tug TSWV, thov rau txim rua kuv cov yeebncuab le ntawd, cov kws pheej has lug phem tawmtsaam kuv!
Tabsis tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam, thov koj paab kuv lawv le koj tau coglug lawm; hab thov tso kuv dlim vim koj txujkev hlub kws zoo kawg nkaus.
Kuv pluag hab txomnyem heev, tu kuv sab kawg le.
Kuv taabtom yuav pluj moog ib yaam le tug dluab ntxoov ntxoo thaus yuav tsaus ntuj; kuv raug muab xyeeb povtseg ib yaam le tug kooj.
Kuv ob lub hauvcaug tsaug tsi muaj zug, vim tsi tau mov noj; kuv ntxaug heev tshuav tawv qhwv pobtxhaa lawm xwb.
Thaus luas pum kuv, luas luag kuv plig hab thuam kuv cu hau nyo.
Tug TSWV kws yog kuv tug Vaajtswv, thov koj paab kuv; vim koj yog tug muaj txujkev hlub kws tsi paub kawg, thov cawm kuv lauj!
Thov ua rua kuv cov yeebncuab paub has tas yog koj txhais teg cawm kuv dlim.
Txawm yog puab foom phem rua kuv los koj yuav foom koob moov rua kuv. Thov kuas cov tuabneeg kws tsimtxom kuv swb  hlo moog, hab thov ca kuv kws yog koj tug tubkhai zoo sab.
Thov kuas kuv cov yeebncuab raug txaajmuag; thov kuas tej kev txaajmuag looj nkaus puab ib yaam le naav tsoog tsho.
Kuv yuav tsaa suab ua tug TSWV tsaug; kuv yuav qhuas nwg taabmeeg ib tsoom tuabneeg suavdlawg kws tuaj txoos ua ke,
rua qhov nwg tuaj tug tuabneeg pluag tog, hab cawm tug pluag dlim ntawm cov tuabneeg kws rau txim rua nwg.
Tug TSWV has rua kuv tug tswv has tas “Koj ca le lug nyob ntawm kuv saab xis moog txug thaus kuv muab koj cov yeebncuab lug rua rua koj tsuj.”
Tug TSWV yuav nthuav koj lub fwjchim ua vaajntxwv huv lub nroog Xi-oos moog kuas dlaav. Nwg has tas, “Koj ca le kaav koj cov yeebncuab huv tuabsi.”
Nub kws koj ntaus koj cov yeebncuab, koj tsaav tuabneeg yuav tuaj koj tog; koj tej tub hluas yuav tuaj cuag koj sau lub roob dlawbhuv ib yaam le tej lwg kws ntsu thaus sawv ntxuv.
Tug TSWV tau coglug le caag lawm, nwg yeej tsi hloov le: “Koj yuav ua povthawj moog ibtxhis ib yaam le Mekixedes tau ua lug lawm.”
Tug TSWV nyob rawv ntawm koj saab xis; thaus nwg chim, nwg yuav ua kuas tej vaajntxwv swb hlo.
Nwg yuav txav txim rua txhua tsaav tuabneeg, hab ua kuas tuabneeg tuag pawg lug huv tshaav rog; nwg yuav kovyeej tej vaajntxwv kws nyob thoob plawg nplajteb.
Vaajntxwv yuav haus tug dlej kws ndlwg lawv ntug kev, tug dlej ntawd yuav txhawb nwg tug zug kuas nwg muaj yeej.
Ca le qhuas tug TSWV! Kuv yuav ua tug TSWV tsaug kawg sab kawg ntsws taabmeeg Vaajtswv tsaav tuabneeg kws tuaj sis sau ua ke.
Tej txujci tseemceeb kws tug TSWV ua luj kawg le! Txhua tug kws txaus sab rua tej txujci ntawd, mas puab xaav paub tej txujci ntawd kawg le.
Txhua yaam kws tug TSWV ua, tseemceeb hab muaj koob meej kawg le; nwg txujkev ncaaj nceeg nyob moog ibtxhis.
Tug TSWV yeej ua kuas peb ncu ntsoov nwg tej txujci tseemceeb moog le; nwg yog tug muaj lub sab zoo hab taabncuab suavdlawg.
Nwg pub rua cov tuabneeg kws fwm nwg muaj noj muaj haus tsi tu pluag; nwg yeej ncu ntsoov nwg tej lug cog tseg moog le.
Nwg qha nwg lub fwjchim luj rua nwg tsaav tuabneeg kws yog nwg muab lwm tsaav tuabneeg tej tebchaws rua puab.
Ib puas tsaav yaam kws nwg ua, puavleej tseeb hab ncaaj nceeg; nwg tej lug qha yog tej kws ca sab tau.
Nwg tej lug qha kaav moog ibtxhis; tej lug ntawd qha qhov tseeb qhov ncaaj.
Nwg tso nwg tsaav tuabneeg dlim, hab coglug rua puab moog ibtxhis. Nwg yog tug dlawbhuv hab muaj fwjchim luj kawg le!
Tug kws fwm tug TSWV; tug ntawd txhaj yog tug muaj tswvyim, nwg pub kev totaub rua cov kws fwm nwg hab noog nwg tej lug saamfwm. Tsimnyog qhuas nwg lub npe moog ibtxhis.
Ca le qhuas tug TSWV! Tug kws fwm tug TSWV, yog tug kws tau koob moov, tug kws txaus sab noog tug TSWV tej lug, yog tug kws tau kev zoo sab.
Tug tuabneeg sab zoo caajceg yuav muaj fwjchim huv lub tebchaws; nwg cov xeebntxwv yuav tau koob moov.
Nwg caajceg yuav muaj txag npluanuj hab yuav vaammeej moog le.
Txawm yog cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg nyob rua huv qhov tsaus ntuj los qhov kaaj yuav ci pum kev kaaj nrig rua puab, vim puab muaj lub sab ncaaj, puab hlub hab taabncuab lwm tug.
Tug kws ua sab dlawb paug qev rua luas, hab ua num ncaaj nceeg, yog tug kws tau koob moov.
Tug kws ua ncaaj nceeg lub koob meej yuav tsi poob, luas yuav ncu ntsoov nwg moog ibtxhis.
Txawm yog nov tej xuv tsi zoo los nwg yeej tsi ntshai; nwg ntseeg ruaj hab tso sab rua tug TSWV.
Nwg tsi txhawj hab tsi ntshai le; nwg paub has tas, nwg cov yeebncuab yuav swb.
Nwg ua sab dlawb paug pub rua cov pluag, hab nwg hlub luas tsi tu le; nwg yuav tau koob meej hab suavdlawg yuav fwm nwg.
Cov tuabneeg sab phem pum tej nuav mas puab chim heev; puab zawm nav zog hab ntxub nwg heev los puab kuj pluj taag; puab taag kev ca sab moog ibtxhis le.
Ca le qhuas tug TSWV! Mej cov kws yog tug TSWV cov tubkhai, mej ca le qhuas nwg lub npe!
Mej ca le qhuas nwg lub npe, nwgnuav hab moog ibtxhis le.
Ca le qhuas tug TSWV lub npe saab nubtuaj moog ti saab nubpoob!
Tug TSWV kaav txhua tsaav tuabneeg; nwg tug tshwjchim kws ci ntsaa ab sab tshaaj lub ntuj.
Tsi muaj leejtwg zoo cuag tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv lawm; nwg nyob sau qhov chaw kws sab tshaaj plawg,
tabsis nwg nyob sau saib tuaj rua lub ntuj hab lub nplajteb.
Nwg tsaa cov tuabneeg pluag sawv huv aav lug; nwg nqug cov tuabneeg txomnyem teg huv qhov tshauv lug,
hab ca puab moog nrug tej numtswv nyob ua ke yog tej numtswv kws kaav Vaajtswv tsaav tuabneeg.
Nwg pub tug quaspuj kws tsi muaj mivnyuas kuas muaj tsev nyob; nwg pub tug quaspuj ntawd muaj mivnyuas kuas nwg muaj kev zoo sab. Ca le qhuas tug TSWV!
Thaus cov Yixalayees tawm huv tebchaws Iziv lug, thaus kws Yakhauj cov xeebntxwv tawm ntawm lwm tsaav tuabneeg moog lawm.
Cov Yudas tau ua tug TSWV tsaav tuabneeg kws dlawbhuv, hab cov Yixalayees tau ua Vaajtswv tug.
Havtxwv Lab, ca le qhuav thaus pum tug TSWV; tug Dlej Yauladees ca le tsi ndlwg thaus pum tug TSWV.
Tej hauv roob dlha caws qa le tej laug yaaj; tej pov roob dlha tawg ncig leeg le tej mivnyuas yaaj.
Havtxwv, vim le caag koj txhaj qhuav lawm? Hab tug Dlej Yauladees, vim le caag koj txhaj tsi ndlwg lawm?
Tej hauv roob, vim le caag mej txhaj dlha caws qa le tej laug yaaj? Tej pov roob, vim le caag mej txhaj dlha tawg ncig leeg le tej mivnyuas yaaj?
Thaus tug TSWV kws yog Yakhauj tug Vaajtswv lug, lub nplajteb ua zug koog taabmeeg nwg.
Nwg yog tug Vaajtswv kws ua rua dlej tawm huv pobzeb lug; hab ua rua tej tug dlej ndlwg tawm huv roob tsuas lug.
Tug TSWV, koj tuab leeg, koj tuab leeg xwb txhaj yog tug tau koob meej! Peb tsi tsimnyog tau, rua qhov koj yog tug ncaaj nceeg hab muaj txujkev hlub kws tsi paub kawg.
Vim le caag lwm tsaav tuabneeg yuav nug peb has tas “Mej tug Vaajtswv nyob qhov twg?”
Peb tug Vaajtswv nyob sau ntuj; nwg ua txhua yaam lawv le nwg xaav ua.
Puab tej mlom yog muab nyaj hab kub nchuav, tej ntawd puavleej yog tuabneeg txhais teg ua xwb.
Tej mlom ntawd muaj qhovncauj, tabsis has tsi tau lug, muaj qhovmuag tabsis tsi pum kev.
muaj qhovntsej, tabsis tsi nov lug, muaj qhovntswg, tabsis tsi nov ntxhab.
Muaj teg, tabsis tsi txawj kov dlaabtsi, muaj kutaw, tabsis tsi txawj rhais ruam. Tej mlom ntawd ua tsi tau suab nrov huv qaa tuaj.
Cov tuabneeg kws nchuav mlom hab ca sab rua tej mlom ntawd, puab zoo le  tej mlom kws puab nchuav ntawd ntaag.
Cov Yixalayees, mej ca le tso sab rua tug TSWV. nwg yog tug paab mej hab tiv thaiv mej.
Vaajtswv cov povthawj, mej ca le tso sab rua tug TSWV; nwg yog tug paab mej hab nwg tiv thaiv mej.
txhua tug kws pehawm tug TSWV, mej ca le tso sab rua tug TSWV; nwg yog tug paab mej hab tiv thaiv mej.
Tug TSWV ncu ntsoov peb hab yuav foom koob moov rua peb; tug TSWV yuav foom koob moov rua cov Yixalayees, hab rua Vaajtswv cov povthawj txhua tug.
Nwg yuav foom koob moov rua txhua tug kws fwm nwg, tsi has tug hlub tug yau huv tuabsi.
Thov tug TSWV pub kuas mej hab mej cov tubki muaj xeebntxwv coob!
Thov tug TSWV kws tsim lub ntuj hab lub nplajteb foom koob moov rua mej!
Lub ntuj yog Vaajtswv tuab leeg le, tabsis nwg muab lub nplajteb pub rua tuabneeg nyob.
Tug kws tuag hab moog nyob huv lub chaw kws ntsag tu  lawm yeej tsi txawj qhuas tug TSWV.
Tabsis peb cov kws muaj sa nyob, peb yuav ua nwg tsaug, nwgnuav hab moog ibtxhis le. Ca le qhuas tug TSWV!
Kuv hlub tug TSWV, vim nwg nov kuv tej lug; nwg noog kuv tej lug thov.
Txhua zag kws kuv thov nwg, nwg noog kuv tej lug thov.
Kev pluj kev tuag nyob puagncig kuv; lub qhov tuag nyob rawv tog kuv; ua rua kuv ntshai hab lwj sab ntsuav xwb.
Ces kuv thov tug TSWV has tas, “Tug TSWV, kuv thov koj cawm kuv txujsa lauj!”
Tug TSWV yog tug muaj lub sab dlawb sab zoo hab ncaaj nceeg; peb tug Vaajtswv yog tug muaj txujkev taabncuab.
Tug TSWV tiv thaiv tug kws taag kev ca sab; thaus kuv raug kev txomnyem nwg cawm kuv dlim.
Kuv lub sab, ca le tso sab plhuav, rua qhov tug TSWV ua zoo rua kuv.
Tug TSWV cawm kuv dlim txujkev tuag; nwg so kuv lub kua muag hab tsi pub kuv swb le.
Yog le ntawd, kuv txhaj ua kuv lub neej huv nplajteb nuav, nrug cov tuabneeg kws muaj sa nyob taabmeeg tug TSWV.
Txawm yog muaj qee zag kuv ywg has tas “Kuv raug txomnyem heev lawm,”
hab thaus kuv ntshai, kuv has tas “Kuv tsi ca sab rua leejtwg le” los kuv tseem ca sab rua tug TSWV.
Tug TSWV ua txhua yaam zoo rua kuv, kuv yuav muab dlaabtsi pauj nwg txaj ntsig?
Kuv yuav coj cawv txiv maab tuaj fij rua tug TSWV, ua nwg tsaug rua qhov nwg cawm kuv dlim.
Nub kws Vaajtswv tsaav tuabneeg tuaj txoos ua ke, kuv yuav coj tej kws kuv tau coglug tseg lawm tuaj fij rua nwg.
Thaus tug TSWV cov tuabneeg ib tug kws muab sab npuab nwg tuag, tug TSWV mob sab heev.
Tug TSWV, kuv yog koj tug tubkhai; kuv ua koj teg num ib yaam le kuv nam kws yog koj tug ntxhais qhev ua ntaag. koj tub dlaws txuj saw hlau kws khi kuv lawm.
Kuv yuav muab khoom fij ua koj tsaug hab thov koj,
thaus koj tsaav tuabneeg tuaj txoos ua ke rua huv koj lub Tuamtsev huv lub nroog Yeluxalees, kuv yuav muab tej kws kuv tau coglug tseg lawm fij rua koj. Ca le qhuas tug TSWV!
Txhua tsaav tuabneeg ca le qhuas tug TSWV! Ib tsoom tuabneeg suavdlawg ca le qhuas tug TSWV!
Tug TSWV txujkev hlub kws hlub peb mas luj kawg le; hab nwg txujkev ncaaj nceeg nyob moog ibtxhis le. Ca le qhuas tug TSWV!
Ca le ua tug TSWV tsaug, rua qhov nwg yog tug muaj lub sab zoo, hab nwg txujkev hlub nyob moog ibtxhis.
Thov kuas ib tsoom Yixalayees s has tas “Nwg txujkev hlub nyob moog ibtxhis.”
Thov kuas Vaajtswv cov povthawj has tas “Nwg txujkev hlub nyob moog ibtxhis.”
Thov kuas txhua tug kws pehawm tug TSWV has tas “Nwg txujkev hlub nyob moog ibtxhis.”
Thaus kuv ntxhuv sab, kuv thov tug TSWV; nwg teb kuv hab tso kuv dlim.
Tug TSWV nrug nraim kuv nyob, kuv yuav tsi ntshai le; leejtwg yuav muaj peevxwm ua tau le caag rua kuv?
Tub yog tug TSWV tuaj kuv tog paab kuv, kuv yuav pum ntsoov kuv cov yeebncuab swb.
Ca sab rua tug TSWV zoo dlua qhov kws tso sab rua tuabneeg.
Ca sab rua tug TSWV zoo dlua qhov kws tso sab rua tej numtswv kws yog tuabneeg.
Muaj yeebncuab coob nyob puagncig kuv; tabsis vim tug TSWV lub fwjchim, kuv kuv yuav ua kuas puab puamtsuaj!
Puab nyob puagncig kuv txhua phaab; vim tug TSWV lub fwjchim, kuv yuav ua kuas puab puamtsuaj.
Puab sau nthwv ib yaam le tej ntaab tuaj vij puagncig kuv; tabsis puab yuav kub nyab ib yaam le suavtawg kub tej xuavpaug, vim tug TSWV lub fwjchim kuv yuav ua kuas puab puamtsuaj.
Luas tawmtsaam kuv heev ua rua kuv yuav laug swb, tabsis muaj tug TSWV paab kuv.
Tug TSWV ua rua kuv muaj cuabkaav hab muaj zug; nwg yog tug cawm kuv dlim.
Ca le noog lub suab hu nkauj muaj yeej zoo sab kws nrov huv Vaajtswv tsaav tuabneeg tej tsevntaub has tas, “Yog tug TSWV lub fwjchim kws luj kawg nkaus tau ua tej ntawd!
Nwg lub fwjchim kws luj kawg nkaus ua rua peb muaj yeej, nwg tug zug luj nrug peb moog huv tshaav rog!”
Kuv yuav tsi tuag, tabsis kuv yuav muaj sa nyob hab qha tej kws tug TSWV tau ua lawm.
Nwg rau txim nyaav heev rua kuv, tabsis nwg tsi ca kuv tuag.
Ca le qheb tej roojvaag kws yog kev ncaaj nceeg rua kuv, kuv yuav moog rua huv hab ua tug TSWV tsaug!
Ntawm nuav yog tug TSWV lub roojvaag; tsuas yog tug tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg txhaj moog tau rua huv xwb.
Tug TSWV, kuv ua koj tsaug, rua qhov koj teb kuv tej lug thov hab koj paab kuv dlim.
Lub pobzeb kws cov kws ua tsev muab povtseg, luas tub muab lub ntawd lug ua lub thawj lawm.
Qhov ntawd tub yog tug TSWV ua; tej ntawd ua rua peb xaav tsi thoob le!
Nub nua yog ib nub kws tug TSWV pub rua peb muaj yeej; peb ca le zoo sab hab txaus sab rua nub nua!
Tug TSWV, thov cawm peb, thov cawm peb lauj! Tug TSWV, thov paab kuas peb ua tau txhua yaam tav!
Thov Vaajtswv foom koob moov rua tug kws Vaajtswv khaiv lug! Peb foom koob moov huv tug TSWV lub Tuamtsev rua koj.
Tug TSWV yog Vaajtswv, nwg ua zoo kawg rua peb. Ca le nqaa tej ceg ntoo moog ua kevcai ncig lub thaaj.
Koj yog kuv tug Vaajtswv, kuv ua koj tsaug; koj yog kuv tug Vaajtswv, kuv yuav qha koj lub fwjchim kws luj rua suavdlawg.
Ca le ua tug TSWV tsaug, rua qhov nwg yog tug muaj lub sab zoo, hab nwg txujkev hlub nyob moog ibtxhis.
Cov tuabneeg kws ua lub neej tsi muaj leejtwg thuam tau hab ua lub neej lawv le tug TSWV txuj kevcai; yog cov kws tau koob moov.
Cov tuabneeg kws ua lub neej lawv le Vaajtswv tej lug saamfwm hab fwm nwg kawg sab kawg ntsws, yog cov kws tau koob moov.
Puab tsi ua kev phem kev qas; tabsis puab ua lub neej lawv le tug TSWV tej lug qha.
Tug TSWV, koj tau muab koj tej kevcai cob rua peb, hab qha kuas peb naj nub coj lawv le tej kevcai ntawd.
Thov paab kuas kuv muaj lub sab npuab hab ua lawv le koj tej kevcai!
Yog kuv ua lawv le koj tej lug saamfwm, ces kuv yuav tsi poob ntsejmuag le.
Thaus kuv paub koj tej kevcai ncaaj nceeg lawm, kuv yuav qhuas koj ntawm lub sab dlawb paug.
Kuv yuav fwm koj tej kevcai; thov koj tsi xob tso kuv tseg!
Yuav ua le caag ib tug tub hluas txhaj ua tau nwg lub neej kuas dlawbhuv? Yog nwg yuavtsum coj lawv le koj tej lug saamfwm.
Kuv yuav ua koj teg num kuas kawg kuv lub sab lub ntsws; thov paab kuas kuv tsi xob tawv dlhau koj tej lug saamfwm!
Kuv khaws koj tej lug rua huv kuv lub sab, kuv txhaj tsi ua txhum rua koj.
Tug TSWV, kuv ua koj tsaug; thov qha koj tej kevcai rua kuv.
Kuv yuav muab tej kevcai kws koj muab cob rua kuv lawm cim rua nruab sab.
Kuv txaus sab ua lawv le koj tej lug saamfwm heev dlua kev muaj txag npluanuj.
Kuv yuav naj nub kawm koj tej kevcai hab cim ntsoov koj tej lug.
Kuv txaus sab heev rua koj tej kevcai; hab kuv yuav ncu ntsoov koj tej lug saamfwm.
Thov koj ua zoo rua kuv kws yog koj tug tubkhai, kuas kuv txhaj muaj txujsa nyob noog koj tej lug.
Thov koj qheb kuv ob lub qhovmuag, kuas kuv paub koj txuj kevcai hab pum koj tej txujci tseemceeb.
Kuv ua neej nyob huv nplajteb nuav ib vuag xwb; thov tsi xob muab koj tej lug saamfwm zais tsi qha kuv paub.
Kuv lub sab xaav paub koj tej kevcai txhua lub sijhawm lug ntev lawm.
Koj tshev cov tuabneeg khaavtheeb; hab foom tsi zoo rua cov tuabneeg kws tsi noog koj tej lug saamfwm.
Thov koj paab kuas kuv dlim ntawm cov tuabneeg kws saib tsi taug kuv hab thuam kuv, rua qhov kuv naj nub ua lawv le koj tej kevcai.
Txawm yog tej numtswv tuav huv ntxeev sab rua kuv; los kuv yuav kawm koj tej lug qha tsi tso tseg le.
Koj tej lug ua rua kuv muaj kev kaaj sab; tej lug ntawd yog tej kws qhuab ntuag kuv.
Kuv tub yuav tuag, kuv pw rua huv aav lawm xwb; thov koj tsaa kuv sawv rov lug lawv le koj tau coglug tseg lawm.
Thaus kuv qha txhua yaam kws kuv tau ua taag lug, hab koj tau teb kuv tej lug lawm, thov koj qha koj tej kevcai rua kuv.
Thov paab kuas kuv totaub koj tej kevcai, hab kuv yuav xaav ntsoov koj tej lug  qhuab qha kws zoo kawg nkaus rua nruab sab.
