Tej kev nyuaj sab ua rua kuv lwj sab quas ntsuav; thov koj txhawb kuv tug zug lawv le koj tau coglug tseg lawm.
Thov koj ua zoo rua kuv hab qha koj tej kevcai rua kuv, kuas kuv txhaj tsi yuam kev moog ua txhum.

Tub yog saib rua sau kuv tej kwvtij hab tej phoojywg, mas kuv txhaj has rua lub nroog Yeluxalees has tas, “Thov kuas koj nyob kaaj sab lug.”
Tub yog saib rua sau tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv lub tsev, mas kuv txhaj thov Vaajtswv paab kuas koj muaj kev vaammeej.
Tug TSWV, kuv tsaa qhovmuag saib tuaj rua koj, saib tuaj rua sau lub ntuj qhov chaw kws koj nyob.
Ib yaam le cov tubkhai kws tog ntsoov puab tug tswv, hab ib yaam le tug nkauj qhe tog ntsoov nwg tug nam tsaavcuab, tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv, peb tog ntsoov moog txug thaus koj hlub peb.
Tug TSWV, thov koj taabncuab peb; thov taabncuab peb; rua qhov peb raug luas thuam heev dlhau lawm.
Cov tuabneeg npluanuj saib tsi taug peb tau ntev heev hab cov tuabneeg khaavtheeb tshev peb heev lawm.
Yog thaus tug TSWV tsi tuaj peb tog lawm peb yuav ua le caag? cov Yixalayees, mej ca le teb kuv!
“Yog thaus tug TSWV tsi tuaj peb tog, thaus peb cov yeebncuab tuaj tua peb,
puab yuav ca le muab peb nqog caj, rua qhov puab chim heev rua peb;
dlej yuav ca le fuam nphau nphwv tuaj nyaab peb hab kuav peb moog,
tej nthwv dlej kws luj heev yuav ca le lug kuav peb kuas tuag taag.”
Peb ca le ua tug TSWV tsaug, nwg yog tug kws tshem kuas peb tsi raug kev puamtsuaj.
Peb tsiv dlim ib yaam le tug noog kws dlim ntawm luas lub vuj hlua; luas lub vuj hlua tu nrho, peb txhaj dlim plawg tau nyob ywj sab!
Tug TSWV kws tsim ntuj tsim teb yog tug paab peb.
Cov tuabneeg kws ca sab rua tug TSWV, zoo ib yaam le lub Roob Xi-oos kws muab tshem tsi tau, hab nyob ntawm nwg qhov chaw moog ibtxhis le.
Yog le ntawd, tug TSWV tsomkwm nwg tsaav tuabneeg hab nyob puagncig puab, nwgnuav hab moog ibtxhis ib yaam le tej hauv roob tiv thaiv lub nroog Yeluxalees.
Cov tuabneeg sab phem yuav tsi tau kaav cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg lub tebchaws; yog cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg yuam kev ua phem, mas cov tuabneeg sab phem txhaj tau kaav xwb.
Tug TSWV, thov koj ua zoo rua cov tuabneeg kws ua zoo, hab rua cov tuabneeg kws coj lawv le koj tej lug saamfwm.
Tabsis thaus koj rau txim rua cov tuabneeg ua phem, thov koj rau txim rua cov tuabneeg kws tso koj tseg lawm hab. Thov kuas cov Yixalayees tau txais kev thaajyeeb.
Thaus tug TSWV coj peb rov qaab lug nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees, mas zoo le npau suav xwb!
Peb luag nrov hab hu nkauj zoo sab kawg! ces luas lwm tsaav tuabneeg txhaj caav ntshu nrooj txug peb has tas, “Tug TSWV tau ua txujci luj heev paab puab.”
Yog tag, tug TSWV tau ua txujci luj heev paab peb; peb zoo sab kawg le!
Tug TSWV, thov pub kuas peb rov vaammeej dlua, ib yaam le lug naag ua rua dlej rov puv nkaus tej kwj dleg kws qhuav taag lawm.
Thov kuas cov tuabneeg kws quaj ntsuag thaus puab cog qoobloo, tau zoo sab luag ntxhi sau tej qoob ntawd.
Cov tuabneeg kws quaj ntsuag thaus coj tej noob qoob moog cog, puab yuav hu nkauj seev yeeg moog sau tej qoob ntawd lug tsev.
Yog tug TSWV tsi ua tsev, ces cov tuabneeg ua tsev teg num tsi muaj qaabhau dlaabtsi; yog tug TSWV tsi tiv thaiv lub nroog, ces txawm yuav tso tubrog zuv khov kho los yeej tsi muaj qaabhau dlaabtsi.

Tug kws naj nub khwv noj khwv haus, nwg pw lig hab sawv ntxuv los nwg teg num yeej tsi muaj qaabhau dlaabtsi. Rua qhov tug TSWV yeej foom koob moov rua tug kws nwg hlub thaus lub sijhawm kws tug ntawd tseem pw tsaug zug.
Mivnyuas yog tej kws tug TSWV pub dlawb rua tuabneeg; mivnyuas yog koob moov lug ntawm tug TSWV.
Tug kws muaj mivnyuas thaus nwg tseem hluas, zoo ib yaam le tug tubrog kws muaj tsheej teg xub nyob ntawm nwg txhais teg.
Tug kws muaj xub nee ntau tau nyob kaaj sab lug! Thaus nwg nrug nwg cov yeebncuab nyob tim ntsej tim muag huv tsev tu plaub, nwg yuav tsi swb le.
Cov tuabneeg kws noog tug TSWV lug, hab coj lawv le tug TSWV j tej lug saamfwm, yog cov kws tau kev kaaj sab lug.
Koj yuav noj tej kws koj txhais teg khwv tau lug; koj yuav muaj kev zoo sab hab koj lub neej yuav vaammeej.
Koj tug quaspuj yuav zoo ib yaam le tsob txiv maab kws txi txiv ncw heev huv koj lub tsev, koj cov mivnyuas yuav zoo ib yaam le tej ntsuag ntoo roj kws nyob puagncig koj lub rooj mov.
Tug tuabneeg kws noog tug TSWV lug yuav tau koob moov nplua mag le ntawd.
Thov tug TSWV foom koob moov sau Xi-oos lug rua koj! Thov kuas koj tau pum lub nroog Yeluxalees vaammeej moog taag koj simneej!
Thov kuas koj muaj sa nyob ntev hab pum koj tej xeebntxwv! Thov kuas muaj kev thaajyeeb rua tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees!
Cov Yixalayees, qha tej kws mej cov yeebncuab tsimtxom mej, thaus mej tseem hluas lug rua peb paub saib.
“Kuv cov yeebncuab yeej ibtxwm limham hab tsimtxom kuv txij thaus kuv tseem hluas lug; tabsis puab tsi tau kovyeej kuv ib zag le.
Puab hlais kuv nrausqaum to ua tej kaab tub heev, ua rua kuv lub nrausqaum zoo ib yaam le dlaim teb kws luas laij lawm.
Tabsis tug TSWV yog tug ncaaj nceeg, nwg tso kuv dlim plawg txujkev ua luas qhev.”
Thov kuas txhua tug kws ntxub lub nroog Xi-oos raug tua swb hab thim rov qaab.
Thov ca kuas puab zoo ib yaam le tej nroj kws tuaj sau ruv tsev, hab qhuav tuag taag luj hlub tsi taug;
tsi muaj leejtwg muab sua coj moog teeb ua tej pawg lossis nqaa ua tej tsuag coj moog povtseg.
kuas tej tuabneeg dlua kev txhaj tsi has tas “Thov tug TSWV foom koob moov rua mej! Peb tuav tug TSWV lub npe foom koob moov rua mej.”
Tug TSWV, kuv txomnyem ntsuav hab twg kev lawm, kuv txhaj tsaa ncauj thov koj paab.
Tug TSWV, thov koj noog kuv lub suab hu; thov noog tej lug kws kuv thov koj paab kuv!
Yog koj cim peb tej kev txhum ca lawm, leejtwg txhaj tsiv dlim tsi raug txim?
Tabsis koj zaam txim rua peb, peb txhaj fwm koj hab noog koj lug.
Kuv tog Tug TSWV paab kuv kawg sab kawg ntsws, hab kuv tso sab rua nwg tej lug.
Kuv kub sab lug tog tug TSWV heev dlua tej tub faajxwm ceeblaaj tog kaaj ntug, ceeblaaj tog heev dlua tej tub faajxwm tog kuas kaaj ntug.
Cov Yixalayees, mej ca le tso sab rua tug TSWV, rua qhov nwg muaj txujkev hlub kws tsi paub kawg, hab nwg tog rawv yuav cawm kuas mej dlim.
Nwg yuav paab nwg tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees kuas dlim ntawm tej kev txhum huv tuabsi.
Tug TSWV, kuv tso plhuav txujkev khaavtheeb tseg, hab nrauj ncua txujkev tsaav fwjchim lawm. Kuv tsi txhawjxeeb txug tej kev txomnyem sab lossis tej kws nyuaj dlhau rua kuv.
Tabsis kuv muaj lub sab tug hab nyob tuabywv, ib yaam le tug mivnyuas mog kws pw ntsag tu ntawm leej nam lub xubndlag; yog le ntawd, kuv lub sab txhaj nyob tug yeeg le tug mivnyuas mog.
Cov Yixalayees, mej ca le tso sab rua tug TSWV nub nua hab moog ibtxhis le.
Tug TSWV, thov koj ncu ntsoov Daviv hab nwg tej kev ntxhuv sab.
Tug TSWV, thov koj ncu ntsoov nwg tej lug cog tseg, yog tej lug nwg yeem rua koj kws yog Yakhauj tug Vaajtswv kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus has tas:
“Kuv yuav tsi moog tsev lossis moog pw;
kuv yuav tsi su lossis pw tsaug zug,
moog txug thaus kws kuv npaaj tau chaw rua kuv tug TSWV, yog lub chaw rua Yakhauj tug Vaajtswv kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus.”
Thaus nyob huv Npelehees, peb nov has txug lub Phijxaab kws ntim Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg, hab peb moog nrhav tau lub Phijxaab ntawm tej teb huv lub nroog Ye-alees.
Peb has tas, “Peb ca le moog rua huv tug TSWV lub tsev; peb ca le moog pehawm nwg ntawm nwg lub zwmtxwv.”

Tug TSWV, thov koj coj lub Phijxaab kws ntim Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg, nrug koj lug rua huv lub Tuamtsev, lub Phijxaab ntawd yog yaam kws qha koj lub fwjchim, thov koj nyob huv lub Tuamtsev moog ibtxhis le.
Thov kuas koj cov povthawj naj nub ua ncaaj ua nceeg xwb; thov kuas koj tsaav tuabneeg txhua tug qw zoo sab luag ntxhi!
Tug TSWV, koj coglug tseg rua Daviv kws yog koj tug tubkhai; thov koj tsi xob tso tug vaajntxwv kws koj xaiv lawm tseg.
Koj coglug ruaj khov rua Daviv lawm, yog cov lug cog tseg kws koj yuav tsi thim le; koj has tas, “Kuv yuav tsaa koj cov tub ib tug ua vaajntxwv, hab nwg yuav nyob koj chaw tom qaab kws dlua koj lawm.
Yog koj cov tub ua lawv le kuv tej lug cog tseg, hab tej kevcai kws kuv muab cob rua puab lawm, ces puab cov xeebntxwv yuav tau ua vaajntxwv hloov koj chaw moog ibtxhis.”
Tug TSWV tau xaiv lub nroog Xi-oos; nwg xaav muab lub nroog ntawd ua nwg lub chaw nyob:
Nwg has tas, “Kuv yuav nyob qhov chaw nuav moog ibtxhis; kuv xaav kaav qhov chaw nuav.
Kuv yuav pub txhua yaam nplua mag rua lub nroog Xi-oos lawv le nwg xaav yuav; kuv yuav muab zaub mov rua cov tuabneeg txomnyem huv lub nroog ntawd kuas tau noj tsau npo.
Kuv yuav foom koob moov rua txhua yaam num kws nwg cov povthawj ua, ces nwg cov pejxeem yuav hu nkauj zoo sab luag quas ntxhi.
Kuv yuav tsaa Daviv cov xeebntxwv ib tug huv lub nroog nuav ua vaajntxwv kuas muaj fwjchim heev; hab kuv yuav ca tug vaajntxwv kws kuv xaiv kaav qhov chaw nuav moog ibtxhis.
Kuv yuav ua kuas nwg cov yeebncuab txaajmuag; tabsis lub tebchaws kws nwg kaav yuav muaj kev vaammeej hab npluanuj.”
Qhov kws Vaajtswv tsaav tuabneeg lug nyob ua ke le tej kwvtij yog ib qhov kws zoo hab ua rua puab muaj kev zoo sab heev!
Zoo ib yaam le cov roj muaj nqes kws muab laub rua sau Aloos taubhau ndlwg lug rua ntawm nwg cov fwjtxwv, hab ndlwg moog rua ntawm nwg lub ntsej tsho.

Zoo ib yaam le tej lwg sau Roob Helemoos kws nrug lug rua sau tej ncov roob ntawm lub nroog Xi-oos. Qhov ntawd yog qhov chaw kws tug TSWV tau coglug foom koob moov pub kuas muaj txujsa ntev dlhawv tsi txawj kawg.
Mej txhua tug kws yog tug TSWV cov tubkhai, hab txhua tug kws ua num huv nwg lub Tuamtsev thaus tsaus ntuj ca le lug qhuas tug TSWV!
Tsaa mej ob txhais teg moog rua ntawm lub Tuamtsev hab ca le qhuas tug TSWV!
Thov kuas tug TSWV kws tsim lub ntuj lub teb foom koob moov sau Xi-oos lug rua mej suavdlawg!
Ca le qhuas tug TSWV! mej txhua tug kws yog tug TSWV cov tubkhai, ca le qhuas tug TSWV.
Mej cov kws sawv ntawm tug TSWV lub tsev hab huv peb tug Vaajtswv lub Tuamtsev, mej ca le qhuas tug TSWV lub npe.
Ca le qhuas tug TSWV, rua qhov nwg yog tug zoo; ca le hu nkauj qhuas nwg lub npe, rua qhov nwg nwg sab dlawb sab zoo.
Tug TSWV xaiv Yakhauj rua nwg, hab xaiv tsaav tuavbneeg Yixalayees ua nwg tug.
Kuv paub has tas, peb tug TSWV yog tug muaj fwjchim luj, nwg muaj fwjchim dlua tej vaajtswv huv tuabsi.
Nwg ua tau txhua yaam lawv le nwg lub sab nyam, tsi has sau ntuj hab huv nplajteb nuav, huv havtxwv lossis huv nruab tivtxwv qhov kws tub heev.
Nwg yog tug ua kuas fuab sawv saab npoo ntuj nuav moog ti nkaus saab npoo ntuj tim u; nwg ua kuas muaj tsaglig xub laim rua naag lug hab nwg ua kuas muaj cua ntsawj.
Nyob huv tebchaws Iziv, nwg tua cov Iziv tej tub hlub hab tej tsaj thawj tug mivnyuas ib yaam nkaus.
Nyob nraag, nwg ua ntau yaam txujci tseemceeb kws xaav tsi thoob le, nwg rau txim rua Falaus hab Falaus cov numtswv huv tuabsi.
Nwg ua rua ntau tsaav tuabneeg raug puamtsuaj, hab tua cov vaajntxwv kws muaj fwjchim xws le:
Xihoos kws ua vaajntxwv kaav cov Amaules, Aunkas kws ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Npasaas, hab taagnrho cov vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Kana-aas.
Nwg muab puab tej tebchaws rua nwg tsaav tuabneeg, nwg muab rua cov Yixalayees.
Tug TSWV, koj lub npe yuav nyob moog ibtxhis; hab txhua tam tuabneeg yuav caav txug koj lub npe.
Tug TSWV yuav tiv thaiv nwg tsaav tuabneeg; nwg yuav taabncuab nwg cov tubkhai.
Cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws tej mlom yog nyaj yog kub, hab yog tuabneeg txhais teg nchuav xwb.
Puab muaj qhovncauj, tabsis tsi txawj has lug, muaj qhovmuag, tabsis tsi pum kev.
Puab muaj qhovntsej, tabsis tsi nov lug, hab puab tsi txawj ua paa.
Cov tuabneeg kws txua mlom, hab ca sab rua tej mlom, puab zoo ib yaam le tej mlom ntawd.
Cov Yixalayees, mej ca le qhuas tug TSWV; Vaajtswv cov povthawj, mej ca le qhuas tug TSWV!
Cov Levis, mej ca le qhuas tug TSWV; cov kws pehawm tug TSWV, mej ca le qhuas nwg!
Ca le qhuas tug TSWV kws nyob huv lub nroog Xi-oos, hab nyob huv nwg lub tsev huv lub nroog Yeluxalees. Ca le qhuas tug TSWV!
Ca le ua tug TSWV tsaug, rua qhov nwg yog tug muaj lub sab dlawb sab zoo; nwg txujkev hlub nyob moog ibtxhis.
Ca le ua tsaug rua tug Vaajtswv ntawm txhua tug vaajtswv; rua qhov nwg txujkev hlub nyob moog ibtxhis.
Ca le ua tsaug rua tug TSWV ntawm txhua tug tswv; rua qhov nwg txujkev hlub nyob moog ibtxhis.
Nwg tuab leeg txhaj yog tug kws ua tau tej txujci tseemceeb; rua qhov nwg txujkev hlub nyob moog ibtxhis.
Nwg yog tug muaj lub tswvyim kws tsim lub ntuj; rua qhov nwg txujkev hlub nyob moog ibtxhis;
nwg tsim lub nplajteb rua sau cov dlej kws tub heev; rua qhov nwg txujkev hlub nyob moog ibtxhis.
Nwg yog tug tsim lub nub hab lub hli; rua qhov nwg txujkev hlub nyob moog ibtxhis;
lub nub ca kaav nruab nub; rua qhov nwg txujkev hlub nyob moog ibtxhis;
lub hli hab tej nubqub ca kaav mo ntuj; rua qhov nwg txujkev hlub nyob moog ibtxhis.
Nwg yog tug tua cov Iziv tej tub hlub; rua qhov nwg txujkev hlub nyob moog ibtxhis.
Nwg coj cov Yixalayees tawm huv tebchaws Iziv; rua qhov nwg txujkev hlub nyob moog ibtxhis;
ntawm nwg txhais teg kws muaj zug hab txhais npaab kws muaj fwjchim; rua qhov nwg txujkev hlub nyob moog ibtxhis;
Nwg ua rua Havtxwv Lab faib hlo rua ob saab; rua qhov nwg txujkev hlub nyob moog ibtxhis;
Nwg coj nwg tsaav tuabneeg hlaa dlhau moog rua saab dlej tim u; rua qhov nwg txujkev hlub nyob moog ibtxhis;
tabsis nwg ua rua havtxwv nphau lug npug nkaus Falaus cov tubrog; rua qhov nwg txujkev hlub nyob moog ibtxhis;
Nwg coj nwg tsaav tuabneeg hlaa dlhau taj suabpuam; rua qhov nwg txujkev hlub nyob moog ibtxhis;
Nwg tua cov vaajntxwv kws muaj fwjchim; rua qhov nwg txujkev hlub nyob moog ibtxhis;
nwg tua cov vaajntxwv kws muaj koob meej nto moo lug; rua qhov nwg txujkev hlub nyob moog ibtxhis;
Xihoos kws yog tug vaajntxwv kaav cov Amaules; rua qhov nwg txujkev hlub nyob moog ibtxhis;
hab Aunkas kws yog tug vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Npasaas; rua qhov nwg txujkev hlub nyob moog ibtxhis;
nwg muab cov tuabneeg ntawd tej tebchaws rua nwg tsaav tuabneeg nyob; rua qhov nwg txujkev hlub nyob moog ibtxhis;
nwg muab tej tebchaws ntawd pub rua Yixalayees kws yog nwg tug tubkhai; rua qhov nwg txujkev hlub nyob moog ibtxhis;
Thaus peb raug tua swb los nwg ncu ntsoov peb; rua qhov nwg txujkev hlub nyob moog ibtxhis;
nwg tso peb dlim ntawm peb cov yeebncuab; rua qhov nwg txujkev hlub nyob moog ibtxhis;
Nwg pub rua tuabneeg hab tej tsaj muaj noj muaj haus tsau npo; rua qhov nwg txujkev hlub nyob moog ibtxhis.
Ca le ua tsaug rua Vaajtswv tug kws nyob sau ntuj; rua qhov nwg txujkev hlub nyob moog ibtxhis.
Peb nyob tsawg ntawm tej ntug dlej huv tebchaws Npanpiloos; thaus peb ncu dlheev txug lub nroog Xi-oos, mas peb tsaa suab hlo quaj.
Peb muab peb tej nkauj nogncaas khuab rua ntawm tej lwgzaaj kws nyob ze peb.
Cov tuabneeg kws nteg peb moog ua qhev kuas peb hu nkauj, puab has lug saib tsi taug peb has tas “Mej ca le hu ib zaaj nkauj has txug lub nroog Xi-oos rua peb noog.”
Thaus peb tseem nyob huv luas lwm tebchaws, peb yuav ua le caag hu tau nkauj qhuas tug TSWV?
Lub nroog Yeluxalees, yog kuv tsi ncu qaab txug koj, thov kuas kuv tsi xob txawj ntaus nkauj nogncaas le lawm.
Yog kuv tsi ncu qaab koj hab xaam tsi txug has tas, koj yog tug kws ua rua kuv zoo sab tshaaj plawg, ces thov kuas kuv tsi xob txawj hu nkauj ib zag ntxiv le lawm!

Tug TSWV, thov koj ncu ntsoov tej kws cov Edoos tau ua, nub kws puab txeeb tau lub nroog Yeluxalees. Thov koj ncu ntsoov tej lug kws puab has tas, “Ca le rhuav hab tsoo kuas nwg ntsoog taag rua huv aav!”
Lub nroog Npanpiloos, koj yuav raug puamtsuaj, kuas tsimnyog qhov kws koj tau ua rua peb lawm,
tug kws muab koj tej mivnyuas mog ntsawm rua sau tej pobzeb ua pauj koj yuav zoo sab kawg le.
Tug TSWV, kuv ua koj tsaug kawg sab kawg ntsws; kuv hu nkauj qhuas koj taabmeeg tej vaajtswv.

Kuv tig xubndlag rua ntawm koj lub Tuamtsev kws dlawbhuv, kuv nyo hau hab qhuas koj lub npe, rua qhov koj txujkev hlub kws tsi paub kawg txujkev ncaaj nceeg, rua qhov koj qha koj lub npe hab koj txujlug kws muaj fwjchim rua peb.
Thaus kuv hu koj, koj teb kuv tej lug thov; koj txhawb kuv tug zug kawg le.
Tug TSWV, taagnrho tej vaajntxwv huv nplajteb nuav yuav qhuas koj, rua qhov puab tau nov koj tej lug cog tseg.
Puab yuav hu nkauj qhuas tej kws koj tau ua hab koj tug tshwjchim kws ci ntsaa ab.
Txawm yog koj nyob sau qhov chaw kws sab tshaaj plawg los koj hlub txug cov kws nyob qeg huv nplajteb nuav, hab cov tuabneeg khaavtheeb tsiv tsi dlim ntawm koj le.
Thaus kev nyuaj sab nyob puagncig kuv koj paab kuv dlim. Koj tawmtsaam kuv cov yeebncuab hab koj lub fwjchim tso kuv dlim.
Tug TSWV, koj yuav ua txhua yaam lawv le koj tau coglug tseg lawm; koj txujkev hlub nyob moog ibtxhis; thov koj tsi xob tso tej num kws koj pib ntawd tseg.
Tug TSWV, koj tshawb saib kuv lub sab hab lub neej, koj yeej paub zoo.
Koj paub ib puas tsaav yaam kws kuv ua; txawm yog nyob dleb los koj yeej paub tej kws kuv lub sab xaav huv tuabsi.
Koj yeej pum ntsoov kuv, tsi has thaus kuv ua num lossis kuv su, koj paub tej kws kuv ua huv tuabsi.
Txawm yog thaus kuv tseem tsi tau has lug los koj tub xub paub ua ntej lawm has tas kuv yuav has dlaabtsi.
Koj nyob puagncig kuv, koj tug tshwjchim tiv thaiv kuv.
Koj yeej paub has tas kuv yog tuabneeg zoo le caag.
Kuv yuav tsiv moog nkaum qhov twg txhaj tsiv dlim koj? Kuv yuav tsiv moog nkaum qhov twg koj txhaj tsi pum kuv?
Txawm yog kuv nce moog txug sau ntuj los koj yeej nyob sau; yog kuv nqeg moog rua huv tubtuag teb los koj yeej nyob huv hab.
Yog kuv yaa moog dlhau rua saab nubtuaj lossis saab nubpoob
los koj yuav nyob qhov ntawd coj kuv kev, koj yuav nyob qhov ntawd paab kuv.
Txawm yog kuv hu kuas qhov tsaus ntuj lug roog kuv, lossis kuas qhov kaaj kws nyob puagncig kuv hloov ua qhov tsaus ntuj
los qhov tsaus ntuj tub tsi tsaus rua koj le, mo ntuj los yeej pum kev kaaj nrigib yaam le nruab nub; koj saib qhov tsaus ntuj kaaj nrig ib yaam le qhov kaaj.
Koj yog tug tsim kuv lub cev txhua yaam huv tuabsi; hab koj yog tug kws puab kuv rua huv kuv nam plaab.
Kuv qhuas koj rua qhov koj txhaj yog tug kws tsimnyog suavdlawg fwm; tej kws koj ua, mas kuv xaav tsi thoob hab tsi txawj pav le, tabsis kuv paub has tas tej ntawd yeej yog koj ua.
Thaus kuv tej pobtxhaa taabtom hlub tuaj sis dlhos ua ke huv kuv nam plaab, hab kuv hlub nraim nkoog huv nruab thab los koj yeej paub has tas kuv nyob huv.
Thaus kuv tseem tsi tau yug lug, koj tub pum kuv lawm; kuv tej noobnyoog ua neej nyob, koj tub xub muab sau rua huv koj phoo ntawv ua ntej kws tsi tau muaj tej noobnyoog ntawd lawm.
Vaajtswv, kuv ceeblaaj totaub tej kws koj xaav kawg le, koj xaav txhij xaav txhua ua rua kuv suav tsi txheeb le!
Yog kuv suav txheeb tej kws koj xaav, ntshai muaj ntau dlua tej xuabzeb; thaus kuv tsim dlheev lug, kuv tseem nrug koj nyob.
Vaajtswv, kuv xaav kuas koj muab cov tuabneeg ua phem ua qas tua povtseg; kuv xaav kuas cov tuabneeg limham txaav dleb ntawm kuv moog.
Puab has tej lug phem thuam koj, puab has saib tsi taug koj lub npe.
Tug TSWV, kuv ntxub cov tuabneeg kws ntxub koj kawg le; hab kuv dlhuav cov tuabneeg ntxeev sab kws tawmtsaam koj.
Kuv ntxub ntxaug puab kawg nkaus le; kuv suav has tas puab yog kuv cov yeebncuab.
Vaajtswv, thov koj tshuaj kuv kuas paub kuv lub sab; thov koj sim kuv hab nthuav tej kws kuv lub sab xaav saib zoo le caag.
Thov koj saib kuv lub sab saib puas muaj ib qhov txhum le caag; hab thov koj coj kuv taug txujkev kws nyob moog ibtxhis.
Tug TSWV, thov koj paab kuv kuas dlim ntawm cov tuabneeg sab phem; thov cawm kuas kuv dlim ntawm cov tuabneeg limham.
Puab lub sab pheej xaav ntsoov ua phem nkaus xwb, hab naj nub dlu kuas muaj kev sis caav sis tshe.
Puab tug nplaig muaj taug ib yaam le taug naab; hab puab tej lug muaj taug ib yaam le taug naab raaj kubsai.
Tug TSWV, thov koj tiv thaiv kuv kuas dlim ntawm cov tuabneeg sab phem lub fwjchim; thov cawm kuas kuv dlim ntawm cov tuabneeg kws xaav txuv kuv txujsa.
Cov tuabneeg khaavtheeb cuab muv tog kuv kev; puab cuab vaag hab cuab muv lawv ntug kev kuas maag kuv.
Kuv has rua tug TSWV tas, “Koj yog kuv tug Vaajtswv.” Tug TSWV, thov koj noog tej lug kws kuv thov koj paab kuv!
Tug TSWV, kuv tug TSWV, tug tiv thaiv kuv kws muaj zug heev, koj tub cawm kuv dlim kuv tshaav rog lug lawm.
Tug TSWV, thov koj tsi xob pub rua cov tuabneeg sab phem lawv le puab thov; thov tsi xob pub kuas puab tej kev ntxeev sab ntawm tav.
Thov koj tsi xob pub kuv cov yeebncuab kovyeej kuv; thov kuas tej lug phem kws puab has rov lug raug puab.
Thov kuas cov ncaig tawg kws cig lab ploog poob lug rua sau puab taubhau; thov muab puab pov rua huv qhov tsaus ntuj kuas puab tawm tsi tau lug le.
Thov kuas cov tuabneeg kws kom luas tsi tseeb tsi xob yeej; thov kuas txujkev phem lug raug cov tuabneeg limham hab ua rua puab raug kev puamtsuaj;
Tug TSWV, kuv paub has tas koj yeej tuaj cov tuabneeg pluag tog hab txav txim ncaaj rua cov tuabneeg kws txomnyem.
Cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg yuav tuav koj lub npe ua koj tsaug; puab yuav nyob ntawm koj lub xubndlag moog ibtxhis.
Tug TSWV, kuv hu koj thov koj paab kuv taamsim nuav! Thaus kuv hu koj, thov koj noog kuv tej lug thov.
Thov txais kuv tej lug thov ua cov tshuaj tsw qaab rua koj; hab kuv ob txhais teg kws tsaa thov koj ua cov khoom fij rua koj thaus tsaus ntuj.
Tug TSWV, thov koj tswj kuv lub qhovncauj, hab kuv ob dlaim tawv ncauj!

Thov koj cheem kuas kuv tsi xob ua txujkev txhum kws kuv lub sab xaav ua, hab tsi xob ca kuv koom sab nrug cov tuabneeg ua phem ua qas; thov tsi xob ca kuv muaj feem koom nrug puab tej rooj noj rooj haus.
Kuv txaus sab ca tug tuabneeg zoo rau txim hab tshev kuv, tabsis kuv tsi leeg yuav cov tuabneeg sab phem tej lug qhuas; rua qhov kuv naj nub thov Vaajtswv tawmtsaam puab tej kev phem.
Thaus puab cov numtswv raug muab txu poob tsaam lawm, ces puab yuav paub has tas tug TSWV txujlug yog lug tseeb.
Puab tej pobtxhaa ib yaa yuav nyob ib qho huv qhov ntxaa, ib yaam le lub pobzeb kws muab tsoo tawg ntsoog ntxawg sau npoo aav.
Tabsis tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam, kuv ca sab ntsoov rua koj, kuv nrhav koj txujkev tiv thaiv; thov tsi xob ca kuv tuag!
Thov koj paab kuas kuv tsi xob maag tej ntaa npuj kws luas cuab tog kuv, hab tsi xob maag tej vuj hlua kws cov tuabneeg sab phem cuab.
Thov kuas cov tuabneeg sab phem rov maag puab tej vuj hlua, kuas thaus kuv taug kev moog kuv txhaj tsi raug xwm dlaabtsi.
Kuv tsaa suab hlo thov tug TSWV paab; kuv thov nwg paab kuv.
Kuv ywg txhua yaam rua nwg noog, kuv qha kuv tej kev nyuaj sab rua nwg huv tuabsi.
Thaus kuv kawg tswvyim lawm, nwg paub has tas kuv yuav ua le caag, kuv cov yeebncuab cuab muv rua ntawm txujkev kws kuv moog.
Thaus kuv tsaa qhovmuag saib puagncig kuv, tsi muaj leejtwg paab kuv, tsi muaj leejtwg tiv thaiv kuv, hab tsi muaj leejtwg mob sab kuv.
Tug TSWV, kuv quaj thov koj paab kuv; tug TSWV, koj txhaj yog tug kws tiv thaiv kuv; koj yog txhua yaam kws kuv xaav yuav nyob huv kuv lub neej.
Thov koj noog kuv lub suab quaj hu paab, rua qhov kuv taag kev ca sab lawm! Thov cawm kuas kuv dlim ntawm kuv cov yeebncuab, vim puab muaj zug heev, ua rua kuv kov tsi yeej.
Thov koj tso kuas kuv dlim ntawm txujkev nyuaj sab; kuv yuav qhuas koj taabmeeg koj tsaav tuabneeg, thaus suavdlawg tuaj sis sau ua ke, rua qhov koj ua sab dlawb sab zoo rua kuv.
Tug TSWV, thov koj noog kuv tej lug thov! Koj yog tug kws ncaaj nceeg, thov koj noog kuv tej lug thov; koj yog tug muaj lub sab ncaaj, thov koj teb kuv tej lug!
Thov tsi xob coj kuv kws yog koj tug tubkhai moog txav txim; rua qhov yeej tsi muaj ib tug tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg taabmeeg koj le.
Kuv tug yeebncuab caum kuv tua, hab kuv swb nwg lawm; nwg coj kuv moog kaw rua huv lub tsev lojcuj kws tsaus ntuj nti, hab kuv zoo le cov tuabneeg kws tub tuag tau ntev lug lawm.
Kuv kawg tswvyim, hab kuv taag kev ca sab lawm.
Kuv xaav txug lub naj lub xyoo kws dlhau lawm; kuv xaav txug txhua yaam kws koj tau ua taag lug; kuv xaav txug tej kws koj ua ntawd.
Kuv tsaa kuv ob txhais teg thov koj; kuv lub sab qhuav qhawv ib yaam le cov aav, kuv tshaib nqhes koj txujlug ib yaam le nqhes dlej.
Tug TSWV, thov koj teb kuv tej lug thov taamsim nuav! Kuv taag kev ca sab lawm. Thov koj tsi xob tsiv nkaum kuv, nyob tsaam kuv moog nyob xyaw cov tuabneeg kws moog nyob huv tubtuag teb lawm.
Thov koj naj taagkig qha koj txujkev hlub kws tsi paub kawg rua kuv, rua qhov kuv ca sab ntsoov rua koj xwb. Thov koj qha saib tsimnyog kuv taug txujkev twg, rua qhov kuv tau thov koj lawm.
Tug TSWV, kuv lug cuag koj, thov koj tiv thaiv kuv; thov koj cawm kuv kuas dlim ntawm kuv cov yeebncuab.
Koj yog kuv tug Vaajtswv; thov koj qha kuas kuv paub ua lawv le koj lub sab nyam. Thov koj ua sab dlawb sab zoo rua kuv hab coj kuv taug txujkev kws tso sab lug.
Tug TSWV, thov koj cawm kuv kuas dlim lawv le koj tau coglug tseg lawm! Koj yog tug muaj lub sab dlawb sab zoo, thov koj paab kuas kuv dlim tej kev nyuaj sab!
Vim koj hlub kuv heev, thov koj tua kuv cov yeebncuab povtseg hab muab cov tuabneeg kws tsimtxom kuv ua kuas puamtsuaj, rua qhov kuv yog koj tug tubkhai.
Ca le qhuas tug TSWV kws yog tug tiv thaiv kuv! Nwg yog tug kws qha kuv sis tua hab npaaj kuv moog ntaus rog.
Nwg yog tug tiv thaiv kuv hab tuaj kuv tog, nwg yog kuv lub chaw cawm sav hab yog kuv tug Cawmseej, kuv tso sab plhuav rua nwg. Nwg tsaa kuv ua tug kaav taagnrho txhua tsaav tuabneeg.
Tug TSWV, tuabneeg yog dlaabtsi, koj txhaj yuav xaam txug nwg; tuabneeg yog leejtwg, koj txhaj le ua zoo rua nwg ua luaj?
Tuabneeg zoo ib yaam le ib nthwv cua xwb; nwg txujsa zoo ib yaam le tug dluab ntxoov ntxoo kws nyob ib vuag xwb.
Tug TSWV, thov koj ca le qheb hlo rooj ntug nqeg lug; koj ca le kov tej hauv roob kuas muaj paa nchu tawm tuaj.
Ca le tso tsaglig xub laim ua kuas koj cov yeebncuab tsiv ri sua; ca le tua koj cov xub neevnti kuas puab tsiv taag.
Koj cev teg sau ntuj tuaj nqug kuv tawm huv cov dlej kws tub tub hab cawm kuas kuv dlim; thov koj cawm kuv dlim ntawm cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws
kws has lug tsi tseeb hab dlaag tsi ua lawv le puab tau coglug tseg.
Vaajtswv, kuv yuav hu ib zaaj nkauj tshab qhuas koj; kuv yuav ntaus nkauj nogncaas hab hu nkauj qhuas koj.
Koj pub cov vaajntxwv moog ntaus yeej rog hab koj tau cawm koj tug tubkhai Daviv dlim.
Thov koj cawm kuv dlim ntawm kuv cov yeebncuab kws tsiv tsaim heev; thov koj cawm kuas kuv dlim ntawm cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws kws has lug tsi tseeb hab dlaag tsi ua lawv le puab tau coglug tseg.
Thov kuas peb cov tub hluas luj hlub zoo le tej ntsuag ntoo; hab thov kuas peb cov ntxhais zoo ib yaam le tej ncej kaum kws txheem lub loog.
Thov kuas peb tej txhaab muaj txhua yaam qoobloo puv nkaus; thov pub kuas peb tej yaaj kws nyob tom taj nraag yug mivnyuas coob txug ntau txheeb ntau vaam tug.
Thov kuas peb tej nyuj fuamvaam coob ua npoj ntwg, hab tsi xob muaj ib tug mooj lossis pluj le; thov kuas tsi xob muaj tej suab quaj ntxhuv sab rua txhua txujkev.
Cov tuabneeg kws tau txais koob moov yog cov kws muaj kev kaaj sab! Cov tuabneeg kws muaj Vaajtswv ua puab tug TSWV yog cov kws tau koob moov!
Kuv tug Vaajtswv hab kuv tug vaajntxwv, kuv yuav pav koj lub fwjchim rua suavdlawg; hab kuv yuav ua koj tsaug moog ibtxhis tsi kawg le.
Kuv yuav naj nub ua koj tsaug, hab yuav qhuas koj moog ibtxhis tsi kawg le;
Tug TSWV yog tug kws muaj fwjchim luj hab tsimnyog suavdlawg qhuas nwg kawg le; nwg lub fwjchim luj dlua tej kws peb lub sab xaav.
Txhua tam tuabneeg yuav qhuas tej txujci luj kws koj ua taag lug; puab yuav pav koj teg num tseemceeb kawg nkaus rua suavdlawg paub.
Tuabneeg yuav pav koj tug tshwjchim hab koj lub koob meej, hab kuv yuav xaav ntsoov txug koj tej txujci tseemceeb kws koj tau ua taag lug.
Tuabneeg yuav pav tej num tseemceeb kws koj ua, hab kuv yuav pav koj lub fwjchim luj rua suavdlawg.
Puab yuav qha txug ib puas tsaav yaam zoo kws koj ua, hab hu nkauj qhuas koj txujkev hlub.
Tug TSWV yog tug muaj kev hlub hab taabncuab, nwg tsi chim sai hab nwg muaj txujkev hlub kws tsi paub kawg.
Nwg ua zoo rua txhua tug, hab nwg hlub ib puas tsaav yaam kws nwg tsim.
Tug TSWV, ib puas tsaav yaam kws koj tsim yuav qhuas koj, hab koj tsaav tuabneeg yuav ua koj tsaug.
Puab yuav pav txug koj tug tshwjchim kws ci ntsaa ab huv koj lub tebchaws; hab qha rua suavdlawg paub txug koj tug zug luj zug nchaav,
kuas txhua tug paub txug koj tej num tseemceeb, hab koj tug tshwjchim kws ci ntsaa ab huv koj lub tebchaws.

Koj lub tebchaws yuav nyob moog ibtxhis, hab koj yuav ua vaajntxwv kaav moog ibtxhis tsi kawg le. Tug TSWV yeej ua lawv nraim le nwg tej lug cog tseg, hab nwg yeej hlub txhua yaam kws nwg tsim tseg lawm.
Nwg paab txhua tug kws raug kev txomnyem; hab tsaa txhua tug kws qaug lawm sawv.
Ib puas tsaav yaam kws muaj sa puavleej ca sab ntsoov rua koj, hab koj pub puab muaj noj muaj haus lawv le puab sab xaav.
Koj pub puab muaj txaus nkaus hab txaus rua tej kws puab muaj.
Ib puas tsaav yaam kws tug TSWV ua puavleej ncaaj nceeg, nwg muaj lub sab dlawb sab zoo ua nwg teg num.
Nwg nyob ze txhua tug kws thov nwg hab txhua tug kws muab sab npuab nwg.
Nwg pub rua txhua tug kws fwm nwg lawv le tej kws puab xaav yuav, nwg nov puab tej suab thov hab cawm puab dlim.
Tug TSWV tiv thaiv txhua tug kws hlub nwg, tabsis nwg yuav ua kuas cov tuabneeg sab phem raug kev puamtsuaj.
Kuv yuav naj nub qhuas tug TSWV; ib puas tsaav yaam kws nwg tsim tseg ca le qhuas nwg lub npe kws dlawbhuv moog ibtxhis.
Ca le qhuas tug TSWV! Kuv lub sab, ca le qhuas tug TSWV!
Thaus kuv tseem ua neej nyob kuv yuav qhuas tug TSWV; kuv yuav hu nkauj qhuas kuv tug Vaajtswv moog taag kuv simneej.
Tsi xob tso sab rua tej numtswv, puab yog tuabneeg xwb; puab yeej paab tsi tau mej dlim kev pluj kev tuag.
Thaus puab tuag, puab yuav rov moog ua aav; puab tej tswvyim yuav kawg rua nub ntawd.
Tug kws muaj kev kaaj sab, yog tug kws muaj Yakhauj tug Vaajtswv paab hab tso sab rua tug TSWV kws yog nwg tug Vaajtswv,
tug kws tsim lub ntuj lub teb, havtxwv hab ib puas tsaav yaam kws nyob sau ntuj, lub nplajteb hab havtxwv. Nwg yeej ibtxwm ua lawv le nwg tej lug cog tseg;
nwg tuaj cov tuabneeg kws raug luas tsimtxom tog; hab nwg pub mov rua cov tuabneeg kws tshaib nqhes noj. Tug TSWV tso cov tuabneeg raug txim kuas tau nyob ywj sab
hab nwg khu cov tuabneeg dligmuag kuas pum kev. Nwg tsaa txhua tug kws qaug lawm sawv rov lug; hab nwg hlub nwg tsaav tuabneeg kws ua ncaaj ua nceeg.
Nwg tsomkwm lwm tsaav tuabneeg kws nyob huv peb lub tebchaws; nwg paab cov puj ntsuag hab cov mivnyuas ntsuag, tabsis nwg rhuav tshem cov tuabneeg kws ua phem tej num.
Tug TSWV yog tug Vaajntxwv kws kaav moog ibtxhis. Xi-oos, koj tug Vaajtswv yuav kaav moog ibtxhis le; Ca le qhuas tug TSWV!
Ca le qhuas tug TSWV! qhov kws hu nkauj qhuas peb tug Vaajtswv yog ib qhov kws zoo heev; tsimnyog suavdlawg txaus sab hab qhuas nwg kawg le.
Tug TSWV yog tug kws txhim khu lub nroog Yeluxalees; nwg coj cov tuabneeg kws raug luas nteg moog lawm rov qaab lug.
Nwg khu cov tuabneeg kws sab ntsws puag taag hab qhwv puab tej qhov txhaab.
Nwg yeej kom tseg saib pub muaj pistsawg lub nubqub, hab nwg tis npe rua txhua lub nubqub nyag muaj nyag npe.
Peb tug TSWV yog tug kws muaj fwjchim hab muaj zug luj zug nchaav; tsi muaj leejtwg yuav totaub txug nwg lub tswvyim.
Nwg txhawb tug kws txu fwjchim, tabsis nwg tsuj tug kws ua phem ua qas rua huv aav.
Ca le hu nkauj qhuas tug TSWV; ca le ntaus nkauj nogncaas qhuas Vaajtswv.
Nwg ua kuas muaj fuab nyob sau nruab ntug; nwg tso naag lug ywg lub nplajteb hab ua kuas nroj tsuag tuaj sau tej pov roob.
Nwg pub kuas tej tsaj muaj noj muaj haus hab pub kuas tej mivnyuas uab laag tau noj thaus puab quaj.
Tsi yog nwg txaus sab rua cov neeg kws muaj zug, hab tsi yog nwg txaus sab rua cov tubrog kws muaj sab tawv;
tabsis nwg txaus sab rua cov tuabneeg kws fwm nwg, hab cov tuabneeg kws ca sab rua nwg txujkev hlub kws tsi paub kawg.
Yeluxalees, ca le qhuas tug TSWV! Xi-oos, ca le qhuas koj tug Vaajtswv!
Nwg tsomkwm koj tej roojvaag nyob ruaj khov kho; nwg foom koob moov rua koj tsaav tuabneeg.
Nwg tsomkwm tsi pub kuas luas tuaj txeeb koj nrim dlej nrim aav, hab nwg pub kuas koj ua tau qoobloo ntau.
Nwg has rua lub nplajteb, hab tej lug kws nwg has ua rua txhua yaam tav.
Nwg tso dlaus lug puv toj roob hauv peg dlawb paug ib yaam le plaub yaaj hab muaj te khov dlawb paug rua txhua qhov ib yaam le moov tshauv.
Nwg tso lawg lug ib yaam le tej pobzeb; yeej tsi muaj leejtwg tiv taug qhov no kws nwg tso lug ntawd le!
Nwg has lug xwb tej dlej nkoog ca le yaaj taag; nwg tso cua ntsawj tuaj, ces tej dlej ca le ndlwg lawm.
Nwg qha nwg txujlug rua Yakhauj, nwg pav nwg tej lug saamfwm hab tej kevcai rua cov Yixalayees.
Nwg tsi tau qha tej ntawd rua lwm tsaav tuabneeg le; rua qhov lwm tsaav tuabneeg tsi paub nwg tej kevcai. Ca le qhuas tug TSWV.
Ca le qhuas tug TSWV! mej cov kws nyob sau ntuj, ca le qhuas tug TSWV,
Taagnrho nwg cov timtswv, ca le qhuas nwg, taagnrho nwg cov tubrog sau ntuj ca le qhuas nwg.
Lub nub hab lub hli, ca le qhuas nwg; tej nubqub kws ci ntsaa ab, ca le qhuas nwg.
Ntuj hab tej dlej kws nyob sau nruab ntug ca le qhuas nwg.
Ib puas tsaav yaam ca le qhuas tug TSWV lub npe! Nwg has kuas muaj, ces tej nuav txawm tshwmsim tuaj;
tub yog nwg has tej nuav txhaj nyob ruaj khov qhov qub chaw moog ibtxhis; hab tej ntawd yeej tsi hlaa tug TSWV tej lug le.
Dlej havtxwv hab ib puas tsaav yaam kws nyob huv havtxwv, ca le tuaj huv nplajteb nuav qhuas tug TSWV,
tsaglig xub hab lawg, dlau hab fuab, hab cua dlaaj cua dlub ca le noog tug TSWV tej lug.
Tej pov roob hab tej hauv roob hab tej ntoo kws txi txiv, hab tej haav zoov, ca le qhuas tug TSWV;
txhua yaam tsaj, tsaj nyeg hab tsaj qus, naab qaa hab tej noog, ca le qhuas tug TSWV.
Tej vaajntxwv hab txhua tsaav tuabneeg, vaajntxwv cov tub hab tej numtswv, ca le qhuas tug TSWV;
tej tub ntxhais hluas, tej laug hab tej mivnyuas yau, ca le qhuas tug TSWV ib yaam nkaus.
Ib puas tsaav yaam nuav ca le qhuas tug TSWV lub npe! Nwg lub npe muaj koob meej dlua txhua lub npe huv tuabsi; nwg tug tshwjchim nyob puv nkaus huv lub nplajteb hab sau ntuj.
Tug TSWV ua rua nwg tsaav tuabneeg muaj zug heev; nwg tsaav tuabneeg txhua tug puavleej qhuas nwg, tsaav tuabneeg ntawd yog cov Yixalayees kws nwg hlub kawg nkaus. Ca le qhuas tug TSWV!
Ca le qhuas tug TSWV! ca le hu ib zaaj nkauj tshab qhuas Tug TSWV; thaus nwg tsaav tuabneeg tuaj txoos ua ke, ca le qhuas nwg;
Cov Yixalayees, ca le zoo sab rua tug kws tsim mej; cov tuabneeg huv lub nroog Xi-oos, ca le zoo sab rua mej tug vaajntxwv!
Mej ca le seev cev qhuas tug TSWV lub npe; mej ca le ntaus nruag hab ntaus nkauj nogncaas qhuas nwg.
Tug TSWV txaus sab heev rua nwg tsaav tuabneeg; nwg muab koob meej rua cov kws txu fwjchim kuas puab kovyeej.
Ca Vaajtswv tsaav tuabneeg zoo sab vim puab kovyeej; hab hu nkauj zoo sab taag mo le.
Ca puab qw nrov nrov thaus puab qhuas tug TSWV; tuav rawv puab tej ntaaj kws ntse zuag plag ntawm teg
moog tua kuas yeej ntau lub tebchaws hab rau txim rua ntau tsaav tuabneeg;
muab saw tooj khi puab cov vaajntxwv hab muab saw hlau khi puab cov numtswv;
rau txim rua txhua tsaav tuabneeg lawv le Vaajtswv tej lug saamfwm; nuav yog Vaajtswv tsaav tuabneeg kev muaj yeej; Ca le qhuas tug TSWV!
Ca le qhuas tug TSWV! Ca le qhuas Vaajtswv huv nwg lub Tuamtsev! Ca le qhuas nwg tug zug luj zug nchaav sau ntuj!
Ca le qhuas tug TSWV, vim nwg tej txujci tseemceeb kws nwg tau ua, ca le qhuas nwg lub fwjchim kws luj kawg nkaus.
Ca le tshuab raaj qhuas tug TSWV! Ca le ntaus nkauj nogncaas hab ntaus nruag npuaj qhuas nwg.
Ca le ntaus nruag hab seev cev qhuas nwg; ca le ntaus nkauj nogncaas hab tshuab raaj qhuas nwg.
Ca le ntaus nruag npuaj qhuas nwg; ca le npuaj nruag nrov dloog dlaj qhuas nwg.
Ib puas tsaav yaam kws muaj sa, ca le qhuas tug TSWV! Ca le qhuas tug TSWV!
